Not far from alot of wineries and the Barossa too. Xx

Crystal’s place is very well located, clean, stylish, spacious and welcoming. The self check in process was easy and communicating with Crystal was always quick and friendly.
Highly recommended - thank you Crystal.
Very nice and stylish house, very clean and comfy. Highly recommend!
Great location, quiet area. Perfect for family getaway for girls weekend.
Great spacious place to stay as a base to explore the beautiful vineyards of Barossa. The breakfast was a nice touch and the log fire! Would recommend anyone to stay here!
Beautiful place to stay!!! Spotlessly clean, great communication from the hosts and perfect for us and our fur babies! Would highly recommend

Lovely house and hospitality for our stay in Barossa. Everything was a close drive and our dog was welcomed and safe in the fenced backyard. The hammock was great for a nap in the afternoon after a day of wine tasting.
The breakfast was an added bonus
Crystal was amazing to deal with and very accomodating!
Great location. Very comfortable. Amazingly comfortable beds. Everything that we needed. Highly recommend
Great stay, very comfortable and close to all the amazing food and wine the Barossa has to offer.
The place was sparking clean, well maintained and Crystal was so pleasurable to deal with. Would recommend without hesitation!

Really great place. Spacious, clean, and in a quiet location near loads of Barossa Valley attractions (short drive to wineries, pubs, restaurants, cafes, producers, and other towns). Breakfast items and complimentary wine were a nice touch!
Amazing place, close to all the wineries and super clean!
Such a great place! Amazing hospitality! Crystal is a great host!! Would highly recommend! Thank you:)

A perfect place for friends and family to relax.
Comfy beds, nice outdoor entertainment area. I Highly recommend

Crystal’s place is a spacious home in Lyndoch in the Barossa Valley. It was the perfect retreat for our stay in the Barossa. It’s got plenty of room, a great sized yard and deck for relaxing with a bottle of wine. It’s very clean and has a big kitchen for cooking and Nespresso for coffee! Communication with Crystal was easy and friendly. Would highly recommend staying here!

Lovely spacious home with great facilities, large rooms and a spacious backyard with BBQ area. Crystal had provided many thoughtful touches including local wine and provisions for breakfast (OJ and Banana Bread), and the neighbourhood was really peaceful.

The house was lovely and clean, it felt very private, so easy to check in. The knitted rugs, fireplace, books and breakfast provisions made us feel very spoilt. The location was great. We loved our stay

A lovely stay in Lyndoch. Very quiet country area. We found it very easy to get around the Barossa Valley by car.  Driving around 10 to 30 minutes maximum and we easily exploring the different sights and wineries in the valley. A very nicely decorated, clean and spacious home. Very easy to check in and out. Communication with Crystal was easy and very timely. Beds were very comfy and the bedding/linen was nice - kept us nice and warm. The included breakfast was a lovely extra touch. A great stay in the Barossa.
Lovely place. Great fire, wish we could have stayed longer.
Lovely house that had everything we needed for a small family. Great to be able to take our dog too :-)

We stayed at Crystal's place for 'one night only' but had a great time. We recommend a walk through the nearby Sandy Creek CP and breakfast at The Table Cafe was a real treat! The fire was an extra nice touch for the chilly evening :)

Gorgeous house, sparkling clean with lots of lovely thoughtful touches right through the house. Comfy couches, comfy bed, real coffee, breakfast provided, fireplace ready - just needed to be lit- and great location. We loved staying and will definitely be back.
A great cosy place to stay. Great base to check out the Barossa.  It was great for two of us without feeling too big . Crystal was quick to respond and very helpful. Recommended.

House was lovely and clean with nice touches, we really enjoyed the coffee pod machine, deep bath & wood fire heater was used both days and creates a beautiful ambience and all the warmth you need on the cold winters night..we really enjoyed sitting in front after we put our son to bed with a bottle of sparkling wine.

Banana bread was one of the best we’ve had and we really enjoyed! Bottle of OJ, cereal and a bottle of wine were lovely!

Master bedroom was spacious and easy enough to have the porta cot in room without tripping over.

Was extra special to be able to bring our dogs as one has to take medication twice a day so it’s hard to getway unless they are invited.

Fantastic location with a 15 minute walk to Lyndoch town, the town has a bakery and the vegetarian pasty was amazing!!! Also in town is the local pub with a bottle-o attached all staff lovely. The Lord Lyndoch for something a special was an enjoyable dinner with great staff.
God Hill winery is 16 minute walk and the view is one of the best I’ve seen a photo doesn’t do it justice..Charlie the wine maker and owner is so lovely and passionate he also made us the best Italian platter and Sharon was beyond lovely and gave us such a experience with our one on one tasting..our one year old son absolutely loved her! Lots of fantastic (Website hidden by Airbnb) a must but ring before to book.
Kies winery is a 26 min walk and you could spend the whole day there with a great grass area with activities and a gorgeous husky who is super friendly... wines are delicious. We then walked to Chateau Yaldara..there is no path for for about 19 minutes so walking is fine but with a pusher is a little more adventurous but definitely do it if your up for it, the landscape is gorgeous and plenty of photo opportunities. Chateau Yaldara is one of our favourites! Plenty of reasons location is breathtaking, great food and if you have kids a fantastic play area, and the wines are always good!


Overall we had a great experience and would definitely stay again, thanks for having us we made lots of great memories.
Beautiful location and house. Very warm welcome with the fireplace :)
We had a girl's weekend at Crystal's Lyndoch house and everything was as promised. We had a very relaxing time and would definitely recommend to others.

Communication with crystal was easy and fast response time. The house was immaculate with the fire place on as we checked in which was a welcoming entrance. Extras like a bottle of wine, banana bread, milk, coffee tea, cereal and OJ was supplied which was a treat. The master bed was comfortable and the bed linen was so soft especially the quilt . Electric blankets were handy during the cold winter nights.  Location was perfect with wineries/pubs/bakery being a short drive away. We loved our one night stay and will definitely will be back again. Thank you Crystal
Crystals place is really nice, spacious and clean! A perfect place to stay in the barossa valley- very relaxing. Crystal left us a bottle of wine which was a very thoughtful touch!
Clean place, quiet street. Friendly and responsive host.

Lovely house for a winter family (and fur baby!)  getaway in the Barossa. All mod cons and clean throughout.  Having the indoor fire burning nicely on arrival was so welcoming. Would thoroughly recommend.
Crystal’s house is warm, well appointed and full of thoughtful touches. Great linen, well stocked kitchen and a beautiful space.

We had a wonderful stay here. The communication beforehand was excellent and Crystal gave us some great tips about where to go and eat.

The accomodation was excellent, some lovely touches when we arrived and while it was warm enough with the log fire, the electric blankets were a great touch and really, we couldn’t ask for any more throughout our stay. We would come back in a heartbeat!
A really great space! A beautiful fireplace that was lit and warm upon arrival and the host was lovely and helpful.

Crystal’s place was beautiful. A lovely house for a short or long stay - with everything you need to feel at home. We appreciated the condiments in the fridge and having soap for the shower! The house was very clean and it had small touches all around to give it that homely feel. Beds are comfortable and the house is spacious. Thanks for having us, we would definitely come back!
Lovely space, really well presented

This was the perfect getaway for us and our furbaby. The self check in was easy and communication was always clear and easy. Crystal’s place was spacious and clean. It had many wonderful homely touches. We absolutely loved the fire place and the bed was incredibly comfortable. We definitely recommend Crystal’s place to everyone, and especially for those who are travelling with their pets. We look forward to staying there again! Thank you!
Great spot would recommend
Great space that was very clean! Chrystal was easy to communicate with and we enjoyed our stay!

Very comfortable for our weekend in the Barossa. Location was great for visiting the wineries.
Was wonderful to find the wood combustion heater lit and warming the lounge when we arrived.
Beds were comfortable and we had a very pleasant stay.
Great communication very quick response. Beautiful home. 10/10 for cleanliness.

We had a great time staying at this beautiful, cozy, well appointed house located in a quiet and peaceful cul-de-sac.
Crystal is a fantastic host. The house has everything and the wifi is really good.
We were very impressed with the cleanliness and extra precautions being undertaken given the current times. Very dog friendly house, so much so that our dog actually didn't want to leave! And we are very thankful to the host for extending out check out time.
Absolutely recommended this place to anyone who wants a little getaway in Lyndoch
Really enjoyed our stay. Very clean and large space, extremely comfortable bed. Loved the fireplace. Everything we needed was there for us to use. Great communication too, thank you

Great location
Every thing you need
Crystal is a great host with excellent communication
Enjoyed our stay. House was presented beatufully and the welcome pack left for us was greatly appreciated.  House had plenty of room and everything we needed.
You will feel welcomed and comfortable in this accommodation with very easy and friend communication with Crystal
What a wonderful place to spend enjoying family and so close to local wineries for day trips.
Great place! We only stayed for one night and had a really good time. The house was perfectly clean and I enjoyed the provided coffee. Can highly recommend.
Tidy, clean and comfortable house with good amenities.

We had a wonderful time in Lyndoch nestled at the end of a quiet street and in walking distance of the main street. Beautifully styled, neat and tidy. The backyard was a great size for dogs and the decking area was lovely to relax on. So many comfy places to sit and enjoy the surrounds. Wonderful hospitality.

We had such a wonderful time at Crystals place! Such a beautiful home with everything you need to make a great stay. We also really appreciated all the extra little touches. We will definitely come back.

What an awesome place, it really exceeded our expectations! The space is really big and stylish, with nice homely touches around the place! The addition of a bottle of wine and cereal made it even nicer, especially for the price!

A lovely, modern home close to all that Barossa Valley has to offer. Easy drive to wineries, restaurants and the local pub. Ample space to relax and enjoy the fruits of the day's tour! Very peaceful and equipped with everything you would need.
Great place to stay. Great location. Would definitely stay again
great place to stay for exploring the Barossa and surrounds
Crystal’s place is located in a quiet peaceful cul-de-sac. It was bigger than expected. Communication with Crystal was easy and she was very responsive. We would highly recommend her place!

Clean, quiet, comfortable and well equipped property. Secure backyard for the dog also. 15min walk into town for groceries, dinner and the bakery. Short drive to the cellar doors.

Our host was really quick with communication and even left us some welcome treats.
Such a great place to stay in the Barossa. It was very clean, beautifully presented & had everything we needed.
A beautiful house, cool and charming, if you have time  some time just relaxing and enjoying the space, Trée chic
Crystal's place was very cosy and relaxing. Cleanliness was to a very high standard
Wonderful thoughtful touches, nice modern space - 15 mins walk to the main part of town and restaurants

Enjoyable and restful stay in a quiet cul de sac very close ( about 1.2km) to Lyndoch township and easy drive to Barossa wineries. Spacious and clean 2 bedroom house with one en-suite and a second bathroom & toilet and comfortable indoor and outdoor living spaces. Lots of kitchen equipment to make all our meals. Topped off by a lovely welcome pack of snacks, wine and breakfast cereals as well as coffee, tea and UHT milk. Thanks Crystal & Terry
Nice stay. The place was big and clean we really enjoyed our time wish it was longer
Exactly like the photos ☺️ had a lovely weekend stay! Great communication as well. Highly recommend.
An awesome space to catch up with friends and a great base to explore the Barossa! Great value for money!

Spent the Easter long weekend at Crystal's Lyndoc listing. We had a fantastic weekend, everything exceeded our expectations. Crystal was accommodating and flexible with our requests.

The property is a short drive to Tanunda and a short leisurely drive to a number of notable wineries (Rockfords, Two Hands, St Hugo's etc). The property has everyone a couple or small family/group could want. There's a modest backyard if you have dogs (we brought ours along) with a BBQ and outdoor dining area. The night lights on the porch is also a nice touch. If the weather wasn't so hot, we would have spent our evenings outside.

The house was very clean and decorated to feel homely. Loved every minute we were there! Highly recommend.
Pictures of the house is accurate, host replies pretty quick, lovely communication.

Great house, perfect for our stay 2 adults, 2 kids and 2 small dogs. We rode our bikes to nearby wineries. A long but lovely ride, our 10 yo just managed it! Dogs had plenty of room in the fenced back garden.

Crystals home is spacious and clean.

Set in a quiet cul de sac, there was privacy and peace.

The fire and ample wood made it just lovely of an evening.
We loved our stay in Lyndoch, the backyard, the wine and the cosy beds made for an amazing stay!

We had a lovely but brief stay of about 12 hours at Crystal's house in Lyndoch after a wedding at a winery.

The house is comfy and many of the small touches are provided (even ones you wouldnt necessarily expect) like nespresso pods, tea and coffee, biscuits, nuts, long life milk and netflix access.

All bedding and towels were also provided.

There are electric blankets on the beds and there are a few heaters around, plus the fireplace to keep you warm too.

The house accommodates 6 between 3 bedrooms. There's one ensuite, then a separate toilet and bathroom as well.

We didnt use the outdoor area, but it did look lovely with lots of seating, a bbq and a grassed area.
Great spot for a few days away in the Barossa! Very comfortable and clean while only a 10 minute drive to most wineries👌🏽
Fantastic stay at a lovely home that had it all
I stayed with a couple of friends in this cute place in Lyndoch for the long weekend. It is located near some lovely wineries and has a good sized backyard to enjoy the sun in.

The stylish touches in this home were so beautiful. Crystal’s communication was outstanding and her help and understanding of changes in plans during COVID was truly wonderful and very much appreciated. We all loved this home and we’ll be back! Thank you so much crystal for having us.

Crystal’s Air BnB is in a perfect spot to explore the wineries in Barossa. The house felt warm and welcoming, perfect for a young family to enjoy. Crystal was fantastic at answering any questions we had. Highly recommend!

a great home that feels like a home
beautiful warm fire
excellent little touches including an amazing hamper
the location is perfect for Barossa and Northern Adelaide
highly recommended this as a place to stay for a few weeks or a long stay

A lovely home to relax in, Clean and spacious place to stay. Lovely to have the large windows to look out to the back area, and great to sit out on the deck in the sun. Great fireplace with loads of wood ready to go!

We loved our stay at Crystal’s place. She’d thought of everything to make our stay an absolute delight and included many very-much-appreciated little extras.
Crystal was really easy to communicate with, we felt really comfortable and welcome and everything in her house was impeccably clean. We also found the location to be a perfect base to explore the Barossa from.
Very very happy! Highly recommend.
Super sweet and cosy place to stay! Location was great

Crystal’s place was perfect for our three night stay in the Barossa. Plenty of room, a gorgeous fireplace and a lovely deck and yard to sit and enjoy the sunset over a glass of wine. Our dog loved the yard too! Would definitely recommend and stay again.
Excellent clean house, great location to explore the Barossa & park the Caravan
Lovely cozy place, with all you could need. Would definitely stay again and recommend
Gorgeous and cosy house with beautiful furnishings inside and out. A pleasure to sit by the fire and enjoy the peace and quiet.

Absolutely delectable!

This is THE place to stay in Barossa!
Crystal was so accommodating with our check in needs and providing us with recommendations in the area!

The house was absolutely amaZing and it would be so wonderful to stay here as a group or even just a nice getaway for a couple!

We were more than comfortable and the beds were absolutely heavenly!’

We won’t be staying anywhere else but here in the Barossa again!

And the winery 5 minutes away at Kellermeister is absolutely divine!

10/10!!
Great house
Great spot, great facilities, very generous welcome pack! And our furbabies loved the backyard! We will definitely be back!

We absolutely loved our stay at Crystal's place, it really exceeded our expectations! It's in a perfect spot to explore the Barossa. The space was so warm and cosy, with many thoughtful touches and everything you need to feel at home. Would definitely recommend and stay again!
Crystal’s communication was wonderful and made our trip so convenient and easy. The location is great for visiting wineries and incredibly clean and cosy. Would definitely stay here again!

Crystal has been so accommodating and helpful. Highly recommend staying here. The place is beautiful and prime locationed. Crystal answered messages face and in such a kind manner. We absolutely loved it!

Words can not describe how happy we were staying at Crystal's beautiful house.
I have never come across a host who is so genuine and willing to assist in anyway she could to ensure our stay was a positive one. We arrived on a freezing cold day to a lit fire and bottle of wine. It really did set the tone for the most amazing trip I could have ever wished for. The property itself was immaculate, sparkling clean, freshly painted, spacious, but most importantly, it has such a welcoming homely feel. It was the most well equipped property I have come across, it has absolutely EVERYTHING! I will be staying at this property again without doubt. Thank you again Crystal for your everything, you truly are one in a million!
Fantastic host with a beautiful home. Exceptional service
Great house in lovely location. Very nice house just like photos. Fantastic communication with host. Would stay again.
A gorgeous house, great location and thoughtful special touches. Thanks Crystal!

Crystal’s place provided everything we needed for a very comfortable overnight stay. In particular was a generous welcome pack and a nice warm fireplace on arrival. Would definitely stay again if in the area.
An excellent place to stay, great facilities and such a peaceful house! Crystal was amazing to deal with and communicated well! thanks for the stay xx
Just a perfect spot for the weekend, spotless, super comfortable and cozy, excellent location, what’s not to love? An absolute gem of of an Airbnb!
Perfect location, perfect place!

We really enjoyed our stay. Crystal has excellent communication because of the lockdown we have to change our visit a few times. Every time crystal always very helpful to accomodate us  with the new date. We definitely looking forward to stay again
Everything you wish for and more. Crystal was lovely and her communication was great too.
Great place, big backyard. Very cosy and super warm in winter with a lovely fire place. We enjoyed our stay very much. Plenty of places to visit and wineries close by.
A great place to stay in the Barossa. Beautifully decorated and has everything you could possibly need. The wood fire heater is brilliant for those cold winter nights!
Comfortable and cosy place for a quiet weekend exploring the Barossa!

Crystal was a great host and always quick to respond to any of our queries.

The property was lovely. It was pristinely clean and the bed was super comfy.

As our dog is quite little, it was great how secure the back was so we knew he couldn’t get out.

Also appreciated the welcome supplies and local recommendations.

Would definitely recommend this as a place to stay.
Great for a family getaway, nicely arranged house with a superb outdoor area, really appreciated the thoughtful additions Crystal left for us
Such a gem! a stylish and comfortable house. Clean and modern.  So well equipped and prepared. Crytal is so generous and quick to reply to our messages. Highly recommended!

Crystal has done a wonderful job of creating an extremely clean and comfortable place to stay. The wood heater kept the place cosy, loved the bathtub and the thoughtful bottle of very nice wine (we ended up going online and getting a case of it!). We also appreciated her flexibility on a last minute booking, and our old puppy loved snoozing next to the fire. We would be very happy to stay again. :)

It was like  a 'home away from home' with everything one could have needed..  On a couple of very cool nights it was very comfortable inside, especially with the good functioning wood stove. Would be a great venue on warmer evenings to enjoy the outdoor settings. Peaceful surrounds. First class accommodation.
Great host!

Great accomodation! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The house was clean, however for the price we paid I believe a few things could be improved, such as kitchen equipment (tea towels, oven mits and baking paper/alfoil were not provided).
Crystal provided us with a home away from home and we will definitely be back.
A lovely little gem that’s tucked away in the Barossa yet still accessible to everything the region has to offer. Loved the bed, felt like I was a king!
Amazing location and everything you require is there. Very comfortable living spaces and amazing outdoor area. Already rebooked our next stay
Lovely place to stay, peaceful and very homely. Loved the fireplace. A nice touch in the chilly weather.

Enjoyed the stay  in the comfortable home in a quiet area of Lyndoch. Close to the town facilities and local wineries.  Good location to access Mt Crawford Forest, Jenkins Scrub, South Para Reservoir Home has a great  outdoor area with  extensive deck attached to the house and the separate barbecue area set in a neat back yard. Indoors simply and pleasantly furnished and comfortable seating areas.  We enjoyed our time at the home.
Perfect home away from home.

Had a wonderful time at my recent stay. Crystal has thought of all the little things to make the experience so lovely. The house was spotless, and contained everything needed for a relaxing break in the Barossa. Highly highly recommend staying here.

Could not recommend Crystal’s place more, such a great set up and perfect for a weekend away. We stayed here the night before my wedding and it was perfect for getting ready with great natural lighting which made for the perfect photos. Crystal was such a lovely host and supplied some beautiful platters which we snacked on while getting ready. Perfect for a nervous bride who couldn’t eat much!

Great location- very pet friendly. Lots of little touches such as breakfast food, milk, wine, croissants - even a treat for the pooch. Everything you need to enjoy your stay. Very quiet area with a nice walking opportunity. Crystal was able to change our booking without too much fuss when we requested the change. Her communication was fabulous.
Great place to base yourself in the barossa 👌

Crystal's place was an amazing place to explore the Barossa area - super comfy bed, spacious and airy living/dining area with a great grassy backyard perfect for picnic lunches and dinner. Also appreciated the additional touches like the welcome hamper and breakfast goodies.  The internet is reliable, with high speed which was perfect for our 'working from home' week in the Barossa! Highly recommend!

We had a great stay at this property

We have 2 small dogs and it was perfect for them. Fully fenced with a great outdoor space.

It’s funky decor and welcome basket and thoughtful touches really made this a great stay.

Beautiful house with a very welcoming host, we had a brilliant stay here with my family over Christmas. Plenty of space with a fully enclosed backyard for dogs and children. Lots of wonderful personal touches that made our stay extra special. Only short 15-20min walks to things like playgrounds, bakery and the pub, or a couple minutes by car. Thanks again for having us in your house!

Wonderful hosts with a great home. Beautifully presented, clean, and tidy. Lots of little extras and conveniences were provided by the hosts that made the stay very enjoyable.

The dogs loved the big backyard and they had a great time on holidays with us over the Christmas/New Year break.

The location was good in a quiet no-through street with lots of vineyards and things to do nearby. Only a short drive to the main street of Tanunda.

I highly recommend this house and would definitely book again in the future.

Absolutely amazing place, great location and very clean. The welcome pack was a lovely touch - wish we stayed for longer! Crystal was very helpful in making suggestions for places to eat and drink and even sorted out a private driver for us. Highly recommend her place for anyone coming into the Barossa Valley.

Stayed at this beautiful property during our visit to Barossa Valley. Everyone in our group loved the place, well laid out quite a lot of space for the kids to run around. Great communicating with Crystal, all instructions were clear and precise. Loved the great welcome pack
Worth staying there! Lovely place was exactly as described and with extra touches - wine and a snack pack which we enjoyed on the patio!  Highly recommended!
Amazing place to stay, very relaxing. communication with the host is a breeze and they are very accommodating. Have stayed before and will most definitely stay again.
This place was absolutely beautiful! A large house with many different dining areas, and also not a far walk into town. Very generous hosts and would definitely return!
Such a lovely home. So appropriately presented.

This is hands down, the best AirBnB my partner and I ever stayed at. It was clean, cosy, with loads of personality. The fireplace is nice and central, and great to curl up near it with a book or playing games. The kitchen has everything you'd ever need, and the spa in the bathroom is a treat to relax in.

The host has thought of everything. I know it's a bit more expensive but it's worth every cent. We will definitely be coming here again if we are to stay in the Barossa in the future.

What a charming, beautiful cottage full of history and character. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and don’t hesitate to recommend to others. We appreciated all the generous and thoughtful touches. The rooms were spacious and beds comfortable. The kitchen was stocked up with everything you might possibly need. We enjoyed the walk to Angaston to pick up some homemade ice cream and there was a fabulous playground for the kids. For the adults, the cottage is close to wineries such as Yalumba and other attractions such as Maggie Beer. We also enjoyed sitting out in the backyard playing cards and soaking up the Barossa Valley atmosphere.

This was a charming and cute place to stay at. The bedrooms were a good decent size. Everything was clean and tidy. The outdoor area was a lovely space to relax in. The location for us to visit various wineries in the Barossa. And the hosts communicated well. Thank you!
Quaint place in a good location and handy for pets
Christina’s place is fantastic. A beautiful old style home with lots of fantastic extra touches.. would strongly recommend staying here..
Traditional cottage with lots or antiques. Location great for wineries. Bring warm clothes if coming in winter!
A lovely little cottage with a lot of antiques to take you back in time. Pantry and fridge well stocked and comfortable beds.
Charming cottage with delightful back terrace for sun drenched breakfasts.
Beautiful, clean,cosy home. We loved our stay!
An absolutely beautiful place in a fantastic location - definitely recommend!

When you talk about location this little pice of luxury is spot on. The newly refurbished 3 bedroom house was the perfect break from reality that we were after. The couch was comfy the heating was perfect the beds were amazing and so was the TVs and Netflix.

The kitchen was a pleasure to cook in and I can only imagine sitting on the deck (in warmer weather) with a glass of local wine and platter of produce (which Sarah will happily organize for you) would be heaven.

Perfect for a couple, group of friends or a family as the property was totally enclosed and there was area for the children to play. I would like to return with a group of girls so that we could indulge in a weekend of fine food, wine and fun.

Thanks for having us we had a very relaxing time.
Sarah’s place was absolutely beautiful and conveniently located. Sarah was a very kind host. Highly recommend.

Sarah's place is one of the best Airbnb homes we have experienced. The standard of accommodation and level of comfort was outstanding. The wine and cheese platter on arrival was greatly appreciated as was the great communication throughout. The location is a perfect springboard for exploring the Barossa and experiencing the charming town of Tanunda. Highly recommended.

The house is beyond amazing and the location is great! You can walk into town or you are just a short drive from all of the wineries. The house is super clean and the kitchen is fully stocked with all appliances and Utensils- we collected food from our day and then cooked dinner at night it was great! My daughter also left her favourite puppy at the house and Sarah found it and is sending it back to us! We are going to have one happy child! If we ever come back to the Barossa I wouldn’t stay anywhere else
Absolutely perfect - can’t fault anything about the property. Perfect location, perfectly styled and thoughtful touches throughout. We will definitely be back!
Great location and walking distance to everything.  Perfect for quiet get away with all the convenience of home.  Sarah was incredibly responsive and helpful.
Fantastic stay! Very clean and tidy in the heart of the Barossa!
Perfect place and perfect location for touring Barossa

We had a fabulous time - great location, facilities and service. Our host offered exceptional advice and was helped us with some local food and experience! We would recommend this location to anyone interested in exploring the beautiful Barossa!

Sarah was a wonderful host who went out of her way to make our stay convenient and comfortable. The house is fantastic, spacious and well appointed. Our only regret was not being able to stay for longer !

Beautifully appointed cottage which is sparkling clean and full of charm along with everything you could possibly need. In a fantastic location in the centre of Tanunda close walking distance to fabulous restaurants and coffee shops. Host is very helpful and responsive. Some lovely extras provided. Perfect if you are after somewhere a bit special.
Absolutely loved our stay here! The perfect house for our stay in the Barossa, beautifully styled with everything we needed. Amazing location as well!
Fantastic location - within walking distance of a Foodland and a 15 minute drive from most wineries. The house is clean and beautifully furnished, with most amenities provided.

Highly recommend this amazing accommodation.  So many special touches... well thought out and super comfy.  Close to everything... walked to dinner each night and also enjoyed one night in... kitchen was well equipped and local produce delicious. Easy communication... can’t thank you enough for the comfy beds and sharing this beautiful home.

I cannot speak highly enough about Sarah and This stunning property attention to detail amazing felt like home when we walked in a full kitchen with everything we could need and excellent communication! We were 5 ladies having a girls weekend and this will be our yearly accommodation for sure !! Thanks so much Sarah well done on an amazing property 💖
Great location. Luxury accomodation for a reasonable price. Recommend highly to anyone staying in the area.
The accommodation is stunning, spotless, and a great location - what more do you want?
Beautiful house, perfectly located in Tanunda, in the heart of Barossa Valley. Walking distance to the supermarket but yet very quiet neighborhood. 5 ⭐️

A wonderful, spacious and well appointed home with many lovely thoughtful features. Fabulous host, impeccable facilities and beautifully designed accommodation experience that surpassed expectation. Thank you.

Sarah’s place is in a fabulous location, well within walking distance to excellent restaurants and shops. It’s a very nicely renovated home and much attention has been paid to  all the welcoming details, ensuring an extremely comfortable stay. We enjoyed our time there greatly and would love to return with friends.
the home was very nicely decorated and.cozy

Beautiful spot right in the heart of the Barossa! Perfect for a home base when wine tasting - large living spaces and bedrooms. Loved the personal touches of wine and a welcome platter! Would 100% stay again and recommend to friends :)

Sarah’s place deserves at least 10 stars. The house itself and all the amazing touches Sarah adds to it are above and beyond. Sarah was a great communicator. This place is a must stay, excellent location, super comfy and beautifully decorated. We were blown away - just loved it!
Really lovely, clean house, heaps of space yet really homely. Fantastic location too! Within walking distance to all amenities, restaurants, bakeries etc. Highly recommended!

The house is very stylish and is filled with all the facilities that make a stay carefree. The entertaining areas, especially the outdoor deck and spa, are wonderful and they transition so well from the modern kitchen area. The locality of the property is fantastic - Tanundra is on the doorstep.
Great location. Fantastic hosts. Nice amenities.
房间很温馨很舒服，干净整洁，厨房用具配套齐全。出行十分便利，给我们带来了新的体验。
Good spot and well appointed house. Great attention to detail and thoughtful welcome gifts.

Sarah’s Place was an absolute dream. A true sanctuary- we felt so relaxed and energized. The outstanding kitchen amenities, heated hot tub, TVs in the bedrooms and comfy couch were a stand out. We will be back again. The kids loved it.
Sarah’s place was superbly located very close to the town centre. It was beautifully set out and was spacious and comfortable. I would definitely stay here again. Thanks Sarah!

This house has been stylishly renovated and furnished. It really does feel luxurious. Being on Murray Street means that you are within walking distance to cafes and shops. We came as a group of six, and thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Absolutely beautiful property with stunning decor. It has everything you need and is in an excellent location. Thanks for a great stay! :)
Just a terrific place to stay when visiting the Barossa. Very comfortable accommodation. Loved the open fire too. Heaps of room for our party of 6. Thanks Sarah
Beautiful home, great location and seamless service. Thanks for hosting us on our girls weekend!
Excellent location for touring the surrounding wineries and cellar doors. House was clean and had everything you could want. Would stay aha
What a lovely cottage this was.  Decorated  beautifully and in the heart of the Barossa.

This house is spectacular!!
Location is perfect, across the road from Foodland, short walk to wine bars, delicious food and gorgeous shops. The house has everything you need and more. Looks recently renovated and is super clean and homey. Beautifully decorated. We were two couples and were extremely comfortable in the space.
Even enjoyed wine in front of a working fireplace!

Such a wonderful place to stay. Location just perfect. An easy walk to outstanding restaurants and wine bars. Comfort and style make for a special stay. Welcome platter, wood fire, fabulous collection of books and Netflix make for a happy distraction. Can’t wait to visit again. 💛💛

What an amazing home! The perfect getaway for 3 couples who want to enjoy a weekend wine by the fireplace surrounded by all that the Barossa has to offer. All the little touches were so well thought out! All of the amenities were amazing. Couldn’t have asked for a better stay.

A sanctuary in so many ways... When looking for a place to celebrate my husband's 50th with a small group of friends it was very hard to find somewhere that catered for 3 couples, but that wasn't so big and expensive it wouldn't feel welcoming, especially in winter. Then I found the Sanctuary and I have to say it was a pleasant surprise. The home is large enough to give 3 couples privacy but set up with enough seating and amenities to make it feel cosy, inviting and engaging. I would recommend it to a small group of friends who want to escape somewhere the same as if not nicer than home that is opulent, super comfortable and has the beautiful Barossa Valley at your doorstep. One of the best restaurants in the world (in my opinion) Ferment Asian is just a short stroll away which means you can treat yourselves to a special night out and not have to worry about driving or taxis. The outdoor deck would be great on a warm evening to sit and debate who bought the best wine whilst the BBQ cooks or a soak in the hot tub after a long day out exploring is equally as inviting and indulgent. There are lots of interesting books to read if you feel like you want to wind down and take yourself somewhere else whilst sitting in the comfy snuggle seat or take a long soak in the beautiful freestanding bathtub. This home is truly at sanctuary which ever way you look at it. Can't wait till we visit again.
Great Place.  Top location.  Nice space, big kitchen and bathrooms ... loved it!
The house is absolutely beautiful and within walking distance of cafes and restaurants. Perfect for 5 girls on a weekend getaway!
What an amazing property!! One of the best places I've stayed using Airbnb.  Great furnishings and design. The location is right in the middle of the town, winery in all directions of this house..
Nice central  location. Easy to park. Clean and stylish place, very comfortable. Great hosts who provided missing wood for fire during rainy evening! Highly recommend the place for anyone!
Great hospitality and stunning house!

This place is amazing. Great location in heart of Tanunda. Check in was very easy. We were greeted to a well presented, warm (heater put on for us), well lit (lights were on as we arrived around 6pm) and clean place, along with a delicious platter and wine. We enjoyed using the fireplace. Just wish we packed bathers, as the outdoor spa looked very welcoming. Definitely want to come back again. Thank you Sarah.

Beautifully decorated, very comfortable and a fabulous location. A perfect base to explore the Barossa or just escape from the city. The welcome platter and wine were  a lovely surprise. Sparkling bathrooms, comfy lounge, open fire. Can’t help but feel relaxed and pampered.
We had a wonderful weekend away in a truly beautiful home.
Great house, lots of good details and convenient location.
Place is amazing, perfect location.

Absolutely stunning! We had a great stay here with 5 girls getaway. It was just perfect, we got the fire going and the beds were ridiculously comfortable! It was a lot better than we imagined! Beautiful little reading nook and lots of books to choose from. Can’t recommend it enough! Perfect for couples getaway.
Great place - perfectly positioned in Tanunda.
We had a great stay here. It’s a great house - clean, stylish, spacious and well located. Sarah was very responsive and helpful. Would recommend.
Sarah’s place was perfectly located and was a big and well appointed space for our stay with friends and a little bub. The cheese board and wine was a lovely touch!
Beautifully decorated, thoughtful touches, amazing amenities

The pictures of this house do absolutely no justice. This house is beyond incredible. From the smallest things of the easy self check in, to the items in the fridge, the house was spotless, the location was absolutely perfect. Every single detail was... simply perfect. We will definitely be back and have been telling all our friends who need a weekend away to have a look at this house. Thankyou so much Sarah, no amount of Thanks will express house much having the most lovely place to stay, made our weekend away one to never forget.

This is a very premium Airbnb. The home is beautifully appointed, light clean and spacious. Amazing special touches with a cheese platter and a bottle of local wine and fresh bread from the local bakery As well as breaky supplies and a stocked coffee pod machine!
A lovely open fireplace for chilly nights and a great deck and very enjoyable hot tub !
Also fantastic location on the Main Street in Tanunda.
Thank you so much we thoroughly enjoyed our ladies gateaway!

A gorgeous house in a great location. Perfect for couples sharing, and very comfortable and stylish. It was great for our weekend away and well situated for walking into Tanunda, and the hot tub was well received after a busy day wine tasing the Barossa.
Absolutely beautiful. Super clean and had extra little touches such as heater left on, cold water and juice in the fridge etc.
We had a wonderful weekend in the Barossa . The house was perfect for three couples. A great central location from which to enjoy all the local attractions.
Impressive modern update to an old home on the main street in Tanunda, spacious and comfortable, excellent location with lots of walksbleeateries etc

One of the best AirBNB experiences we have ever had. Simply, without a lot of detail, if you are visiting the Barossa wine country, this is the place to stay! Great restoration of an old home with modern conveniences and thoughtful touches.

Sarah's place is an amazing oasis in the heart of the Barossa Valley. It's such a treat to return to at the end of a long day wine tasting. The air conditioning is wonderful for beating the heat, the spacious layout is great for groups and the BBQ, hot tub and outdoor deck make it perfect for family gatherings. Sarah has provided all the amenities you'll need from shampoo and conditioner to laundry detergent. I also loved her wall of books and other thoughtful touches. The beds are on the softer side but not uncomfortable and the linens make for a dreamy night's sleep. The back bedroom is off the road so it's super quiet and peaceful. This is the perfect spot to stay in the Barossa.

Beautifully presented home in a central location within easy walking distance of wine bars, restaurants and shopping! The home is very well equipped with everything you need! We had a great time! Thanks Sarah!
房子的位置很方便，完美的住宿
Great lace lovely and clean and loved the location
Everything about this accommodation was perfect! We loved our stay.

Lovely stay in the heart of barossa, we were a group of friends and had enough space for privacy and to hang out as a group. The home is beautiful and has all you need for a getaway. Would definitely recommend and return again!
A very nice, roomy house in a convenient location. Weill furnished and fitted out.
Lovely clean, well appointed house centrally located in Tanunda. It's very easy to walk to shops, cafes & restaurants. Parking & access are also great. Strongly recommend this house!

Absolutely beautiful
We loved our say at this property
Would recommend

We had the best stay at Sarah’s. The location was amazing and she went above and beyond helping us with a babysitter and a very generous welcome platter. The place was spotless and had everything we needed for a great stay. A+++
Stylish and comfortable place right in Tanunda. Walking distance to restaurants and wine tasting, short drive to all of the fantastic Barossa vineyards.
A beautifully presented property!
This is a great house in a brilliant location, we would stay again
Couldn’t rate this stay higher. From the start to end a perfect stay. Luxurious and homely at the same time. Will recommend to any and everyone!
Great house to base yourself when exploring the Barossa. Plenty of space for 6 people. Welcome platter was delicious and spa was great for relaxing after big days of wine tasting. Would stay again!
Location, presentation, amenities and cleanliness were fantastic. Easy communication, check in was a breeze. Looks better than the photos! Will definitely be back.
Excellent amenities, well-equipped lodgings, and perfect central location. Can't ask for any more really.

A great stay for a weekend away. Close to everything the Barossa has to offer.
The amenities are well thoughout and the communication from Sarah is always prompt!
Excellent place, highly recommend. Great location.
The house is in the perfect position for walking to dinner and drinks nearby. We enjoyed our evenings around the fire.

Great spot to stay in Tanunda on the main road, close to stores, pizza places and 5-10 min driving to most wineries. Spa is amazing, chimney makes it super fun in winter and A/C warms up the whole house very nicely. the rooms are quite separate which makes it comfortable for two families.

A lovely home in a perfect location, close to all the shops, cafes and pubs. We thoroughly enjoyed the hot tub on the chilly evenings. Sarah was fast to respond to messages and check in was super easy. Would definitely recommend this home.

Loved celebrating our wedding anniversary here. Beautiful house tastefully decorated &  amazing location on a quiet part of the Main Street walking distance to  the shops &  the most impressive Gin bar ! Great food, drink & company with the added luxury of a hot tub in the garden perfect for relaxing after a hectic day exploring ! Thanks so much Sarah can’t wait to return 🤞

Beautifully renovated and maintained home in the main street within easy walking distance of all main restaurants and shops.
Loved the spa area and the open fire.

Many thanks Sarah - your place was lovely for a long weekend for 2 couples travelling together.  We were fortunate to have 1.5 days in the sun on the deck and 1.5 days cozy by the fire.  Fabulous to be able to walk to restaurants and shops easily.  You were also fabulous to deal with - thank you again.
This property is ideal if you don’t want to be driving everywhere, comfy beds, Spa is great 😊 we will definitely stay again

The house was nice and comfortable with good bathrooms and kitchen. Beds were super comfy which is a huge plus, and the spa is lovely. The best thing is definitely the location, it's almost adjacent to a supermarket and in very easy walking distance to the town and all the bars/restaurants.
There were a couple of things which weren't so pleasant though. Despite us booking for 3 adults (and paying extra per adult), the third bedroom was locked when we got there. They assume that adults want to share a bed and claimed it was in the listing (we read and double-read it, is definitely not clear that 3 adults = 2 bedrooms. Also a bit misleading when you are searching Air BnB for a "3-bedroom entire property").
The listing also said a bottle of wine was included for stays over 2 nights, we didn't get one, but whatever it's the Barossa right. There was no remote control for the lounge room TV that we could find, but we figured out how to use the buttons on the bottom of the tv eventually. There were some incomplete food amenities included, i.e. bread and vegemite, with no butter so we ended up having to go to the shops anyway.
Overall a pleasant stay and I would definitely recommend to others wanting a house in Tanunda, but there are a couple of things they could work on to make it a 5-star stay.
Do yourself a favour and stay here.  A beautiful home with everything you could possibly ask for and so close to everything in the main street.
Beautiful home that had everything that was promised
A great place to stay! Great ammenities, close to restaurants & shopping and an amazing bath and spa. We had such a relaxing time away for our anniversary. Thank you!
Absolutely lovely stay at Tanunda. Very close and accessible to both wineries and the town for all your needs :) lovely, clean renovated house with spa with we enjoyed as well :) thank you :)
Excellent house for a family stay. Plenty of space, well provisioned and extremely comfortable. Highly recommended.

We loved our Tanunda stay! It was the perfect location on the Main Street, a close walk to shops/cafes/restaurants. The home was spacious, beautiful, clean and beds were extra comfortable! We loved the jacuzzi and the outside area was perfect for meals and socialising. Would definitely recommend!

This stay was amazing! The location is right near the town center; easily within walking distance to anywhere in town. The house was well equipped and felt really homely. We would definitely look at staying here again!
amazing house! just like the pictures and a wonderful cheese platter on arrival, lovely welcome

Great unique location. The Barn and surrounds is a lovely cosy choice. Close enough to explore all of Barossa, but tucked away enough to enjoy a quiet retreat.
Wonderful friendly hosts too!

Carolyns place is incredible! We came in the middle of winter and we were so warm and cozy in the studio. The property is stunning and the bed is super comfy! Not to mention, Carolyn, her husband and sons are completely delightful and really helpful with local tips about the area. Would come back in a heartbeat!
lovely little single room beautifully renovated barn, tucked just far away from everything to feel alone, but not so far that you can't get around and enjoy the Barossa. Massive shower head!
Expect great hospitality and 'tips on places to go
Excellent place to stay

The barn is cosy, comfortable,well presented and quirky. We wanted something different to your basic hotel setup and the barn is just that. We felt like real locals waking up with rolling views.  Carolyn and her family have great knowledge of the vineyards and the local area which we appreciated. Thanks again.

Carolyn’s place was a lovely getaway. The barn itself was beautiful, clean, warm and comfortable. The bed is absolutely huge! Nice separate bathroom, a short walk from the barn. The view is beautiful!
We had a great time staying here. Thank you so much!
Very cute and a perfect location. Thank you Carolyn for being a great host.

Thank you so much for your amazing hospitality Carolyn and William! We loved meeting you all (including Angus and Ruby), and had such a lovely time staying in the Barn. What a gorgeous place to stay! We had everything we needed, the styling was stunning and what a view to wake up to in the morning! We both slept so well on the huge, extremely comfortable king bed and will be recommending all of our friends to make a trip to the Barossa to stay in Angaston ASAP. Thank you for being so friendly and kind!!!! A brilliant mini vacay! Xxxx

We had a wonderful stay at Carolyn & William's farm. The Barn is a cosy and beautifully presented space with a huge comfy bed! It has everything you need for a short stay. The Barn is located near Angaston  and close to many of Barossa's  finest wineries and restaurants. Carolyn & William were excellent and accommodating hosts with great tips and recommendations.  We had a wonderful weekend and would definitely recommend the Barn to our friends and family!

Carolyn was very helpful and lovely. The room is 10/10 as is the location. If you're staying a few days make sure you come prepared with small goods like milk, fruit and snacks. The room was lovely and warm and the bed comfy. Would definately go back.

The Barn is a beautiful stay in the Barossa that offers peace & quiet and a lovely view. The driveway is lined with blossoming trees, the hosts are lovely & will do anything to make your stay special. The Barn itself is fantastic - beautifully styled, huge comfortable bed & has everything you need. The toilet/bathroom is a 15m walk away on a boardwalk, so no big deal. I loved the historical aspect of it. Sunset drinks on the back deck were everything we imagined in the Barossa. You won't be disappointed if you stay here!

'The Barn' is a well appointed room, the host Carolyn anticipating most of your needs before you even know you have them.  Most things you'll find in your room and it's only a short well lit boardwalk across to the amenities. Would definitely stay here again!

The Barn is the most amazing little place to get away for the weekend. The Barn itself and facilities were so modern, new and fresh. The location is perfect and just outside Angaston where anything we needed was a small drive. Absolutely worth every penny for an adults weekend away, drink some wine, eat some cheese, visit some wineries and sights and veg out.

Carolyn is a good helpful host and is creating a charming Barossa country feel. The room is an old stone barn well renovated with beautiful linen, comfortable bed and large fun. There is a nice private outdoor sitting area with country views.
However we were disappointed on arrival to find that the barn had no running water and the new toilet and shower were 30m away up a boardwalk in a separate building. This is rather inconvenient in the middle of a cold night! To be fair the place description did say amenities were separate but it was not clear to us that this meant no en suite and the photos did not make it clear either.This needs to be emphasised in the advert as for that price one would expect self-contained facilities. We are sure when the renovations are complete this will be a great place to stay.

Absolutely beautiful location. Carolyn is incredibly helpful and quick to respond in communication and provided lovely accommodation.  The Barn is exactly as described and pictured.  Thank you for making my experience so fuss free.
Thanks for the stay! A nice quiet place to go after seeing the Barossa. Loved the bed linen.

The Barn was truly magical and was just what we needed for a long weekend getaway. Carolyn had thought of everything in regards to amentities, from extra towels and blankets to netflix and an array of delicious teas. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and the peace and quiet of the Barn. Would highly recommend if you're looking for a romantic weekend away to enjoy some wine and soak in the peace and quiet.
Our stay was amazing! I would strongly suggest anyone going to the Barossa to stay at The Barn in Penrice. Carolyn is so accomodating and the Barn is in a beautiful setting.

The Barn is a beautifully located villa type home where everything you need is catered for. A great mix of old structures but modern facilities gives this place an edge on everywhere else. Would recommend.
Wonderful stay, great location, great view. Beautiful and comfortable. Biggest bed ever! Just perfect!

Carolyn and family very friendly and room was beautiful with fresh linen, lovely soft towels and beautiful view of countryside as well as great connection to Netflix. However take care when walking to amenities as very poor lighting on path to toilet and laundry at night causing a trip hazard and suggest much improved lighting. Solar lights provide insufficient lighting at night currently.
We had a fantastic stay! Beautiful accommodation, great hosts!! And so close to restaurants, wineries & sites! Can’t wait to come back ... definitely recommend!

Cute space with a rustic exterior and modern interior. Surrounding renovations under way at the time of writing and as mentioned in the description. Carolyn and her family were very welcoming hosts. Highly recommend.

We loved our stay in the Barn. Such a beautiful space with gorgeous views.
We had a lovely peaceful visit. Would definately visit again.
Carolyn is s fantastic host.
Great location to explore the region. The pool is a welcome relief if it is hot.
An absolutely beautiful location, room and hosts. It was perfect and I’d stay there again in a heartbeat. Thank you for making our trip to the barossa so enjoyable.
Great hospitality and a beautiful location
Beautiful space and friendly hosts. Highly recommended.

I can’t recommend Carolyn’s Air BnB enough. A welcoming host with great local knowledge that made our trip. The barn is very comfortable with a private decking to enjoy the stunning views. To top it off, Carolyn makes the best brownies! Thanks again, Tom

Highly recommended for anyone wishing to "escape" and find serenity.  A well thought out space, comfortable "large" bed and gorgeous outlook.  The toilet and shower a short stroll away from the barn wasn't a problem.  We decided to stay in each night instead of eating out as we didn't want to miss the opportunity of enjoying the sunset and relaxing in such a lovely setting.  The property is situated within an easy drive to "everywhere" in the Barossa but you still feel like you are in the middle of "nowhere"!!!
Excellent acommodation, very clean and has everything you need.
Enjoyed our stay. Bed was amazing. Best bucolic view to wake up to in the morning
Excellent and helpful host, with lots of local information for tourists. The place was spotless and serene. Sitting on that decking, watching the sun set across the hills is special.
Beautiful peaceful retreat, and there’s a pool!
Great Air B&B. We really enjoyed our stay here. Beautiful set up. Great communication from the hosts. Would recommend.
Beautiful peaceful accommodation in Barossa Hills. Close to town and wineries. Really enjoyed our stay and appreciated suggestions from host re places to go.

The perfect little retreat for a relaxing getaway! We stayed for 3 nights and didn’t want to leave. Carolyn is a very helpful & accommodating host. The king bed is super comfy & Carolyn has the place set up so well with all of the furniture & amenities. It’s hard to beat having a glass of wine on the deck watching the sunset over the fields! The lovely & spacious toilet/bathroom/shower is only 20 steps away and wasn’t an issue at all. Can’t wait to come back & stay again.
It is a lovely little getaway in the Barossa and close to all the wineries.

Was nice place & beautiful balcony & close to other towns. We didn’t have any hot water for a day so had to have a cold shower. The bathroom is away from the room and the lights walking there were very dim so was hard to see where I was walking. Also would of been good to have a sink in the room rather than have to keep walking to the bathroom area.

We had a wonderful stay and look forward to staying again in the future . Carolyn was a terrific host and made us feel very much at home . The property is ideally located a few kilometers from town and sits
beautifully in a rural setting . Highly recommended !

Carolyn is a great host, very easy and lovely to chat to. The gorgeous little barn house was way better then we expected, and had all the amenities so that my mum and I could enjoy a nice hot coffee and brekky in the mornings. Would recommend to anyone who's wanting to get away for the weekend!!
The perfect spot for a week end in the Barossa. The barn is very comfortable, the sky full of star and Carolyn and William were extremely helpful. Would definitely recommend staying there.

Carolyn’s Barn is utterly idyllic! The perfect place for a weekend away to decompress from city life. We spent the weekend wine touring so brought bits with us for breakfast and despite its secluded location were even able to order a pizza at night! The room is very cosy, heating and a great big bed. The separate bathroom didn’t really bother us, just maybe bring your slippers so you don’t need put your shoes on every time you need to go :)

What a wonderful accommodation! My partner and i loved how it was so homely and the short walk to the amenities weren't a problem at all!
Carolyn gave us a range of great suggestions for what to do in the Barossa which were perfect. We spent hours driving around the Barossa valley.
Would definitely recommend the place to anyone heading to the Barossa!

We had a midweek stay at the gorgeous Barn and it was the perfect spot to explore the beautiful Barossa . Comfortable bed and lovely extras, loved the coffee :)
Thankyou to Carolyn for the local suggestions which took us to places we would not otherwise have found .
Great location, a lot of history, easy access to the Barossa Valley wineries.

What a beautiful place to have spent a couple of nights at to give us access to the Barossa. Well appointed facility with all we needed. Sitting out on the patio with a bottle of red & some cheeses while the sun was setting was pretty special. Nice location to be able to get out to explore the region as well.

We throughly enjoyed our stay, the barn was beautifully renovated with luxurious and stylish decor. It had everything we needed and was close to excellent wineries and restaurants. I would recommend this accommodation to any couple looking to experience the Barossa Valley.

Fantastic location (close to all the wineries, food places and historical townships) just out of Angaston, the room is very private and open space with a cool layout looking out to the valley view.   The room offers everything you need and more.  If you are looking for a classy escape, this is your place with very friendly hosts.  Thank you again, Samuel & Mel.
Exceeded our expectations. We enjoyed everything about our stay. The premises, the location and the hosts were exactly what we were after. Thankyou so much.

We had a great time at the Barn. It was peaceful and beautiful and exactly what we wanted. Close to Angaston and Tanunda which had lots of good and drink options, not to mention a winery on every corner! Carolyn and William were great hosts and gave us lots of tips for the area. Would definitely recommend the Barn!

Carolyn and William were amazing hosts! The Barn was absolutely lovely and beautifully fitted out. The bed was very comfortable and the amenities were great. It was lovely to sit out on the private deck and look up at the stars. Despite the heatwave while we were staying, the Barn was very cool with AC and a fan. It was also great to have a dip in the pool. The bathroom is very close and no issue to get to. There were lots of brochures and guides in the room for guests and Carolyn kindly gave us some personal recommendations, all of which we loved! The location was great for getting around the Barossa. We were really impressed with the whole experience and will definitely be back the next time we come to the Barossa.
Outstanding hospitality, property and accomodation. Would highly recommend staying here :)
Amazing and beautiful place, very comfy and well located, had a great time! Definitely recommend to anyone staying in the Barossa region

This was hands down the most beautiful Airbnb I have ever stayed at. The barn is incredible, the views amazing and Carolyn’s hospitality and recommendations for exploring the area were amazing. I’m counting the days until I can come back!

Honestly amazing! Couldn’t recommend staying here more.
Carolyn and William have thought of everything. So beautifully styled throughout and the location is just perfect.
Carolyn also provided us with wonderful suggestions for dinner and breakfast that we are so glad to have tried. The perfect weekend in the Barossa made so by having such a wonderful place to come back to. Thanks so much again :-)
Awesome stay

My husband and I had a wonderful weekend at The Barn. The room was beautiful, with lots of thoughtful touches and a very comfy bed. We loved our stay there, especially sitting by the pool in the afternoon with a glass of rose. Highly recommend and we’ll be back!
Amazing place with a lot of character. Very comfortable and stylish room
A perfectly located and luxurious sleep with everything the Barossa has to offer at your door. Enjoy the calm view before you start a day of great food, wine and wandering.
Amazing location near angaston, views of surrounding farmland and rolling hills. Stylish space and great hosts, would stay again.

The Barn is exactly as described and a lovely place to stay. Everything was immaculately clean and stylishly decorated. The facilities were great, very modern and clean. Carolyn and her partner are lovely hosts and it was a pleasure meeting them both. The night sky is outstanding in Penrice, you can see so much detail in the Milky Way. We enjoyed the local visitors too including a kangaroo, kookaburra and watching the neighboring sheep. Thanks for a relaxing stay!
My partner and I loved our stay at Carolyn's place. It was the perfect weekend escape and we loved all of the local tips Carolyn and William provided. We will be back!

This little barn is beautifully finished with thoughtful touches. The French doors lead to a private deck that overlooks the rolling hills and perfect for your morning coffee. This barn has all the amenities that you’ll need. The host provided great local tips
We had a lovely time. The Barn was warm, great views and the bed was so comfortable.
Beautiful property and house that has everything you need included. Bathroom was lovely as well and very close to the house! Great hospitality and stay overall!
Awesome experience and stay. Nice and quiet, welcoming and amazing views at both day and night, highly recommended

Really nice to be just out of town with a proper country feel. The concept of building a small village is excellent and this building is a great part of it and really well done. Lovely little place for the middle of winter and a short cab ride from the nearest town. Perfect  central point for a Barossa stay.

We loved our stay here - very cosy. It was cold and rainy during our stay which made the trek to the separate bathroom a little bit tricky, but the room itself was so lovely that it more than made up for it. We would definitely stay here again!

The photos of the Barn did not do justice to the space (I mean that in the best way possible)! It is absolutely stunning, loved that there was coffee beans and tea, the gigantic bed with heated blanket, the cordless charging ports was a special touch, the deck and outdoor space was perfect for our brunch with food from the Farmers Market. The bathroom and kitchenette was only a short walk along the pavement/deck. We had already planned out the weekend for my partners birthday, however if your stuck for ideas Carolyn was more then happy to offer local ideas and there was plenty of magazines, brochures and a home made guide book to the local area in the barn. I would absolutely recommend this place to any couple looking to get away to the Barossa.
Great Little Spot, good value for money.

Very clean, great facilities and a beautiful room! Some really nice thoughtful touches that really does make a difference. The toilet and shower is seperate to the room however still private and not really an issue! Definitely recommend when staying in the Barossa.
The Barn was all we hoped for, the bed was enormous
A great experience :)

Fantastic place to stay! The place was clean, comfortable, and had plenty of extra little bonuses such as wireless charges for phones, Bluetooth speaker, and lots of tea/coffee options. For anyone staying who is worried about having a bathroom separate to the main building, it is a VERY short distance away and was not an issue at all. Bathroom was clean and tidy, and had a fantastic shower with a rain shower head! 5 minutes drive from the main town Angeston and 10minutes to a heap of great wineries, we had a fantastic time and highly recommend this place as somewhere to stay!
Beautiful spot to relax and forget your worries...will be back!
Lovely place would recommend
Fantastic little place for a weekend getaway!
Fantastic relaxing place to stay. Very peaceful and had everything you need to unwind. Great location and not too far from anything

This place is one of the best we’ve ever stayed at. The photos really don’t do it justice; we were in awe constantly with the beautiful property. Not to mention Carolyn’s amazing hospitality too; it was the perfect stay! Will definitely be back ☺️

Beautiful space in a lovely setting in the Barossa region. The room is so comfy and beautifully styled and has everything you need. There are terraces for sitting outside the room and a covered living room space next to it where we sat with a cup of tea in the morning looking across the garden. The bathroom really is a short little hop from the room and is beautifully done with a great shower.  Carolyn is a great host, quick to communicate and gave us good tips for the area. We only stayed one night but would definitely return next time we’re in the Barossa!
Lovely little place for a quick stop over on our way to the Flinders Rangers

Such an amazing weekend away. The most gorgeous cottage, so private. The separate bathroom is not a problem. The bed is huge and I miss it!!! Carolyn is a great host and very helpful with recommendations. STAY HERE!

A truly beautiful barn - the space was characteristic & cosy :) Not to mention, amazing views, especially from the loo ;) Carolyn was such a welcoming, easy going and helpful host!
My Mum was in awe of the assortment of tea provided & we both very much enjoyed the recommendation for our lunch outing! Oh & the attention to detail exceeded our expectations; from an umbrella by the door for when it drizzled and beautiful flowers around the place, everything had been thought of ! We definitely hope to visit again someday :)
Great location, great communication, would recommend to others visiting the Barossa region.

This is why AirBnb exists! The Barn was so comfortable and made our trip to the Barossa. The bed was huge and the heater / air con unit meant it was so cozy. It was well kitted out and beautifully designed. It was just so unique and we spent half our time eating cheese and drinking wine on the decking. We didn’t know what to expect from the outside bathroom but it only added to the experience. Getting a good look at the starry sky made it all worthwhile! Thanks to Will and Carolyn for being exceptional hosts.

Loved our two nights at ‘The Barn’, definitely worth more than a night to soak up the country amosphere. Not only is the sleeping accomodation charming and wonderfully inviting, that huge billowy bed requiring the obligatory lay in, but the cosy but spacious sitting and cooking area ‘the pug house’ is delightful to while away a comfy hour or three with a book or bottle of local wine. There are numerous dining in and take away food places open till quite late within a 10minute drive but the pug house was so inviting we shopped at the local iga and cooked a full meal both nights with the adequate facilities and soaked up the twinkling candlelit ambience. If you love to get away from it all yet have everything at your fingertips Carolyn’s is that spot. Highly recommend. Ps, the night visit to the luxury loo is a starlit wonder to behold if you don’t see the heavens often.

The Barn literally has it all!!!!not only that it is very stylish and worth every cent!!! William and Carolyn were great hosts, so helpful and offered some great tips on where to go in the Barossa.
A must stay!!!
Beautiful, comfortable and thoughtfully decorated/designed - thank you we loved it
Carolyn's place is great! Rustic with a sense of luxury and comfort. Carolyn has thought of everything to make the stay as welcoming as possible. Great place to stay when in the Barossa :)
A fantastic stay, extremely comfortable with a beautiful view. We loved it and hope to be back one day soon!

I stayed at Carols Airbnb for 2 nights & the space Carol & her husband have created is perfect for a country escape or if your looking for affordable accommodation near the Barossa.
The king size bed was super comfy, the cottage & the seperate bathroom was super clean & although the toilet & shower are seperate from the cottage it was not an issue & literally just a few steps away.
The private decking area attached to the cottage is a great peaceful space to have your coffee in the morning, a glass of wine in the evening or just to sit, relax & read a book. There was a big electrical storm one of the nights of my stay in which the power was out for a few hours & Carol was quick to make sure I was ok & to see if I needed anything. Comforting considering I was staying there on my own. Thanks so much for your great hospitality Carol 😃

The Barn far exceeded our expectations. Carolyn met us on arrival and gave us a brief tour of the space before leaving us to relax. The bed was incredibly comfortable and we spent some time enjoying the sun and drinking wine on the outdoor patio.

Carolyn and her partner were kind enough to lend us their barbecue to make dinner one evening, and always made sure we had everything we needed. Absolutely one of our favorite AirBnb locations we have ever stayed in. We couldn't recommend this enough! Thank you again Carolyn.
the barn is a lovely place to stay for peace and quiet! very earthy and pretty!

Carolyn has done a beautiful job decorating the small stone barn, the king size bed was very comfortable, the location is so quiet at night, stunning night sky to view the stars. We enjoyed having aircon, a ceiling fan, smart TV and a space to prepare simple meals. Carolyn was a great host with prompt communication.

Very luxurious and relaxing spot within easy reach of everything in the Barossa Valley. Really well appointed and tastefully decorated. You don't want for anything here except a nice bottle of local wine to enjoy on the back deck. William and Carolyn are great helpful hosts.
Quirky, quiet, comfortable and  very close to Angaston yet great 'bush' feel

Wow wow and wow!
I’m not really one to write reviews but this little gem really is something else.
We absolutely loved our two night stay in the barn. Carolyn has thought of everything.
Exactly as described and even better than the pics.
The most beautiful and comfortable big bed, seperate cooking/dining area if you wish although the beautiful little town of Angaston is only a 5 minute drive. We came for a weekend from Sydney and I just want to do it all again 💛
Very relaxing, awesome stay.  Great hosts. Highly recommended.  👍

Incredible accommodation, and the best Airbnb experience I've had. Carolyn and William have done an amazing job restoring the historic buildings, the photos dont do it justice.
You can simply arrive without having done any research or planning as they have included a fantastic guide to the wineries, food, tours and experiences you can do in the region. I had spent a lot of time looking into what to do beforehand and picking up their guide was much easier than searching through multiple websites.
Can't recommend this place enough, we'll be back for sure!

Great place to stay while experiencing the Barossa! Very comfortable stay with beautiful outdoor areas to relax in. The barn was charming, cosy and the decor had clearly received a lot of attention to detail. Still had all the modern facilities - pretty reliable wifi, smart TV, streaming services, a portable Bluetooth speaker, A/C and a massive, comfortable bed. The back deck and outdoor couch were quite private.

Toilet and shower were a short (and well lit) walk along the deck and were both modern and clean. Access to the pool was great during our summer stay. Carolyn and William were very hospitable and up for a chat, but certainly not overbearing. Definitely would recommend.

Delightful place in Penrice, barely removed from Angaston and Tanunda. Picturesque, cosy, so many thoughtful touches. Beautiful to look out onto the hills during the day and stars at night. Had we stayed longer we could have had a go at the pool and barbecue. Would highly recommend this to couples looking for a romantic getaway.
Thank you very much for the lovely stay, tips and most importantly the good humour. Could not recommend the barn more highly!

We had an excellent stay at The Barn and would highly recommend it. Every convenience has been thought of and attended to. The decor is beautiful, and there are a number of luxury touches: huge king sized bed, wireless phone chargers, chrome cast, Netflix and Stan, private deck in addition to the pool and bbq areas. It was really outstanding 🌻
Beautiful little barn - lots of lovely little touches and really close to the centre of town. It was one of the hottest weekends we've had all summer and we were super comfortable. Thankyou!
A lovely little getaway with everything you need. Beautiful location and a stylish stay. Hosts were lovely and very accommodating. Definitely recommend.
Cute and cosy. Comfortable space. Great location.
lovely barossa rural space. I wanted to show my partner a rural space and this was perfect. beautiful room, lovely pool and space outside to look at the stars!

Charming accommodation.  Definitely recommend staying if you are looking for a unique experience as the bathroom is a very short distance from your room. Great for star gazing. Everything was clean and tidy with attention to the small details. We loved the the super sized king bed which was extremely comfortable. Carolyn and William were great hosts and we enjoyed watching their playful puppy and kitten playing together much like the movie “Milo and Otis”.

Highly recommended, friendly and gracious host. You will love the effort the host have put into the decor, and the little thoughtful touches dotted around the place. The rear deck is perfect for star gazing. This place has charm by the bucket loads. Don’t forget to ask the Carolyn & Mike for dining recommendations.

I was excited to stay here because it seemed interesting and looked beautiful, but it was honestly even better than I expected. Most comfortable bed ever, and I loved sitting on the deck with a wine, watching a kookaburra hop about nearby. Carolyn was very welcoming and friendly, and gave us a great suggestion for a bushwalk when she found out that's what we wanted to do. Would love to stay again.
A perfect place to stay if you're visiting the Barossa. It is a good space in a nice location with great hosts.

We had a great stay, Carolyn and William were great hosts and the barn was perfect.
