Michael and his staff provide a warm and inviting environment in which he happily shares his knowledge of sustainable farm living. The local produce provided is straight from paddock to plate, offering a great opportunity to enjoy the most delicious food in the area. The cottage itself is neat, tidy and tucked away to provide a relaxing connection to the country, with all the amenities expected in a fancy hotel. We were greeted by the most loving ‘red dog’ who visited us every so often just to check in on our stay. We will definitely be back in the future!

We loved our four day stay over Easter 2021. The accommodation is lovely and the whole experience of staying on a farm was very special. We loved seeing the animals and the peaceful country atmosphere was so relaxing. The food Michael provided from the farm was delicious; freshest eggs ever and the butter was outstanding! We also loved using the barbecue to cook fresh sausages and enjoy sunset over the paddocks.
Thanks Michael for a delightful stay! Highly recommended to prospective guests!
Amazing hospitality and stay! Sad we didn’t stay longer. Thank you Michael and your farm family!
Michael was a prompt, friendly and accommodating host. The farm was a refreshing place for our honeymoon! Great place to enjoy the Barossa and wider Adelaide region.

It can be an interactive experience if you wish it to be. Michael was very accommodating and showed us around his farm. It’s more than just a farm too! The place is unique and comfortable and located in a nice spot in the Barossa. You won’t be disappointed.
A beautiful Airbnb and a wonderful experience!

My review will look like the first review of Dairyman’s Cottage on Airbnb but lots of reviews on (Website hidden by Airbnb) which was very helpful.
Like most reviews we found the breakfast provisions outstanding and was really the highlight of our stay.
From Michael’s farm fresh to us, we had fresh eggs, pasteurised butter milk, fantastic farm butter, sliced leg ham, cured prosciutto, bacon, pork sausages. We also had locally produced camembert, fantastic bread by local baker Eleni (Website hidden by Airbnb) breakfast oats, dried fruit, nuts and dark chocolate on the table when we arrived. What a bounty.

We picked the 2 bedroom cottage - ideal for 2 couples with 2 bedrooms with QB each with modern ensuites. The beds and pillows were very comfortable.

It is located in the heart of the Barossa with tons of great wineries within a 30 minute drive. The Barossa Farmer’s Market about 30 minutes away is very worthwhile visiting with high quality produce including Dairyman’s Barossa produce on show and Eleni’s bakery (the croissant was very buttery and delicious too). The Market is only open Saturday mornings 7.30am to 11.30am. We bought lots of cheeses, preserves, dried fruit - great gifts to take home.

It was our first farm stay and we had a great experience. We watched Charly milk the cows, Michael feed the pigs- free range heritage pigs - were fed milk and oats. 3 of the chickens would roost near our cottage and Charly would find eggs around the milking shed. Ruby the dog was a friendly addition. Thank Michael. You’re an excellent responsive host!
Wonderful hospitality
Amazing! Loved the pigs and cows. Michael was awesome.

My family of 4 stayed in the Dairyman's cottage which is a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom self-contained cottage. Michael was so accommodating and gave us produce from the farm on arrival which was absolutely delicious!   Thanks for a little insight into your country life, for showing us around the farm and letting us help with the animals.  Great farm stay experience that we will visit again.  Will likely see you at the Adelaide farmers market in the near future so we can pick up some more yummy produce!
Wonderful farm weekend in the Barossa. The accommodation (and breakfast provisions..!) were outstanding!
Michael was so lovely, he helped to make our stay very special. We enjoyed the animals and walks around the farm. The accommodation was very good. We can't wait to stay again soon.

This is a fantastic getaway in the Barossa. The accommodation is comfortable, spotless and with many thoughtful touches! The location on a working dairy farm amongst vineyards is interesting and with the added benefits of fresh eggs, butter, milk, bacon and more! The Barossa and Eden Valleys are on your doorstep, with many excellent wineries and restaurants within a short drive. We also explored the Hale Conservation Park and the Little Kaiserstuhl Walking Track. Highly recommend.

What an absolute gem. From the delicious farm produce, super comfy beds, luxurious bed linen.....Michael has thought of everything. Wandering the farm, watching cows being milked and piglets fed and a stroll through the vines....every sense tells you you have escaped the city. A weekend Sydney getaway that will leave you feeling refreshed yet still relaxed. Treat yourself and book into the Dairyman’s Cottage.
If we could, we'd give Michael a 6/5 for hospitality! He's an amazing person, and his farm is a welcome change from the hustle and bustle of city life.

This place was everything we had hoped for.
In the middle of the Barossa Valley, but in the middle of rolling hills, quiet and peaceful, you will find this beautiful working farm, with Pigs, Cows, horses and Chickens.
Michael was very welcoming, and always made sure we had everything we needed, we loved how easy going this farm was, we went with out 22 month old, and he could run around freely searching for Ruby (the dog), feeding the pigs and watching the cows get milked.
We really appreciated the breakfast provisions, fresh from the farm. The bacon is the best we've had in Australia
We will definitely be back.
We searched high and low for a working farm stay, i would highly recommend this farm.

My husband and our two daughters (4 and 1 years of age) stayed at Michael’s Airbnb. We had a fabulous time exploring the farm and also, the neighbouring Barossa Valley. The Airbnb itself had everything we needed and much more. Michael was warm and welcoming and we really appreciated his hospitality.

Michael was a very busy on the weekend we stayed, however he took time out to show my hubbie around the farm. The cows where great, and Ruby was very welcoming even calling by to say hi on Sunday morning. Michaels, butter, ham and bacon were delish, YUM. Would recommend a stay.  It was just what we needed.

This was the best Airbnb we have ever stayed at. Michael was so welcoming and took time to show us the animals including a brand new calf that was born while we were there! The provisions included were incredible. Our 1yo and 4yo daughters had the best time and didn’t want to leave. Beautiful location and perfectly equipped cottage we loved our stay so much.
Michael was lovely in taking us around the farm and catering to our needs. Would definitely recommend

We had a wonderful stay at Michael’s picturesque property. It was delightful to be around the farm animals. Michael was such a welcoming host. We highly recommend this stay and would definitely return.

Had a wonderful trip to Michael’s over the NY period with friends and our x2 18 month olds. Michael was incredibly hospitable, the cottage was immaculate and the outdoor area plus the farm were amazing. We all had a lovely time and can’t wait to go back.
The fresh farm produce and visits from beautiful Ruby put the icing on the cake.

Nelly’s place is amazing everything and more is there everything is brand new.
Highly recommend would defiantly stay again.

And Nelly’s hospitality is also excellent.
Fantastic experience
An outstanding place to stay, highly recommend as truely beautiful location with Nelly as the perfect host. We are definitely staying here again.

Nelly was a lovely host and responded straight away. When we arrived the instructions were super easy and we located the place with ease.
The villa itself was beautiful, with lovely linen and a stunning bathroom with an excellent spa bath.
The view was spectacular and sitting out on the little deck with the local wine and cheese we collected during the day was a perfect end to the day.
Amazing photo opportunities and it is so private.
If you need help Nelly is happy to help but on the other hand if you like your privacy he is more than respectful of this.
Would definitely recommend staying here. Perfect for a romantic couples get away and some quiet time.

Nelly and Guido, thank you so much for the amazing opportunity to stay in your spectacular accommodation.

Your stays were exactly what we need when visiting the Barossa for our friends wedding.

Conveniently located at the start of the Barossa Valley trail, close to everything and the overall easy of getting to and from your place was so great.

The amenities and presentation of the accommodation was perfect, my partner and I can’t complain about a thing, you have certainly thought of everything; from superb linen to dual shower and a spa all overlooking the gorgeous vineyard.

Ultimately congratulations on such an amazing stay. We will be highly recommending your stay to friends and family when they visit.

We were on our honeymoon and had an Absolutely gorgeous stay.  Great amenities, friendly hosts.  Highly recommend grabbing a bottle and enjoying the sunset Vista from the gazebo.  Would absolutely stay again.
Great stay in the middle of a vineyard. Quiet location with great amenities, had a great stay and would definitely recommend this property.
Amazing house and views! Super clean and stylish and the owner was super nice. Really enjoyed my stay 😊
Nelly’s place was just stunning. Super clean, fantastic amenities and beautiful extra touches, luxurious towels, bath salts etc. would highly recommended and would definitely stay again.
Way beyond what we expected! So clean and amazing ammenities. Will be staying again!

Perfekt ausgestattete Villa mitten im Weingut. Auf der eigenen Terrasse, umgeben von Rebstöcken, lässt sich am Abend wunderbar ein Glas Wein geniessen. Die insgesamt drei Villen sind sehr ruhig, abseits der Strasse gelegen. Sehr zu empfehlen.
BEAUTIFUL PLACE, very organised, clean and friendly
The place was gorgeous with amazing views! Nelly and Guido are lovely hosts.

Great place and location. Lots of really nice touches. Sitting on the porch with a wine overlooking the vineyard at sunset - magical. Spectacular sunrises too with native wildlife incl kangaroos outside you door. Hosts are great and very communicative. Everything was perfect on our extended weekend stay. Highly recommend.
A very nice, warm, spacious place and affordable accommodation in the Barossa.

Clean, modern, very large space. in a rural environment. Air con for comfort. best coffee and tea supplied and easy to keep clean. Steve and his wife are very accommodating so you will feel like part of the family. We were very comfortable and will return. thanks Steve

Beautiful hosts, we were made to feel welcome and looked after from the very start. Great central location, lovely  view of the hills and vineyard. Very large, spacious and very comfortable unit, the little touches made the place feel special. Highly recommend! We will definitely be coming back :).

We really enjoyed our stay! Place was super clean and space was much bigger than we thought. We will be recommending your place to anybody who’s heading to Barossa for a stay! Nice central local so we where able to pop out and in easily for our sons midday sleeps. Also those dips where delicious! Thanks again Steve you’ve got a great place! My tip to travelers: Don’t think twice about booking this place, just book, it’s way too cheap for what you get!
Spacious place near Tanunda with a lovely outlook over vineyards.

A stunning view and an extremely comfortable living space. Everything needed was provided for...and extra! Beautifully couple who even gave us a lift to the wedding in town. Would thoroughly recommend staying here!
What a really hospitable couple - perfect space if you want somewhere to stick your head down at night after exploring the great Barossa.

A huge living area overlooking a lovely vineyard. It was very clean and comfortable (especially with 2 young boys!)
Very close to tanunda and its facilities.
Their beetroot spread (homemade) is delicious!
Would absolutely recommend the stay.

Steve has converted this space into a roomy warehouse style apartment which is great to stay in. The bathroom and kitchen are fantastic with everything you need and the living and sleeping areas are very comfortable. The rural outlook is lovely and peaceful and you are just two minutes from the main street of Tanunda. You may even get to sample Steve's yummy gourmet products ! Recommended.
Clean, tidy and great for a short stay in the Barossa. Very friendly and helpful hosts.
Perfect place to crash after visiting local wineries, plenty of room and a beautiful view.
Very nice!

Amazing value for money and genuine care and attention to detail. Steve has thought of all the little things to make you feel comfortable and it is so nice to have space and amenities to be self-sufficient when you have a family. The pictures online do not do Steve’s place justice, highly recommended!

Steve was very responsive in communications leading up to our stay. The instructions on how to enter the house were clear and we had no issues. The space is very large and with a big kitchen and lounge area, and Steve arranged for the futon to be made up into an extra bed for us while we were out at a wedding nearby. We didn’t get to explore the farm but the views here are lovely.

Zimmys place was large and had great facilities close to everything and as part of a farm stay.
Great for a family of four.
Nice place to stay at Barossa
Great place. Well equipped and very spacious! We stayed in very hot weather but it was a nice comfortable temperature inside even without the AC on. Really enjoyed our stay.
What a wonderful stay, beautiful view of the vine yard and the Barossa hills.

Steve’s place is awesome, and has a few amazing touches not listed such as a massage chair, and Steve’s AMAZING condiments and relishes to try (and buy if you so choose).

The place was open and airy, very clean and had everything we could ask for. Steve was available if we needed him, but wasn’t in your way at all.

Highly recommended Steve’s house as a base for a tour of the Barossa / Eden Valley.
Steve’s place is at the foothills of Menglers Hill and within proximity to Tanunda town. The place is spacious and full of surprises. We truely enjoyed our stay at Steve’s home.
Steve’s B&B was amazing, we had a fantastic time and what a view to top it all off! Incredible local produce made on the premises. Such an amazing area and highly recommended B&B for fantastic value.

We loved our stay here. Steve was very welcoming, as we managed to bump in to him as we were checking in. Excellent location, as super close to Tununda, very quiet with picturesque views over the vineyards (also great stargazing out the back!),  and the flat was spacious and clean. Great base for Barossa adventures!

Steve's place is clean, spacious, the bed is comfortable and there are some great mountain views. The distance from the town centre is perfect and the hosts are very welcoming but not in your face. My only criticism would be that, as this is a home based condiments production business, there is some early morning noise from vehicles etc. which may annoy those who are not early risers.
Fantastic. Very spacious, beautiful views and check-in was a breeze. Thanks Steve.
Great stay at Steve’s place. Location so central to wonderful wineries and the view was great!
Sparkling Clean, great location wish we could have stayed longer.
Excellent location and great place to stay. Highly recommended.
Very spacious and clean. Excellent facilities. Lovely welcome from Steve and his cats.
Great place to stay in a reasonable price. Very clean and offer different amenities as well.
The accommodation  was  as  expected. It was  very  comfortable. The location was excellent  for amateur radio with lack of city noise. Really good place to relax.

We stayed at Steve’s place for 3 nights. The accommodation was good value for money especially for a family or close friends. Very roomy and comfortable. It is more of a home industry stay than a farm stay though and is situated close to a freight route so there was some traffic noise. Close to lots of wineries and a great cycling area. Steve allowed us a late checkout which was appreciated.
Quality!
Steve’s apartment is very nice, spacious, clean, and has everything you need for a comfortable stay. The kitchen is well equipped. We highly recommend this place.
Great place to stay.  Everything provided.  Comfy bed. Lovely views...  what more could you ask for.
We are grateful for your hospitality. so far our best accommodation. central in the wine district

Lovely stay at Steve’s place, warm and a beautiful view to wake up to, would highly remembered!
Oh and great products from their farm to purchase, the best beef jerky and pickle spread I have ever tasted!!

Good value, good location, large space.

Beautiful location and lovely pet cat might come say hi in the yard.

Nice rainwater for drinking, comfy beds, good heating/aircon.
Fantastic hosts and amazing stay. Really enjoyed it.
Great location, clean and with excellent wifi, excellent value and I look forward to staying again

Exquisite hard stand parking for vehicle - trailer unit. Keep traveling assets safely off the road.
Warm inside on arrival..
Cannot fault.
Large premise, lovely view of valley. Within walking distance to town centre and a winery.

The accommodation is really a converted shed. Spacious and comfortable. Good heating and aircon. Nice outlook over vineyards and hills. Handy for touring Barossa Valley and Eden Vale vineyards and eateries.
Nice getaway space, friendly hosts and lovely area to explore. Highly recommend.
Clean, spacious and conveniently located. Pleasure to stay.

Steve and Janine hospitality was outstanding. The location is absolutely perfect if you want to stay in the heart of Barossa and easily reach everything around in less than 20 minutes. Nights were starry and quiet while we were sipping a glass of wine, tastings Zimmy's treats, admiring vineyards from our window. The accommodation was clean and neat and even more spacious than the pictures were showing. We took advantage of the kitchen that was well equipped.  Highly recommended.

My husband and I stayed at Karina’s for a weekend getaway. It was lovely, close to the centre of Tanunda and easily accessible to all the highlights of the Barossa Valley. The extra touches of fresh milk, the very generous continental breakfast and the cheese and wine were really appreciated.  The enclosed private garden is a gorgeous place to sit in the morning or afternoon with the established garden. While the studio apartment is located on the same ground as the owners residential property it still felt private. Thanks Karina!

We stayed the weekend on a Birthday trip to explore the Barossa Valley vineyards. We were able to check in early and start exploring which was amazing. The house was beautifully presented, immaculately clean and a lovely welcome note with beautiful platter, wine (which you could also buy more of), dried meats and cheese ready for us on arrival. Lovely breakfast and room amenities were all top notch. Very comfortable bed to top it all off. We will be back!
Cute little place with a few extra thoughtful touches.
Clean, Tidy, great hospitality, loved every minute of it Thankyou
Great studio space in an excellent location. Very comfortable and quiet. Wine and snacks on arrival was a nice touch! Clear communication from Karina and everything was as described. Thanks Karina!
Lovely green outdoors, all the thoughtful touches
Great host very clean property. Cute little bed and breakfast.
A tremendous location to access the Barossa. The space was perfect and the welcome cheese board and bottle of wine just top it off. Will 100% stay again.

The unit was clean and cosy. There were lots of thoughtful touches such as a lovely cheese board, wine and breakfast fixings. The private courtyard was the perfect place to sit and enjoy the stars with a glass of wine. Thank you so much for a wonderful mini stay.

A great little place to spend a few days exploring the Barossa region. The bottle of wine and local produce platter on arrival were a great treat. It’s a little bit further from the centre of town, but it’s in a quiet and private location.
Great location. Central to all wineries. Great hosts. Very clean and private. Had a great stay.
Lovely studio unit in a handy location, well equipped and  comfortable. Our very thoughtful hosts, provided a complementary bottle of wine and many other local treats. Very happy to recommend.

My stay at Fechner Place was just perfect!  The guest house was big and relaxing, the bed comfortable and the courtyard was so pretty...a perfect place to enjoy the complimentary bottle of wine and cheese platter which was my favourite part!  The continental breakfast was delicious and I enjoyed every part of my stay.  I also got to meet the hosts by chance when I was checking out and they were friendly, kind and thoughtful.  Would definitely recommend and I would stay here again.  The accommodation is walking distance to the Main Street and to some of the wineries.
Awesome place. Very private. Great location.
Lovely hosts, convenient location

We absolutely adored this beautiful bnb, it had everything you could possibly ask for. It was immaculately clean, in the perfect location and was very stylish. We were treated to a beautiful platter on arrival with delicious cheeses, meats etc as well as a lovely bottle of wine. Check in was a breeze and Karina was very speedy in replying to messages, giving recommendations when we asked where we should have lunch. The bnb had its own private courtyard and while it was a little chilly for us to enjoy it, it would be lovely to enjoy once the weather warms up. We were pleasantly surprised by the selection of breakfast items that were available for us to enjoy, as well as fresh fruit and bread and homemade biscuits and jam. We would highly recommend this to anyone looking to get away for a couple of days, next time we would love to stay for even longer! Thank you for providing the perfect air bnb service, we would love to visit again someday soon.
Great place to stay, very clean and everything we needed was there. Very modern and stylish accommodation in a quiet location.

It was a bitterly cold day when we arrived and were pleasantly surprised to find they had turned the heater on for our arrival. The place was small and cosy but had ample room and storage for clothes.
The location was prefect, a little off the beaten track but still close enough to walk to local restaurants and wineries. Must add a little shout out to Langmeil Winery both staff and wines were amazing and only a 10 minute walk. If you decide to drive try

A lovely quiet studio apartment in the outskirts of Tanunda with good sized bathroom and all you need for a night or two away from home. Clean, warm and comfortable for our wet and wintery stay. The platter and wine were a nice added extra.

We absolutely loved our weekend away. Sparking clean and everything we had hoped for. The wine and cheese upon arrival was above and beyond. Very nice personal touches. Just a short walk from wineries and the town centre. We would happily stay again!

What a lovely Airbnb! Private, comfortable and lots of beautiful extra touches that made us feel special. Sat enjoying the delicious cheese board with a glass of wine in the private courtyard . Many thanks

A great bnb - beautifully decorated, clean and comfortable. The supplies were very generous and the bottle of wine was a lovely touch. Already booking our next visit
- Excellent hosts!
A very charming, value for money, studio. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and the thoughtful and personable touches that were made for us as guests. Thank you-we will be back.

Ann and Chris were wonderful hosts. We really appreciated all the local information and flyers available to us and I loved the flowers in the bathroom - a beautiful personal touch.  The space was cosy and comfortable. Everything was spotless and very welcoming and the courtyard garden was a mini paradise.  The birdlife in the mornings made my heart sing.  It didn't bother us that we weren't super close to the main road - the Barossa needs to be seen by car anyway so wasn't a problem at all. Would highly recommend this lovely studio.
Great place very clean and a lot of thought went into making it comfortable for guests.
Very cute! Perfect for a quick overnight stay and great value for money. Recommend
Lovely place to stay
This is our second stay in this lovely home. Very cosy and stylish with everything you could need. Can't wait to come back!
Beautiful accommodation - clean, quiet, with very comfortable bed and wonderful patio. Generous provisions. Very relaxing stay, and would readily return.

We were so fortunate to choose Fechner Place in the Barossa Valley to stay whilst exploring the area for my birthday 🎉 Everything was exactly as shown on the website but the experience was way more!!! Little touches like the grazing platter as you arrive and your choice of a delicious bottle of red or white wine from the region made all the difference. The little bunch of flowers 🌸 in the bathroom also made us smile 😊 The studio was beautifully clean with a lovely outdoor garden area to sit and enjoy the wine and food platter 🍷🍷🍷 As for the location, that was perfect too, as we were close to amazing restaurants as well as just a short drive to all the surrounding vineyards and local attractions like Maggie Beer’s Farm Shop. Thanks again for being our wonderful hosts 🙏
Great private space that is a generous size and short walking distance from town
Absolutely gorgeous place with all you need for a weekend getaway, lovely little courtyard to relax in, great location to explore, very close to restaurants and wineries.

My wife and I stayed here for a few nights and it was absolutely fantastic. Short walk to restaurants and cafes, short walk to amazing wineries. It was perfect.

The room was quiet, comfortable and spacious. The hosts went above and beyond to look after us, we will definitely stay again when we’re back in the Barossa.
Karina's place is exceptionally clean and within a 20 min walk into Tanunda.  The thoughtful touches of wine, a platter of nibbles and biscuits were a lovely surprise.  A fantastic place to stay.
Lovely stay! Close to some fantastic wineries too

Karinas place was the perfect place to stay while touring the Barossa. The little thoughtful touches such as a personalised card to welcome us, a complimentary wine and a platter to enjoy made it that little bit more enjoyable. Would definitely stay here again.
A lovely, clean and cozy studio in the perfect location for exploring the Barossa. Highly recommend.

Such a stylish well thought-out studio. Best sleep I’ve had in ages, great linen and many special touches including flowers. The welcome platter with local products and chilled bottle of white were greatly appreciated and enjoyed. Communication from the host was outstanding and the welcome note and guest booklet to the point and an easy go to reference. Breakfast provisions were generous and yummy and morning coffee in the private courtyard/garden stunning - added enormously to the scope of the space. Ice in the freezer was a big plus.  Will be highly recommending to friends and family. Already planning my return visit.
Beautiful guest house, we loved the complimentary cheese platter and wine we enjoyed in the courtyard. Very close to wineries and restaurants. Will definitely book next time we come back
We had a wonderful stay here. Bottle of wine and cheese board on arrival was lovely. Would happily stay again 🙂

Great location, comfy, clean and well appointed. We really enjoyed the quiet location with the private courtyard. A bottle of lovely wine and a platter made us welcome and relaxed. Very thoughtful, everything provided, couldn’t ask for more. Definitely will stay again.

Simply can't recommend this place more highly!!
We had a wonderful time here. Walking distance to the main restaurant/bar/cafe area in Tanunda, beautiful space to return to after a day of visiting wineries.
Arriving to nibbles and wine was just such a lovely touch after a long drive and the bed feels like you're sleeping in a cloud. Can't wait to return soon!

Thankyou so much for a great stay. A beautiful studio with everything that you will ever need.
Not only was the accommodation spotless and comfortable but all the little touches such as continental breakfast, cheese platter and wine were a lovely surprise.
If you are looking for a perfect little spot for your Barossa base then don't miss this gem.

Great stay at Karina’s place in Tanunda, after tossing up the Novatel o (Website hidden by Airbnb) we made the right decision.  Spotless and comfortable, amazing surprises on arrival that I won’t spoil, a short stroll to Langmeil, Peter Lehmann’s and the best bakery around, a little further into the town centre and a great selection of restaurants, parked our car for the whole stay.  We will be back 3 nights was not enough Thankyou for your hospitality Karina, Chris & Ann be sure to stay with these local legends 👍

thank you for having us. we had an amazing time. value for money was fantastic. Chris and Ann are so accommodating. Chris went out of his way to help us get our wine posted from SA to NSW. we will definitely be back and recommending to others!! cannot recommend enough
Nice, relaxing and super clean getaway
Can't fault anything at all. Super clean, lovely linen and fluffy towels, welcome cheese platter and wine, good shower, amazing communication. 12/10 would stay again
We had a fabulous time at karinas place! All of the breakfast food, cheese platter and wine they left us was such a beautiful touch that made our stay in the Barossa that much better! Thank you
Great stay!! Cute cosy studio, thoughtful touches, everything you might need is provided 😊

A great spacious studio apartment with a lovely garden and generous hosts who provided a bottle of wine and a delicious  breakfast. Within walking distance of the main Street of Tanunda and some wineries (David Franz etc). Good location to use as a base to explore the Barossa. Really enjoyed our time here.

It was a lovely stay. Easy parking and cozy space with all the essentials & more provided. We also greatly appreciated the personal touches such as our names on the welcome card, complimentary wine produced by the hosts themselves, and a cheeseboard. Thank you for the Barossan Hospitality!

A great place to stay while in the Barossa. The studio has everything you need and was spotlessly clean. Extra touches of wine and platter of local produce made it so welcoming and there is a lovely little courtyard to sit out in and enjoy your morning coffee. It’s close to great wineries and restaurants, we’ll definitely be back and highly recommend for a weekend getaway.
Great little base for wine touring in the Barossa, everything we needed and city place to rest after a few long days out. Only improvement would be wifi but we did fine without!
We had a great stay. We loved the comfy bed and soft towels. The antipasto platter was perfect after a day of travelling.
Very comfortable and pleasant stay
an amazing stay was had.     this would have to be one of the very best airbnb's we have stayed in and we have stayed in many.

We had a great stay at Anne and Chris' place (hosted by Karina) it was a comfy space, well laid out and thought out and had everything we needed for a great stay. We really appreciated the little thoughtful touches, extra towels, sweet treats and the room being warm for us on a super cool day when we arrived. Thank you :-)

A gorgeous place to stay, the wine and generous platter of local produce was wonderful to arrive to! Beautifully decorated and cosy, great check-in process and very private. Well located as well to visit local wineries and restaurants. Highly recommend it to couples looking for a Barossa getaway!

Such a beautiful, cozy and clean place to stay in the Barossa. Karina, Chris and Ann were so accommodating ensuring our stay was the most comfortable. From the complementary wine and cheeseboard to the the beautiful courtyard, it’s a must stay. We will be back !

Exceptional bed & breakfast, beautiful location quality soft furnishings and a high level of cleanliness. Loved the wine & cheese platter being included.
Excellent communication with host.

Beautiful little spot, in a great location. Place was clean and comfortable. Was great to receive some nibbles and wine on arrival. The bed was amazing and we had a great nights sleep. Took 10 minutes to walk to the Main Street of Tanunda. Thanks for a great stay
Fantastic location and great hospitality from the hosts

Great location on edge of town meant it was quiet but we walked into town for dinner.  Very clean and well provisioned for breakfast.  The courtyard would be lovely in summer but was a bit chilly to sit out when we visited!   Excellent communication from host
Beautifully presented accommodation with with some lovely treats.
Great little place. Perfect location for exploring the Barossa. Set on the edge of Tanunda it was super accessible to wineries.

This unit was absolutely fantastic, comprising large entrance, spacious bathroom and bedroom living area. Immaculately clean, very quiet and in a great location within easy access to everything we had planned to do in Tanunda and the surrounding area. The bedroom / living area overlooks a beautifully planted private courtyard. We enjoyed the snacks that were provided and would love to return.
lovely location, clean rooms and beautiful little garden that was perfect for a coffee in the morning and a wine in the afternoon, beautiful birds flying and singing in and out too.
Peaceful well appointed studio. Close location to the town, 20 min walking
Such a perfect little studio in a great location. So many thoughtful touches and inclusions. Would highly recommend to any couple visiting the region.
Lovely stay, beautiful clean home. Lovely outdoor area. Beautiful breakfast supplies, wine and nibbles on arrival
Beautiful property with attention to detail extremely clean with everything you need for a short stay. The wine and platter on arrival was a lovey touch, we absolutely loved it.

Darren and Delmah were extremely welcoming and lovely! The place was clean and set up almost to hotel standard! You won’t be disappointed with a couple nights stay here with a big bathroom, big bed and some kitchen amenities provided. Tv is a bonus to have with your morning coffee - couldn’t recommend this place more!

We really enjoyed our stay in Darrens studio in the beautiful town of Angaston.
The space suited is perfect for a couple and we were very comfortable.
Also appreciated the extra thoughtful touches.
Nicely decorated for an older styled house, bed was very comfortable.

Thanks for having us!
Hosts are great. View is awesome facilities fantastic highly recommend staying a night or two in a lovely little town. Would stay again if opportunity arises.
This was a great place to stay. Walking distance to restaurants. Comfy bed and great hospitality. Great place for the price.
Great stay in a very lovely place!
A lovely stay!
Darren's place was very clean, neat and tidy. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and Angaston was a great town to have as our base while exploring all the Barossa has to offer.
beautiful spot, amenities were excellent, bed really comfortable. in 40 degree heat air conditioning worked great
Great little place for a get away in the Barossa

Darren’s place is really lovely - you get the downstairs section of a two storied house which is completely seperate and private from upstairs. The bed and couch overlook the nice big windows out to the front garden which was lovely. We had the windows open (screens on windows so no bug issues!) and heard lots of lovely bird calls as the sun set.
Nice and close to the township, we visited the Roaring 40s for dinner (excellent pizza!) and The Company Kitchen for breakfast (wonderful food - didn’t need lunch!).
Very comfortable bed, lovely view, excellent location - definitely will come back next time we’re in the Barossa.
The house was perfect for our family of 4. It was clean, spacious and had everything we needed to make our stay comfortable.

Stayed here after wine tasting in Barossa. The place was nice and clean, the host was very helpful. Nice and quiet enviroment with short and nice walking distance to Angaston restaurants. We recommend!
We would stay here again - great place!
Great location in a lovely historical town so close to the Barossa.
Great place for those looking to spend some time in the Barossa Valley!

very kindly
Thanks
Stylistic touches, nice and quiet and really appreciate the complimentary wine. Thanks Darren.
the place is nice, clean and spacious. they provided kids toilet seat and small chair for my son,  which is very thoughtful. highly recommend.
Lovely place in a beautiful location. Definitely recommend!
This is a lovely, well appointed place in the heart of the Barossa. It is well located for a great stay
Really nice place, clean and cute. Even had water and wine in our frigide.
Cute cosy spotless room with all you need! Beautiful location not far from attractions. Nice and private, had the best sleep :)
Lovely place, can recommend!
Very nice stay. Very close to supermarket and wine yard.
Clean and warm and as described. No issues
Great location and lovely hosts!
This is the second time we’ve stayed here, and just as great as the first time. Still recommend and will still come back again next time!
Darren’s place is super clean & an easy walk to the main street in Angaston. Perfect spot to base yourself if you plan on exploring the Barossa - highly recommended!

Well situated in the township of Angaston with a pleasant 10 min walk to its amenities along the linear trail. A very clean, compact and fairly secluded property. Perfect for exploring the Barossa and all it has to offer. Will certainly revisit.

Great place to stay, close amenities and neighboring towns. Darren & Delmah were great hosts, who are very down to earth welcoming couple with great tips on local places to eat and drink who on the same token leave you to your own privacy. Thank you for sharing your beautiful home.
well looked after studio. quiet location great hosts
Darren's place is perfect place to stay if you are planning on exploring Barossa and eating out most of the time. Very central location and place is clean.

We had a lovely time in Angaston. We were able to walk into town with our4 and 6 year olds easily. The place had everything we needed, was impeccably clean, lots of thoughtful touches and when we accidentally broke a glass we had a vacuum cleaner delivered immediately. The best part was the comfiest air bnb bed we have ever slept it!
Great place close to town. The free bottle of wine was a nice touch. Darren was very quick to respond and was there to greet us.  Highly reccomended.
Even though we didn't meet our hosts Darren and Delmah, we felt so looked after. They attended and accommodated our every need and I thank them for it. Amazing hosts.
Darren's place is ideal for a relaxing holiday in the Barossa. The studio is convenient, the facilities are great and Darren is friendly and helpful. Ideal!
Thoroughly recommend this Airbnb at Angaston. Very comfortable, with lots of lovely inclusions! Great location and top places to walk to to Yalumba winery and the town.

Beautiful little place with everything you might possibly need! The garden is beautiful and the thoughtful personal touches are beyond what you would expect. Darren’s communication is very prompt and clear. We had a very nice stay.
Darren and Delmah's place is bright, spacious and clean. It's in the quaint little town of Angaston, close to many wineries and attractions. Perfect place as a base to explore Barossa Valley.
Great communication. Clean, convenient and great value.

This is an excellent place to book for a brief stay in Angaston. The hospitality, amentities and cleanliness is outstanding. Really good value too - especially for a couple or a small family. The location is ideal for a short walk into the town centre along the linear path (15-20 minutes) and practically just around the corner by car (a couple of minutes). Very highly reccomended!
Very tidy and comfy. The location was great too
Very peaceful with a lovely outlook.
Great spot.

Darren's place is easy to find, quiet, very clean with all amenities for a comfortable stay.
Extra touches were milk in the frig and a bottle of the local wine. Good hot showers and very comfy beds most appreciated. Thank you. Sally
Darren’s place is well kept, clean and very convenient. Close to the CBD.
Great stylish accommodation! Plenty of space and thoughtful touches. Highly recommend.

My wife & I stayed at Darren’s place for 5 nights and thoroughly enjoyed the proximity to everything in the Barossa. The Airbnb was particularly clean and had everything needed for our stay with a comfortable bed and well appointed kitchen. The Airbnb was an easy walk into Angaston which has numerous places for Coffee & dinner
Great little spot perfect for the night.

Lovely hosts who came to introduce themselves and also check in to make sure we had everything we needed to make our stay comfortable. The place is comfortable and located very close to town. Would definitely stay here again.

Darren and Delmah were wonderful hosts, they had a very easy check in followed by introducing themselves later in the afternoon face to face to give us some local recommendations for food, wine and local places to enjoy! They had so many beautiful little touches to the apartment. Clean tidy and perfect for us! We would stay again in a heartbeat.
We enjoyed our stay. Great location and the room was as described.

Great accommodation in the heart of the Barossa. Close to town and all the main attractions. Hosts were excellent, leaving a lovely bottle of wine in the fridge and coming to introduce themselves after we’d checked in. Definitely recommend this Airbnb
Darren was friendly and checked that we were comfortable, the space was clean and quiet. The bed was comfortable. Overall it was a very nice place to stay if you wanted to stay in the Barossa.
lovely clean little apartment under Darren's house. tucked away behind a pretty garden. Great location for a cosy sleep after a day of wine tasting.
Aaa great little place to stay

Don't be fooled by the heading, this is very spacious for a studio style apartment! Checking in and out was a breeze and the location is great, just around the corner from many great restaurants and wineries.
Great space, exactly as described. Darren’s communication was prompt and helpful, and the space was very clean and comfortable.

Great stay, was exactly as described.  Great communication before you arrive and in the room.  Darren greeted us and told us about the area.  The room is so spacious and is perfect.  Bed was comfortable and the heater came in handy during the cold night!  The shower water pressure was a bit weak, but it was nice and warm.  Kitchen pretty well stocked.  We didn't use the BBQ.  Wine and water on arrival was the perfect touch.  Highly recommend!

Angaston is a lovely town and Darren's accommodation was very comfortable and well appointed with thoughtful touches such as a lovely bottle of wine. It was extremely comfortable for two but would also be perfect for a family. Thanks Darren!
This place was great!

Lovely clean studio with everything you need. Wine in the fridge and happy birthday message were very nice touches. Easy walk into town, comfortable bed, spacious room. Shower wasnt fantastic but did the job. Easy check in and check out. Definitely recommend!
Sparkling clean and organised and nice host.
Our young family enjoyed Darren’s place. It had all that we needed. Communication was quick and location was within 10 mins drive all the places we wanted to see.
really private and everything you need, lovely green outlook, very pleasant hosts

Very nice and clean studio, well equipped and with a BBQ we could use on our own.
Would definitely recommend! The studio is well located within the Barossa Valley!

Only downside: the pressure of the shower wasn't very good but still manageable!
The studio was great.  Provided easy sleeping, amenities and location close to town.  The walking path into town as well was a great added touch also.
A very nice couple and a wonderful Barossa accommodation

A super clean, stylish and tidy guest house. Perfect for a weekend getaway, close to lots of wineries and the hosts were really accommodating. We will definitely come back here next time we plan a weekend away in the Barossa.
Great value, sparkling clean and comfortable. Short & easy walk along the rivulet path into lovely little town of Angaston. Thanks for having us.
Lovely clean peaceful surroundings with so nice little touches thrown in. Great space well priced and in a great location
Absolutley loved our stay here - a beautiful short walk to the town
Lovely place to stay, clean and very comfortable. Would highly recommend.
Great location for exploring the Barossa and nice walk to local eateries. Good communication and a friendly welcome

I loved staying at Darren and Delmah's place. After a very busy few days leading up to my trip, I was in need of a good nights sleep and I certainly got that here! The space is large and well appointed with all that you need for a comfortable stay. It's also incredibly close to all that you might wish to see in the Barossa - highly recommended!
Fantastic studio, great location and very clean. Thoughtful touches throughout. Great little getaway!
A wonderful place in the Heart of Barossa. Great view, super tidy and lovely space. Super recommended!!

The apartment was very neat and tidy with modern amenities for a stay over. Very nice touch with the bottle of chilled wine in the fridge. Good location to the wineries and a very quiet neighbourhood. Thank you for hosting us!
Excellent accommodation. Huge bed, perfectly clean and self check in. A fantastic stay

Perfect location central to the Barossa. The place is all clean and you have everything you need there when you travel. Towels, air dryer, shampoo and soap.
Beautiful setting and a personal welcome touch with a bottle of wine. I can only recommend this place. I was haspy with our choice.

This was a great find! Easy walking distance to town, great view, and the apartment was clean and cozy. Would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for an affordable, comfortable place to stay in the area.

Quiet, spacious & clean.
Good for a base to explore wineries in the Barossa.

Delmah is very friendly. She even prepared us a bottle of red wine. Her place is neat and well maintained.
Will definitely come back.

The place is located in Angaston with a nice walk down to the town. Angaston is a small town in Barossa Valley, that offers sufficient supply. Only tradining hours can be challenging.

We only used the queensize bed in the apartment, however there is an additional double bed available. It also comes with an barbecue area and two seats outside. Overall we enjoyed our stay. The apartment offered sufficient privacy with an own entrance.
We loved the King sized bed. It was a great spot to stay for our friends wedding.
Great place, big and clean, right in the middle of barossa valley attractions. Thx!
Great value. Everything as advertised.  Clean and convenient

Great little space that is private and separate from the hosts area. Complimentary bottle of wine which was a lovely touch and very much appreciated! Easy communication via messenger with Darren. Nothing negative to say, lovely experience.
Nice house owner, highly recommend this place!

Great spot to stay with easy access to everything the Barossa Valley has to offer. Great communication from host. Super clean studio with all you need for a comfortable stay. Easy walk to main street of Angaston if you don't want to drive. Very well priced for a quality room. Highly recommended
Fantastic space. Comfortable, private and wonderful views. Great hosts!

In the comfortable king size bed there are great views down the valley. Everything you need is in the spacious unit, and to top it off, a lovely bottle of white wine greeted us in the refrigerator. There is no stove or hot plates, but the convection microwave and barbque were quite sufficient for meals. All crockery, cutlery, pans and cleaning products, as well as a hair dryer were in the unit.
We found it a clean and spacious unit and totally enjoyed our stay there.

Darren’s place had everything we needed & was centrally located in the Barossa Valley. The room was spacious with a super-comfy king size bed as well as an extra bedroom with bunks we didn’t need. We slept unbelievably well! Darren & Delma were considerately quiet to ensure we were not disturbed.

It was nice to be able to use a kitchenette to prepare basic snacks & breakfast.

The area we used was very private with a nice outdoor setting that we used when the weather allowed. It was an easy & pleasant walk into Angaston for dinner.

This is the perfect place to stay for guaranteed quiet, clean & comfortable accommodation.
Darren's place is a great little space to base out of for tripping around the Valley!
Had a great short stay at Darrens place. Convenient location, clean and excellent value for money. Highly recommend for anyone wanting to explore the Barossa region.

We loved staying in this lovely studio. In the morning we heard lots of birds greeted each other. They gave different atmosphere from staying in other places. Superb nature experience.
Definitely my bookmarked place to stay in Barrosa.

Delmah and Darren welcomed us to their studio and offered to help us in any way. The studio was very well equipped for our stay including a lovely bottle of wine. Comfortable beds and pillows with extra blankets available for those chillier nights. Heating and cooling were available and everything was sparkly clean. All in all I highly recommend this gorgeous spot in the Barossa.
Great location and value stay in the Barossa.  Studio was clean, comfortable and well fitted out.  Highly recommended.
Very comfortable and very clean accommodation. Thanks Darren & Delmah
Fantastic place to stay, extremely clean and thoughtful touches.  Definitely will stay again.
Cosy & warm space to stay and enjoy Angaston. Thanks Darren!
Great place to stay
Lovely place, easy communication, good location and sparkling clean. Wouldn’t hesitate to recommend.
Lovely place to stay, highly recommend
Great spot! Clean and cozy. The heater worked very well. Stones throw to the new Adventure Station and the rail trail. Kids loved the bunk beds. Thank you!

Beautiful studio with cosy style. Fully equipped and comfortable. Everything is new, clean and tidy. We loved the design of the studio with a big floor-to-ceiling window opening to a peaceful view every morning. It's suitable for a small family or small group of friends like us who enjoy spending time together, bbq, morning teas and glasses of wine after dinners.
Thank you Darren & Delmah!
Excellent property, great location perfect short stay for a couple or young family
Amazing space, great location. Super convenient check in. Thanks so much!

Self-contained lower level apartment-style with peaceful elevated outlook over the valley and vineyard glimpses, comfy and homely, amazing shower/bathroom, great hosts, considerate and great communication. Highly recommend.
Darren and Delmah's place is in a fab location, close to the new playground and the rail trail.  It's clean and modern.  We love it and will be back!
Nice clean comfortable space-perfect for two. But would work for a couple of children as well with the bunks in a separate room.
Amazing place to stay! Super clean and modern! Beautiful views and short walk to town.
Excellent hospitality and will keep coming back!
Great little bottom level to yourself with a comfy bed and amazing shower, good value for money overall and close to town.
Great place to stay for a family with a few of small kids. Great playground around the corner, close to amenities as well as many popular Barossa attractions. We really enjoyed our stay!
thank you - very convenient stay, clean and easy in communication. And in the backyard of Yalumba, what else would you want in the Barossa?!
Great location! Everything was just as described, amazingly clean and lovely. Communication was accurate and prompt. Would definitely recommend to those stopping in the Barossa area!
Great location, very clean, everything you need! Lots of thoughtful touches - thanks for having us, we very much enjoyed our stay.
Easy to get to location. Comfortable bed. Modern shower upgrades. Very clean and easy space for a couple or family of 4.
Nice place on a quiet street. 2nd bedroom has a door which was hard to spot in the photos. Would stay again.
Easy to get to the place, very comfortable king size bed. Amazing shower. Highly recommend!

Definitely consider this property for a stay with nice facilities. We had a really good stay and would happily return and highly recommend to others.  Good value for money especially if you have kids as there's bunks next to the main room.
Always a great host! Highly recommend - convenient location with views across the hills in Angaston.

Darren's studio was a lovely place to base ourselves for a weekend in the Barossa Valley and in a good location in Angaston. The room itself was clean and modern and the bathroom was really great. We would definitely consider staying here again!
A lovely set up with everything you need

What a wonderful surprise this was! It was a true hidden gem right in the heart of the barossa. Close to so many fabulous hot spots that you’ll want to visit. The place was sparkling clean, the host was very helpful with lots of information on close by locations for coffee, breakfast, places to eat! Thank you, would highly recommend.
Great stay, host were very thoughtful. Arrived to complimentary wine and water. They also provide lots of local recommendations. Recommend!

This lovely studio is privately nestled on the ground floor with a great outlook onto garden and gully beyond. Great value for a family - we stayed with our two young kids and wandered down the path nearby to a local playground.
We hope to stay again sometime!
Lovely little touches and everything you need. A beautiful little front garden to admire as well. Very close to everything in the Barossa. And excellent little find
We really enjoy our stay, lovely little walk nearby and fantastic adventure playground for kids.  And we love the shower!
Lovely, convenient place to stay in the Barossa. Loved that it was walking distance to the shops and an awesome park that the kids loved. Nice and quiet location.
A very quite, private, clean apartment.  Lovely bottle of quality wine on arrival that was most appreciated.  Darren is a nice guy - very friendly.  Perfect place for an overnight stay.   A.

Highly recommend staying here, beautiful and spacious little apartment and so clean with a very comfortable bed. Great value for money with a complimentary bottle of wine and cold water. Definitely staying here again! Thank you 😄
The place and location are impeccable. It’s well furnished and overs all Barossa travellers could ask for. Perfect for a single, couple or small family travelling the region. Greatly recommend
Great value and great location!
Top spot great host bang for buck...Ideal to visit the barossa
Lovely clean and tidy place in great area. Perfect little pit stop in between Barossa excursions, and comfy beds.

This is a very lovely place to stay while touring the Barossa Valley. Angaston is a beautiful place and we highly recommend this accommodation. This place is very comfortable with modern furnishings and very clean! We would not hesitate to return. Thanks so much again!

The place is sparkling clean, in a great location and extremely well maintained and cute. Free wine, wifi, toiletries and clean sheets and towels. Highly recommended for your barossa valley experience. In addition, Darren is friendly and we would love to be hosted by him again. Thanks so much for a lovely stay!

Gorgeous little place!! The accommodation is below the owners residence, however you really didn’t feel like you were at all. The space was set up perfectly, we were a family of 5 staying (one in a port a cot) and the kids all had their own little space to retreat to and the place was lovely, new and very clean. We only stayed one night, I probably wouldn’t stay here with all my children for a week but for a couple with one or two kids it’s definitely worth the stay. They have thought of everything to make the space functional. Located in a gorgeous area of Angaston too :) thanks for the lovely stay!

Darren & Delmah's place is very stylish and super clean. The massive king bed very comfy. Delmah gave us great local information. We loved how it was set up! We would have liked to have stayed longer but it was booked out!

Wonderful studio to stay at! Hosts are very welcoming and hospitable. Close to everywhere you will want to go in the Barossa region and in a wonderful, quiet location! Lovely, thoughtful touches of different soap/shampoo options, drinks in the fridge and a guide book with recommendations for the region!
Very nice place. Highly recommend.
Airy, spacious studio with pleasant southerly outlook. Space is well-appointed with everything you need for your Barossa break (and a very tasty complimentary bottle of wine to boot!).

This is a lovely place. Spacious and very modern and clean. Lovely comfy bed , great kitchenette set up , latest bathroom amenities . Would recommend to anyone looking to spend a few days in the Barossa.

Very quiet and nice little place, you will feel like home and not disturb.
Well thought out place, you have everything you need and extra bits. Very clean and well kept. Definately recommend anyone who would like to explore Barossa valley

A lovely find in the Barossa. Spacious ,well equipped, spotless affordable self contained accommodation. Lovely views of the valley and garden attracting many birds. Comfy bed and nice bottle of wine. Darren and Delmah were very accommodating hosts and communication was very prompt. Would highly recommend

A nice comfortable studio unit just a short distance from the main road in Angaston. The host was accommodating and communicative, responding quickly to any questions we had. The kids were thrilled to have their own little room to the side with a bunk bed. Almost everything in Barossa Valley was less than a 15 minute drive away. We had a great stay, thanks to our fantastic hosts.
Clean and tidy, great location.
Very friendly hosts and very reasonably priced for a stay in the Barossa

Great place to stay. Great location, private facilities, little BBQ area that worked well and the house is very quiet and private.
Highly recommended.
Fantastic studio. Well presented and exceptionally clean. Peaceful location, with the gardens and birds adding to the tranquility. Communication was faultless. We will definitely be back.
Small, cosy and suited our needs for a couple of nights stay. Didn’t spend time there apart from needing a private place to rest.

Positioned perfectly in the Barossa, just the next street over from the main street in Tanunda. We were honoured to be the first guests that Cory had in his sparkling newly renovated house with all of the mod cons. Check in was a breeze using the code keypad lock. Cory has tastefully renovated his house but it was the small things I really appreciated. Proper sized wine glasses, little Nespresso style machine with complimentary pods, Netflix(!), olive oil + balsamic in the pantry and most importantly, the amazing guest book! Perhaps the only AirBnB guest book that I've actually wanted to read and flip through. Beautifully presented with amazing information about the region and of course wine! Favourite part was the ghost stories at the back. Next level! Cory is a thoughtful and considerate host. We hope to come back for our next Barossa visit!

Thanks for having us Cory!
Your place was absolutely perfect to stay at while we explored the Barossa. Location is so convenient to the town and wineries, the house is clean, modern and very comfortable. Communication for check-in and check-out was faultless. And the book of information supplied with local recommendations as well as the history of the region and facts about the wine industry was such an amazing touch.
We will be back for sure!!

We spent 2 nights at The Acre and we were so impressed with the accommodation. Beautiful decor, great amenities, thoughtful hosts. We were perfectly positioned for a Barrossa exploration but also didn't have a lot of noise and traffic. Definitely reccomend and hope to come back!
Clean and well equipped place to stay, all the amenities that you could think of is provides. Location is also very close to city center and close proximity to restaurants. Great place!

The Acre was beautiful and made the perfect base for exploring the Barossa. Great location, and the house was spacious, stylish and clean. Cory was quick to reply and the self check in was a breeze. Would definitely stay here again!

This place is fantastic. Everything you need while staying in an incredibly stylish space. Cory has added the perfect small touches that make the stay a luxury experience. Information on the local area is available in an easy to read hardcover manual. The outside area is well designed and you would have everything you need in both summer and winter. Just book this place you won’t be disappointed!

What an amazing house in a super location. So well set up with everything thought of. Welcome bottle of wine with treats for the kids so thoughtful. Made our stay in the Barossa totally memorable. We loved it.
The Acre is a hidden gem. It is clean and has everything needed for a comfortable getaway.

Cory’s place is such a great spot for taking advantage of the Barossa and some of the great wineries around Tanunda.

The place itself is stunning, really well furnished and styled. Some lovely touches on arrival, including a bottle of red that went down a treat as well as a great guidebook for the area!

We used the local taxi service to get to some wineries and avoid the rain showers but the town is easily walkable.

Cory even sorted us out with a later checkout which made the last morning a lot easier!

Recommend Cory’s place a lot. Thank you.

A beautiful home in the perfect location. I would highly recommend Corys lovely house, perfect for a short or long stay in Tanunda. Cory was also very helpful providing plenty of recommendations for the beautiful Barossa area. We will not hesitate to stay here again.

We had such an amazing stay in Corys home.
Beautiful newly renovated home that was sparkling clean.
Super easy access using a pin code
A nice easy walk into Tanunda village, very convenient.
Can highly recommend this home, this town and the entire region. We will be returning!
Such a cute stylish house! Good location walking distance to town and some wineries. Accomodating host- would 100% stay here again.
A great central place to stay.  Very clean, stylish and extremely well stocked.  Great find and would stay here again.
Stunningly appointed home located close to the centre of Tanunda. Flawless host has everything organised for your stay.
Great place, would highly recommend!

What a wonderful place. The house is modern, clean and just beautifully set up. Wish we could have stayed longer. I'd love to live in this house permanently as well! A great location, and we could not have asked for more!
Fantastic location and exactly as advertised. Some really thoughtful welcome touches. Would highly recommend
Excellent stay......very comfortable, great facilities and sparkling clean only a short 2 min drive or 15 min walk to Tanundra. Thoroughly recommend.

Fantastic house with beautiful furnishings, all the mod cons and a great place to stay in the Barossa! Located close to Tanunda town centre, walking distance to the Barossa Brewing co and just a great spot to stay whilst exploring the Valley. Would stay again in a heartbeat!
Brilliant accomodation, close to Tanunda!
The Acre is a great house in a perfect location.  The house is lovely, spacious  and  has a fantastic outside area. Highly recommend staying here

We loved the house, perfect location and everything was stunning. Comfy beds, darkened rooms and beautifully styled. Loved that they even had a cot and high chair which made things that much easier. Highly recommend!
Stunning house. Sparkling clean and perfect for a weekend trip to the Barossa
Clean, responsive and close to all the action

A perfect location and so central for a Barossa Valley experience. Our ‘home away from home’ was ideal for us, travelling with an elderly parent, who could be very particular but was very impressed. Top points for comfort and cleanliness! Close to the main road but very quiet especially at night! A short drive to the main street was also very convenient for a quick trip to the supermarket (which had it all) but also very charming town.

Cory’s place was very clean stylish and a great location. Cory was easy to communicate with and very accommodating.

Julie

We loved our stay at Cory’s place. A beautiful little home that had all the right touches. Wonderfully equiped kitchen and we LOVED the photo book introducing us to the area! You could tell so much time and detail was spent on it, it was so thoughtful and educational!! The beds were super comfy and the back garden was great to hang out in with a few of the local wines. Cory’s is an easy 20 min walk into the main centre of Tanunda, which we thoroughly recommend an early stroll to Apex bakery for their fresh bread! Would definitely stay at Cory’s again if we’re back in the Barossa!

Perfect little house for our annual Mummacation.
Very clean & tidy with everything you need.
Location is fabulous, very central.
Cory is a very helpful, friendly host.
We hope to stay again next year.
Thanks Cory.
Clean, spacious, modern interior, remarkably close to the Main Street, great communication

A lovely clean place with stylish bedrooms, a great outdoor area, great location, easy check-in.
Coffee pods and milk included.
Comfortable beds, modern bathroom and kitchen.
Will stay here again.
Fantastic stay! Highly recommend Cory’s humble abode with a great location too. P.s - love the amazing iron for our clothes!
It’s a beautiful place and Cory was super helpful and friendly. Would definitely stay again 😃

Cory’s place is ideally located in Tanunda - a great place to base yourself for a Barossa Valley weekend. The place is as pictured and Cory has thought of nice little touches such as the mini toiletries kits for each guest AND enough toilet paper for your stay - HOORAY!
Check in and check out was a breeze and we made the most of the place - even cooking up dinner one eve with local produce and watching a movie. If I’m in the Barossa again or have any friends planning on going, I wouldn’t hesitate to suggest they stay at Cory’s. It’s a stylish boutique yet homely stay.
Lovely accommodation. Comfortable, clean and had everything you need for a long or short stay. Great decor and finishing touches. Thank you Cory.

The house is exactly like pictured, very stylish and comfortable. The house has absolutely everything you would need for your stay and is close to some fabulous wineries:

Honestly, could not fault anything about the house or our stay in Tanunda. I highly recommend for anyone looking for a fabulous place in the Barossa.
Great place! Amazing location

Cory's place is exceptionally beautifull house with the decor perfectly balanced to give it a real homely feel ,
exceptionally clean throughout, well equipped kitchen with utensils and condiments. The linen was crisp and clean. Comfortable queen bed. Private outside sitting area, very relaxing. Quiet neighbours and close to vineyards and shops.
We stayed an extra night we felt so comfortable.
Cory was easy to contact with a query we had.
Looking forward to returning when the world settles down.
Thanks Cory for being a great host

My friends and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Cory's. The keypad entry was handy for a big group as we did not have to worry about who had the keys. The location is not super close to the shops on the main Street but we brought our cars so this was not a huge issue for the most part.
Great space close to town. Beautifully renovated inside, good value for money.

Great location to visit Tanunda and the surrounding area. Place was sparkling clean and beds were super comfy. Check in and communication was super easy. Would be a great place for a family or large group

This property was exactly as described with all the amenities. Located in the heart of the Barossa it is perfect for sightseeing and visiting all the wineries nearby. If you are looking for a peaceful and convenient Barossa getaway, this property is perfect!
Corys house was gorgeous and was equipped with everything you could have needed, very clean and the location was perfect walking distance from some winery’s and the Main Street
Had a great stay here.

This host has thought of everything imaginable to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. A safe walk to many amenities and you’re set to easily explore Barossa Valley and beyond in the car. Easy, open plan living and stylish, luxurious feel throughout. Enclosed and comfortable outdoor entertaining area is an extra bonus. Perfect for children and adults alike.

Perfect accommodation for families (especially with young children). In a great location (brewery 5min walk or 15min walk to the main street in Tanunda) or a short drive to wineries etc. Will definitely be back
Great location, lots of room, beautiful indoor and outdoor spaces, clear communication. Had a wonderful time!
Beautiful home right in the heart of the Barossa . Will definitely be back
The Acre was a great place to base ourselves for our week in the Barossa.  The house was very clean and the kitchen had everything we needed for our stay.  Would highly recommend staying here.
Awesome
Great location and vibe within the house. Had everything we needed and more! A lovely stay. Thank you Cory!
Modern amenities and well styled for an affordable price. Great for a group weekend away 😊
A perfect getaway in a beautiful clean and modern home away from home!
Great communication. Easy check in. Perfect location to Main Street, brewery and near by wineries 👍

Corys house exceeded all our expectations. It has been tastefully renovated, the beds are very comfortable with luxury linen and well appointed.
I recommend this house for future guests and will be back again.
Thank you Cory.
Awesome location, beautiful and clean inside, has everything need and more.
We had an amazing stay at the Barossa, Cory was super lovely and helpful. Thank you for your hospitality. Loved all the homey touches. Highly recommend.

Cory’s place is so lovely! Very beautiful, clean and excellent location close to all the shops, cafe’s, bars and wineries. Cory was very helpful and accommodating and quick to respond to messages. Highly recommend and would stay again!
Comfy beds with good styling. Ample room for the # of guests advertised, great for a larger group of guests. Host was very easy to contact and very accommodating.

Great location to explore the Barossa!
Space was stylish and clean and checkin was smooth! Would definitely stay again :)

The Acre is a perfect location for exploring Tanunda and the surrounding Barossa Valley. Check-in is easy and contactless.

The house is the right size for a group of friends or family gathering looking to get away from the city.

Would look to book if coming back to Barossa.
My Nana and her friends loved their stay at Cory’s place! Fantastic
A spacious and well-equipped base for a Barossa trip! Cory's place had everything we needed to chill out between vineyard visits ;)

My family and I enjoyed our stay in the Barossa. Check-in was easy and the place was clean. There can be some noise from Big Trucks on the road outside early in the morning so if your a light sleeper it's probably best to bring some Ear plugs. We would definitely recommend staying here.
City’s place was beautifully decorated, with practical thoughtful touches. The hosts were communicative and accommodating.
Would stay again
Fantastic house in the heart of Tanunda
Really loved this place. Fantastic location and very well thought out amenities. Highly recommend!

A great property that will appeal to all audiences. Stylishly appointed with modern conveniences and easy and quick communication with host.

Excellent indoor and outdoor options for a private stay and fastidiously clean and with hotel quality linen in all bedrooms.
Excellent property. Neat, clean and well catered for. Highly recommend

We had a wonderful stay at Cory’s place in the gorgeous Barossa wine region. The house has been lovingly renovated and is beautifully done, we found it had absolutely everything we could have needed. We were travelling with our baby and there was a portacot, high chair and playpen available which was great. The little backyard was perfect for throwing out a picnic rug in the arvo and having a little picnic. Great location, a 2 min drive to town and we loved having Turkey Flat cellar door just a few doors down for a cheeky arvo rose. Would definitely stay here again. Thanks for having us!
Enjoyed our stay, nice outdoor area, clean and tidy and quiet location.
Beautiful space, new and clean. Excellent location for a trip to the Barrossa.
Cory’s place was the perfect spot for ,self and my bridal party! So close to our wedding venue and very comfortable. Very close to Tanunda shops and cafes. A very nice stay.

This was a perfect place for my partner and I to enjoy a full week in the Barossa. We have been staying in Airbnb’s throughout Australia and New Zealand for over a year now, and Cory’s place is truly one fo the best we have stayed in. In addition to all of the great things people have already said about this place, I’ll add that the WiFi is super fast and very reliable. Highly recommended!

Great communication from host & quick response to fix a small issue upon check in. Great location, everything is literally within 10 minutes from you or less. This place is perfect for a family with kids or small group.

Nice property with plenty of parking.
Very clean and Cory responded very quickly if we had any issues.

We had a wonderful stay at Cory’s place. The property is beautiful, spacious and clean. The kitchen was very well equipped and the outdoor area was fantastic. Cory was always prompt in replying to our enquiries and requests. Would highly recommend this property! Excellent location too :)

Fantastic house, very clean and modern and was perfect location to the Barossa Valley winiers.  Great private area outside to relax.  Taxi service into town was so good.  Would recommend to anyone looking for a lovely place to stay.

Corey is a fantastic host. He was so friendly and obliging. His residence is beautifully styled, extremely clean and tidy and has fantastic amenities.
The outdoor entertainment area is just gorgeous.
Thanks for having us.
An awesome base to explore the Barossa, incredibly clean and an easy walk to town. Lovely outdoor courtyard. Great amenities.

Super close to the town centre. We just happened to stay when the vintage festival was happening so there was lots of things to do during our stay.
Everything we required for our stay. Lots of room.

A fabulous place to be based as you explore the Barossa.  The house is comfortable and well set-up with a well equiped kitchen and facilities.  We enjoyed being there for 3 nights and were able to both cook meals there, and it was a 15 min walk into Tanunda for the shops, restaurants and cafes there.  A perfect place to base yourself!
A great home from home . Exceptionally clean and comfy with lots of homely touches .We enjoyed being able to walk into Tanunda and also to Turkey flat winery .

Cory was everything and more than accommodating. He was informative and attentive to our needs and was thorough in ensuring our check-in was smooth and painless. The listing is impeccable, luxurious, spacious and clean. You will find the location very near a lot of wineries and cellar doors in the town of Tanunda. My partner and I often spent time outside as the outdoor area was lit up at night and the atmosphere was serene. I would definitely stay here again and recommend this space for others. Even though, it was only my partner and I; the space accommodates for up to a party of 6. It holds everything you need for amenities from washers/dryers to a selection of cooking utensils. Once again, thank you for allowing us to use your space and will absolutely think of you for our next visit to the Barossa.

Photos don’t do justice as to how beautiful this place is. We had everything we needed including heating in every room!! Also, the place is very close to the town centre and Barossa Valley. Cory was great with his communication, sending detailed instructions of how to enter the property, and checking in to make sure we didn’t have any issues. Will definitely be coming back again.

If we could give a higher star we would. Beautiful & lovely airbnb, clean, comfy and very spacious. Honestly, Cory was so great, right down to super speedy communication. Especially when we couldnt work out the wifi connection!

Excellent, well stocked, clean house with all the amenities you could need, including laundry items. The kitchen, laundry and bathroom are modern. Great garden and outdoor setting.
Loved having coffee pods provided so we started the day with decent coffee. Comfortable beds and pillows. The house is located close to shops and restaurants ( short driving distance) and vineyards. Cory is a terrific host, very responsive and will do whatever he can to make your stay comfortable. Loved staying here and would recommend it highly.

Beautiful home, perfectly located and well equiped.
We had a wonderful time

A really beautiful home away from home with everything you could possibly want. Perfect for families. Great location close to town and within walking distance to Turkey Flats winery. Highly recommend as a great place to explore the beautiful surrounds of the Barossa Valley.

Fantastic stay with great small details that make corys place stand out from the rest. Good spot $10 taxi to the main shops or walking distance! Clean and had everything you could need for a perfect stay in the Barossa valley
Great comfortable, stylish place with all the amenities needed. Really good location also,  very short drive to all the shops etc. We had a lovely stay!
This is our second stay at Coreys house - a beautifully clean  and tidy house only a few mins from the Main Street of Tanunda.  A great place for couples of families visiting the Barossa
Perfect house for a little family getaway. Equipped kitchen and outdoor area. Good heating for those chilly Barossa nights. Short easy walk to Main Street of Tanunda. Would definitely stay again!
Great little escape with a stunning interior and a very homey and cosy feel
