Hosts - Tracy was away during our visit but Chris was great, funny and super accomodating to us city folk.
Personalised Touches - OMG who has pillow-top beds in Air BnB's ? Tracy and Chris do !!! The flowers, the candles .. we just all loved the welcoming style of this house.
Atmosphere - Homey, ohhh that fire was amazing

We just loved our little girls vaycay for the night, thank you for having such an amazing property and give our love to the cheeky alpaca's.

Diana xo

Wonderful stay! the space is gorgeous and has everything you could need for several or one night stay, the fire was going when we arrived so the living room was toasty, the living room windows look out over the alpaca area which is entertaining. We mostly engaged with Chris who was passionate about the farm and was very welcoming, giving us the freedom to walk around the farm, enjoying the scenery, as well as take part in feeding and interacting with the alpacas as much as we liked. highly recommend!

Thank you for such a wonderful few days. We loved the house, especially the woodfire! It was exactly how it was presented in the pictures. Hosts were available to answer any questions, and continually stock up the wood pile. We loved our stay!

Walked out of a cold wet winters day into a cozy living area with a fantastic wood fire, amazing views and lovely hosts.

An amazing place to stay!

Tracy and Chris were very welcoming and generous with their time, always happy to accommodate you. The property has many lovely design touches and is being thoughtfully restored/renovated. It is a lovely spot to both relax and truly unwind, or there are many nearby towns and attractions. Likewise there is plenty to amuse the family on the property, you can go for a walk and see kangaroos and many other animals, or interact  with and feed the alpacas. We learnt a lot about the breeding and behaviour of alpacas and our son loved hanging out with them.

This place was above and beyond expectations cottage was lovely, fire place was fantastic and the extra touch of bacon and eggs for breakfast was great. Then there are the Alpacas and other wildlife around the place was just great. We will be back again when we need a getaway from it all.

Tracey’s place is a beautiful, serene piece of farmland out in the Adelaide hills. On top of an amazing herd of alpacas, expect an enthusiastic welcome and roaring fire when you arrive along with a bottle of local wine, paddocks, woodlots and dams to explore if you feel like it, and a comfortable, modern set out of the house.

In the morning, wake up to the sunrise over the hills from a spectacular view out the bedroom window, and complimentary breakfast supplies.

We were lucky to join in the morning feeding of the alpacas too, which was a pretty special experience.

Would recommend!
Excellent location- peaceful, tranquil and beautiful.  Excellent value for money. Great hosts. Amazing alpaca experience. The bed is super comfy, quality bedding, cosy space with a magical fireplace.

Very tidy and well decorated house in the tranquil suburbs of Barossa. It is also convenient, only five minutes to the town for grocery shopping.
Tracy and Chris the host couple are very considerate and nice. They lit the fireplace for us in advance before our arrival and prepared so many wood for us. They also invited us to feed their alpacas which are so cute and furry.
We also saw several kangaroos in the barn.
Very pleasant experience. Highly recommended!
距离巴罗萨主产区40公里，你可以在结束品酒之旅后带上心仪的酒驱车下塌这个宁静农庄，有2个大房间一个有着舒适长沙发的客厅，装备齐整的厨房，整体装饰干净精美，驱车6公里可到附近镇上的Food land超市买好牛排羊排，回来简单又原味配上红酒，宁静致远。主人夫妇热情好客，很早便为我们生好了壁炉，还准备了很多木头。他们还邀请我们去喂他们养的可爱羊驼，又看见了成群的袋鼠。
如果时间允许，真想多住两天，呷口红酒惬意无比。
Great hospitality and the alpacas are super cute!

Chris and Tracy were wonderful hosts for our one night stay. Loved the styling of the cottage and had everything we needed and more! Lovely couple willing to show us around the property and tell us all about it and their alpacas! Will be sure to come back one day and see the progress of the farm :)

You will love every minute of your stay. Tracy & Chris’s farm was so beautiful and peaceful. Could not recommend their place enough. Walking in to a roaring fire was amazing, can’t wait to stay again.
Amazing! Little touchs to the house made it even better. Breakfast provided and the fire on arrival was a great touch
I was a great place that have a short trip. The owners are really friendly and very easy communication. Definitely will come back again.

We had an enjoyable stay at this property. It’s nice being out in the countryside and it’s so quiet.

Tracy our the fire on before we arrived and it as nice an cosy.

The place looks great and the bedrooms are particularly fresh, clean and comfortable.

We enjoyed the breakfast provisions and the short drive to wineries.

Would not hesitate to recommend this place. Would stay again.

What a treat! The alpacas were ridiculously cute, the place was beautifully decorated and the hosts were so kind and informative. We loved our stay here and can't wait to return - next time we'll have to time it to make sure we can help take an alpaca for a walk!

Amazing stay, thoroughly enjoyed.
beautiful house with great little details. It’s everything you want and more when staying in the Barossa region.
Tracy and Chris were so lovely and helpful, and even assisted in organising our wine tour with pick up and drop off. I would definitely recommend to anyone travelling to the Barossa valley.
10/10

Tracy & Chris were wonderful hosts and the house was amazing. Definitely exceeded expectations. So many beautiful finishing touches added and all the little extras looked after. We wanted for nothing during our stay. The tour of the property was lovely and the Alcapa's were gorgeous and fluffy. We had the most perfect and relaxing birthday weekend away.

环境优美，风景很好，晚上看到了广阔明亮的星空。羊驼非常可爱，喂食羊驼是一次难忘的经历，主人Tracy和Chris非常周到也非常热情，提前一天询问到达时间提前为我们生好了壁炉，冰箱里也有丰富的食物，以及红酒。厨具也很齐全。房间装饰的很有品味。床品是我这半个月的旅行中最柔软干净以及舒适的。羊毛被真的很暖和。有独立的入口有自己的空间和私密性。可惜行程太匆忙，如果有机会一定住上一段时间好好感受。
Everything is perfect, the scene is very beautiful ,the hosts are kind and thoughtful , the alpacas are so cute, the decorations shows a good taste of the host。A home away from home . We really enjoyed our stay here. Thank you Tracy and Chris.
Tracy and Chris are very warm and attentive hosts. The place is beautiful.

Lovely place with a cozy fire and super comfortable couch and bed! The alpacas are super cute as well. A really nice, relaxing spot that is a short drive to the Adelaide hills or the Barossa. Would definitely recommend!

We had SUCH a wonderful time at the farm with our almost 2 year old who couldn't get enough of the 'acapacas'. Tracy and Chris were very thoughtful and attentive, taking us for a walk, letting us borrow their grandson's trike, keeping the firewood stocked, and it was so lovely to have some food to cook on arrival and a warm fireplace- so important when you have a hungry little person in tow! We'll definitely be back. Thanks so much Tracy and Chris! x
This place is awesome!

This location is a hidden gem
Tracy and Chris have local knowledge of this region and know how to make guests feel at home 🏠
Loved our stay we were warm as toast and enjoyed a huge breakfast prior to book out
Would recommend and would stay again

Thank you both to Tracy and Chris for a wonderful relaxing farm stay. The house was beautifully styled and we felt right at home with arriving with the fire place lit. It was the perfect country downtime we were seeking from a city-escape. Quiet, peaceful, private, beautiful. The house was spacious and cosy and we loved interacting with the alpacas on the farm. Thank you for the great stay - we look forward to coming back in the near future.
Thanks for an amazing stay, we loved every minute. Alpacas are so gorgeous, what a beautiful stay, we will definitely be returning. Thanks Tracy and Chris

Tracy and Chris place was amazing to stay .
I love the stay very quiet and beautiful place, especially the lounge setting and the animals at the farm beautiful.
Tracy and Chris are super host, there anytime to welcome you in , happy to show you around good people.
I will definitely recommend anyone to stay.
Warm welcome and fabulous location!
We had such an amazing time at Chris and Tracy's place. We highly recommend it and we will definitely return.

A truly luxurious and superbly cozy experience. Excellent getaway for a relaxing worry free stay. Superhosts to greet you on arrival and show you around they amazing place. Fully equipped with all amenities: two large bedrooms, built-in cupboards, individual access to bathroom, plenty of blankets and towels, kitchen with all desired features, large cozy living area with a built-in wood fire place, TV, radio, and a large deck for morning coffee with great views. Breakfast included with all the extras you could think of. Complimentary wine of choice makes an evening by the fire momerable. The cherry on top - take the stunning Alpacas for a walk and learn all about them.

What a wonderful house and property! We loved the space and Tracey and Chris were friendly and made us feel comfortable. Would definitely recommend to anyone wanting a quiet trip away. A memorable experience!
房间非常大，干净，房东非常热情，在冰箱里准备了牛奶面包冰淇淋。亲手喂了羊驼宝宝，全家都很开心。非常值得入住。

One of the experiences should have in a lifetime!!! Highly recommended, the host Tracy and Chris are very friendly, will walk with you along the third farm and pet the animals. The star night sky and the wood oven just make the stay unforgettable! Should try!
原汁原味的农场生活，完全独立的house，热情洋溢的主人，已经农场里的羊驼，袋鼠和其他的动物。烤着火炉看夜晚的银河星空，喝着房东免费提供的红酒，很是惬意！
A unique stay at Tracey and Chris’ Alpaca farm BnB, loved having a hands on experience with the Alpacas!  Beautiful location!

We were checked in by Chris. He really loves what he does and Is very passionate about all his projects on the farm. He showed us around the land and he let us feed the alpacas which was a lovely experience. The Airbnb is perfectly kitted out for everything you would need. (Pots, pans, kettle, coffee, tea and milk etc)They even provided breakfast. It was also lovely to have a nice fire to relax in front after a long day of travel. The beds were extremely comfortable and gave for a great night sleep.
The location is wonderful. It really gives you the opportunity to have a snap shot into Chris and Tracy’s life on their alpaca farm. With the alpacas, wild birds and neighbouring kangaroos all outside your window, you really couldn’t ask for more. We would highly recommend this airbnb.
Keep up the great work and we hope you get your tractor sorted out soon!

Amazing stay at Tracy's place. Beautiful location and so quiet. Tracy and Chris were so welcoming and showed us around the farm and we met the alpacas who were adorable. Chris has done a great job with all the renovations. Breakfast provisions were provided in the large fridge as well as a lovely bottle of wine. Loved this place and would highly recommend it as an escape from the city. Will definitely be back when next in S.A.

First time farm stay expensive, loving it.
Tracy and Chris both are super nice persons sharing how they renovate the farm, how B&B work and a lot of knowledge of the alpaca...
All alpacas are lovely and adorable.
Highly recommended ! Sure will come back next time

Tracy's place was exactly as pictured. The setting felt very tranquil and the fireplace was so lovely, even in October. We were warmly welcomed by the hosts and given an informative  tour  of the Alpaca farm. Our toddler loved the outdoor space!
Great place to stay, very clean and tidy. Got to feed the Alpacas
Outstanding location, living space with everything you need, amazing hosts and we loved the alpaca interaction. Will be coming back!

Tracy and her husband, Chris were fantastic and friendly hosts. They met us in arrival and were prompt in communicating with us and accommodating our late check in. We loved the opportunity to meet the alpacas and the walk of the property, there are so many wild kangaroos around. The fact that you can see the stars in the sky at night also really brings home the fact that you’re away in the country!

The bnb is comfortable and fitted out well with beautiful furnishings (some made with alpaca fur, which can be purchased), also there is a full-functioning kitchen with utensils and ingredients for preparing meals. Tracy very generously left bacon and eggs for us in the fridge so we had breakfast in the bnb both mornings while we stayed there. Location-wise we were well placed to cover both Hahndorf and Barossa, both about half an hour away give or take.

We had a great time and would recommend this bnb to anyone who wants a farm stay away from the city, in the quiet of the country.

We had an amazing stay with our host Tracy. We loved every minute of it. The hospitality and thoughtful touches made everything the stay that much more homely - not to mention getting to feed her adorable alpacas! Would 100% recommend this place to anyone wanting a quiet getaway ❤️❤️

Tracy's place is just divine, an amazing country retreat - we didn't want to leave! Tracy is so welcoming and warm, the house is gorgeous, so comfortable, spacious and very stylish (we adored the super soft fluffy towels and the super comfy bed!). We went on an amazing walk with Tracy around the property, accompanied by her three gorgeous dogs and saw kangaroos and fed the lovely alpacas - it was the best Sunday morning we've had and really slept so late in the mornings as the property is so peaceful and quiet. We will definitely come back - would highly recommend. Thanks Tracy x

We had an amazing night away! Tracy and Chris were wonderful hosts! We loved being able to have a tour around the property, interact with their animals and feed the alpacas. We would love to visit again!
We would highly recommend this place! Thanks again! :)
Great hosts and quaint place. Definitely worth visiting.
Very sweet stay with everything you could possibly need, meeting the alpacas was the cherry on top! Very warm & welcoming stay, highly recommend!

We loved our stay here! Very peaceful and serene.

Tracy and Chris were excellent hosts and the place was beautifully decorated and nice and clean.

Tracy was an amazing host, and provided a very warm welcome. She provided very quick responses and made the process very seamless. She even pre-organised a time with us to take a morning walk and feed her beautiful alpacas!

We absolutely loved our stay with Tracy and Chris, the farm is so peaceful. We felt quite at home and got to have a walk around the farm and feed the baby alpacas. Hope to be back sometime to visit and see where the renovations go
Thank you Tracy and Chris for such a perfect experience ☺️

Staying at the fantastic place of Tracy and Chris was a wholesome and wonderful experience. They are so kind and nice hosts and we felt at home immediately. The separate house for guests is spacious, well equipped and super cosy. Interacting with the Alpacas was really fun and we got to learn a lot about them in the process. There‘d be so many more great things to write about our stay but best thing you just go and visit them yourself. Highly recommend staying there to anyone!
Couldn't be happier, everything was just lovely
It’s an amazing place and a great experience. Highly recommended

It is one of the most family friendly places we ever stayed. All of us including my 1 year had a great time walking around and feeding Alpacca's.

One of the highlights is seeing millions of stars under night sky. It is so beautiful as there is absolutely no light pollution and it is something we all enjoyed which we can not do in the city.
 
I would highly recommend to stay at Gundaroo in the Barossa Valley.

We loved our stay at Gundaroo Cottage. Tracy and Christ are delightful as are the herd of alpacas across the field. Highly recommended for a friendly, local and relaxed AirBnB experience. Thanks again!

Had such a great time staying at Tracy’s. We had a farm tour and watched stars at night. Met their three adorable dogs , cat and fed their friendly Alpacas. A definitely must go in Adelaide! Plus point - wineries are not too far away!
Tracy and Chris were so welcoming and accommodating. They showed us around their beautiful property and even let us walk the absolutely gorgeous alpacas.
It was a peaceful and relaxed stay but also centre to many of the area’s attractions. This gave us the chance to either rest and recuperate or tour and sight see. The alpacas were a bonus!

Chris & Tracy are amazing hosts & have done fabulous  restoration to the farm and home. Unfortunately our stay was cut short by the terrible fires that came very close. Chris & Tracy we’re both caring and helpful despite the difficult situation. We hope to visit again & wish them a bright future with their farm stay. Highly recommend.
Tracy has great communication with us from point of enquiry. She was very considerate of our situation. Would book again if we were ever in Adelaide again.
Amazing experience on a beautiful property with plenty of space and nature to take in!! Look forward to staying here the next time we’re in the Barossa!!

Thank you so much Tracy and Chris,
We had a really good time in your accommodation especially the alpacas feeding, we had so much fun and our friends loved it. You both are wonderful host. Thanks again :)

This is one of our best holidays ever. We were made to feel at home from the time we got off our vehicle. We loved every minute we spent at the farm. The accommodation is simple, elegant, stylish and homely. Tracey and Chris are truly super super hosts. They did a lot more than what we expected to make our stay beautiful. We loved being outdoor with the Alpacas, watching the sunset ( stunning indeed) , the quiet personified space, the local tips and the generosity of the hosts. Our daughter loved spending time outdoors in the tractor and being a little helper to Chris. ( not so sure if she actually helped)Tracey for taking her time off to escort us. Well I can go on and on, you got to stay here to really experience as words are not sufficient to explain !

Tracy and Chris’ Airbnb is the perfect place for a relaxing getaway. The accommodation is located in the middle of several South Australian iconic areas including the Barossa Valley, Claire Valley, Adelaide Hills and Lobethal.
We were warmly welcomed by both Chris and Tracy who graciously introduced us to their beautiful property and alpacas! We even got to feed them which was a fun experience.
The Airbnb was clean, tidy and fully equipped. We much appreciated the stocked fridge of breakfast supplies and bottle of wine! For anything else, shops were a short drive away.

I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this Airbnb for anyone looking for a quiet and relaxing farm stay.
房东非常友好，带我们喂他们饲养的羊驼，非常可爱

Tracy and Chris were great hosts - went above and beyond to make our stay ! Our toddler loved feeding the alpacas. The couch was so comfy and they had bacon and eggs in the fridge for us for our breakfast, just lovely!

What a unique stay! An alpaca gave birth on the first day of our stay and we met the new baby alpaca. We also took the alpacas for a walk!
Tracy and Chris' hospitality is phenomenal. They are so passionate about their farm, alpacas and making their guests feel welcome. We loved staying here!
This place is amazing and the Alpacas are so cute! Had a wonderful stay and the hosts were brilliant and even took us to feed the Alpacas in the evening. Look forward to staying again soon.

If you are looking for a peaceful retreat away from the busy-ness of the city, but would love a bit of fun thrown in, this is the perfect place to stay!! Tracy and Chris were absolutely wonderful hosts, and we really enjoyed our time at their AirBnB.

We LOVED visiting and feeding the alpacas - they have such unique, interesting personalities!! Tracy took us on a tour around the property, and helped us set up a wine tour, which was perfect :-) We got to see some wild kangaroos on the property - very cool (except for the fact that they like to eat the grass, so maybe not so fun for the lawn). We also had an amazing BBQ dinner one night, and their 2 sweet doggos finally warmed up to us enough to hold for a bit (which I loved, because I missed my pup back home!)!

The renovations they have done on this property are amazing, they have a photo album to show what things looked like when they first bought it, and wow - very impressive! Excellent style choices for the renovations and decor!

Overall, a very fun, relaxing stay, and we would highly recommend this location to anyone! Thank you Chris and Tracy!!! <3
Tracy and Chris have an amazing setup in the Barossa. They are the most wonderful hosts and designate so much of their time to ensuring we got the most enjoyment from our time with them.

Very satisfying！The entire room is tidy and the hosts have shown their hospitality to us，graciously helped us dealing with luggage problems consistently.Pets there have been interesting.Deserved to be recommended！

Tracy & Chris are such lovely people! They were a pleasure to get to know. It was our first time to Adelaide and they were definitely a contributing factor in making it an unforgettable experience.

The Airbnb was very stylish and homey. The beds were super comfortable and the amenities were very clean.

The highlight was being able to spend time with their adorable alpacas, dogs and cat. They took the time to educate us about the alpacas, and allowed us to pet and feed them. We must’ve taken thousands of pictures as they are incredibly cute.

I would strongly recommend staying at this Airbnb as not only was the location convenient, but the experience is one of the best experiences I’ve ever had through Airbnb.

PS If you have the opportunity to see the property you will see how perfect they are in being contestants on The Block! Make sure you pester them about it, particularly Chris. He’ll get the hint soon enough.
Tracy was an amazing host, amazing hospitality, loved seeing the alpacas and every thoughtful touches at th cottage. Would recommend 11/10
优美的田园风光，富有品位的房间装饰，柔软舒适的床品，热情的主人Tracy和Chris，这一切给了我们家一般的感觉｡Tracy带着我们体验喂食羊驼，第一次近距离观察触摸这可爱的动物真是一次难忘的经历。被Chris对雨赞叹 " It's a good rain, I enjoy it very much!" 触动内心。可惜行程匆忙，如有机会真想住上一段时间｡
Absolutely fantastic! Amazing host and amazing place to be. Great experience with alpacas and walk with dogs! Thank you!!!

Tracy and Chris were absolutely wonderful hosts ! They had everything thought of for our stay ( stocked kitchen,towels, full use of the kitchen, games , tv, fan , heater etc)Thank you fit the lovely bottle of wine  . I probably had the best sleep ever thanks to their amazing bed and even the couch was so soft and really comfy . The highlight of the stay was of course interacting with the alpacas , feeding and petting them . Tracy took a lot of time explaining all about Alpacas since we knew nothing much about them coming from Singapore.  They also have 2 very cute dogs and a friendly cat who allowed us to pet them as well .  I only wish we could have stayed on longer . One night is not enough in this wonderful place . Tracy and Chris are just such incredible people and I can’t wait to stay there again and hopefully be able to drop by soon to see the alpaca babies!  Once again, thank you Chris and Tracy and we wish you all the best in your future endeavours . ♥️

A lovely place to stay when you want to go and explore the barossa. The house is modern inside with everything you need. The alpacas were super cute. And Tracy was more than happy to show us the animals and let us feed them.  The two dogs and cat also came to visit us which I loved. Super friendly hosts! We felt very welcomed. There are also alot of wild kangaroos on the property which is a plus. Perfect place for an animal lover like me. Will definitely be back again.

Sizeable and comfortable house with full kitchenware perfect for those who love cooking. Highlights would be feeding the lovely alpaca and they are so cute. Anyway it’s truly a wonderful escape from city life, highly recommended !
We had an amazing stay! Tracy and Chris have been fantastic, alpacas are adorable, and Bill the cat always keen for a visit! Thanks again, we will come back!

Tracy and Chris are amazing hosts! They were very friendly and kind enough to show us the entire property. We got to feed the alpacas and saw a new born baby alpaca. We would definitely come back to spend more time here and recommend it to our friends.

Nicely appointed place tucked into the South Australian countryside.  Lots of birds, roos and fantastic scenery.  The Alpacas are a plus.  Convenient to the Barossa wine country if you don't mind a 30-45 minute drive through spectacular countryside.

Wow! If you are travelling through the Barossa Valley this is the place to stay for a truly magical and memorable experience. Tracy and Chris are such lovely hosts and make the experience so enjoyable. Their alpaca's are so friendly and we loved the tour of the farm and getting to feed the animals. The house itself is so spacious, clean and well designed. The stars at night are amazing here and sitting out on their verandah for meals is such a treat! Highly reccommend to stay here! Thanks guys!
Thanks Tracy and Chris for the clean and tidy place, your hospitality and the interaction with your lovely alpacas. We really appreciate it and the kids had a great time.
Thanks you Tracy and Chris for the great hospitality provided! Have a great experience feeding alpaca and they have 2 cute dogs and 1 ginger cats!
If you have a few extra days I totally recommend staying at Tracy’s alpaca farm. Our kids loves it. The property is so peaceful.
Tracy and Chris exceed our expectations. The home is extremely homely and has everything you need and more! The alpacas are adorable and very friendly.
A lovely relaxing place! Beautiful farm and property. The owners were friendly and lovely to deal with.

I cant recommend this gorgeous place enough!
You will fall in love with everything about this Alpaca farm stay.
The accommodation is stunning and the styling is very tasteful. The fireplace is a gorgeous bonus.
The views are spectacular and feeding the Alpacas was a highlight as was the amazing star gazing.
The hosts, Farmer Chris and his beautiful wife Tracey are people people and extremely easy to get on with. They will look after you.
Book in before its all booked out! 5 stars! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Super comfortable beds, cosy furnishings, roaring fireplace, lovely hosts, and cute alpacas. We had a great time with our friends on this weekend getaway and felt truly relaxed. Our only regret is not having more time there. Tracy took us to meet and feed her alpacas. She was also very accommodating in letting us check-out late so we could have lazy Sunday morning. They are kind, genuine people who have a passion for their animals and the Airbnb. Hope to come back again!

Thanks again for having us.
It has been an amazing weekend in a really nice place.
The atmosphere, the details,the animals and the peace around this airb&b are incredible.
Tracy and her husband were waiting for our check in and they welcoming us with the fireplace already on to enjoy the house in a rainy day.
Very kind from them.
Hope to see you again!
Samira

Tracy and Chris were the most fanatic hosts this was my favourite trip ever! They are lovely people who we felt we could become genuine friends with. The farm is amazing and the alpacas are wondering, getting up close to them was a great experience. The house was absolutely gorgeous they have done an amazing job!

Tracy and Chris were welcoming hosts and we enjoyed our stay on their stunning property.

Highlights were:
Going for a walk around the farm and patting Tilly the very friendly sheep.
The wide window view from the living room and the long, comfortable couch to enjoy it from.
The beautiful wooden deck with views over the main alpaca paddock.
Comfortable beds, bottle of wine on arrival, bird song, and wood heater.
We really appreciated Tracy and Chris taking the time to introduce us to the alpacas and tell us about the history of their property.

The hospitality at Chris and Tracy’s place was amazing. We got a bottle of wine as a welcome gift and they already had the wood heater firing for us when we got there. Plus they supplied bacon, eggs and milk for our breakfast. Getting to feed the alpacas was certainly a novelty and we even got a tour of the property on a buggy. It was a fun stay. Would definitely recommend if you’re looking for a weekend getaway.

As soon as we pulled in the driveway I knew I was going to love this place. Walking into a beautiful, cosy space with the warmness of the fireplace, I already didn’t want to leave. Tracy & Chris were incredible - from providing breakfast to taking us to meet & greet the alpacas 🥰
I already can’t wait to return! Thank you so much for a perfect stay! Maybe after the next visit Sam will be convinced we should get an alpaca 😉 x

We loved our stay at Gundaroo and will definitely be back! The experience of interacting with and feeding the alpacas was an added bonus and I can’t fault our stay. This place has everything you need within reach of the fireplace and was so comfortable and inviting in every way. 10/10 on all accounts ☺️
We enjoyed our stay and getting an up close experience with the animals. House was cosy with a beautiful wood fire. Beautiful scenery on the drive there and an amazing property to stay within!

Tracy is a great host and quick to respond to any questions. I booked a surprise stay for my parents at Gundaroo as a birthday gift. They absolutely loved their stay and had the opportunity to feed the alpacas and talk to Tracy and her husband about the property. The stay was very comfortable and had everything they needed. This property is very well priced for the standard of accommodation and location etc.

Tracy and Chris have been amazing! My husband and I enjoyed our little getaway in the middle of raw nature - so peaceful and serene, with the cosiness of the fireplace being the cherry on top. The alpacas are the simple definition of love at first sight, we couldn't get enough of them. Best bit is the morning coffee on the deck overlooking the alpacas, wild joeys and morning mist. We wholeheartedly recommend this magical experience.
Thanks Tracy and Chris for a lovely stay! We loved meeting your alpacas! The house was beautiful, and comfortable.  Will definitely come back and recommend to our family and friends.

Such a lovely cosy place in winter with the wood fire! Great hands on experience feeding the Alpacas. Hosts are super friendly and Chris loves a chat. Enjoyed the tour of the property. Comfy beds and beautiful views of the Australian Bush from the deck.

Had an amazing and relaxing weekend away at this Airbnb. Tracy and Chris were incredible hosts who were quick to respond to any enquires and also took time out of their day to show us their property and meet/feed the alpacas. Would 100% recommend staying at gundaroo and we will be back again soon!  Also came home with an alpaca blanket which we are already using today 🙂

Great location
Comfortable beds and a cosy fireplace
Very friendly and accommodating hosts who are more than happy to show you around their beautiful property and do whatever they can to ensure you are well looked after.
Thanks Tracy and Chris

Such a wonderful place for us escaped from the city and enjoyed a relaxing weekend. The location is great, just an hour from Adelaide by car. To chat with Tracy and Chris was enjoyable. Would like to come back and already recommended to our friends.

Tracy's house was absolutely blissful. Away from the hustle and bustle, a warm cosy wood fire was waiting for us on arrival.

Being curled up on the super comfortable couch in front of the fire with a glass of wine listening to the rain was just perfect and everything we had hoped for.

Being led around the farm in the morning and meeting the Alpaca's was a fantastic finish to an amazing stay, recommend this spot to anyone looking for some serious rest and relaxation!
Tracy and Chris are amazing people. They greeted us with a warm welcome and a visit to The alpacas farm. On a special day make sure that the house is warm before we were back.

Great host and very lovely space with everything you need with very comfortable beddings and couches! Strongly recommended for romantic get away for couples or family with kids. Walking up to a magnificent view and the interaction with the alpacas was definitely the highlight of the trip. Definitely recommend to all family and friends. It was such an eye opening experience for our family!
Amazing relaxing trip in which we enjoyed every minute! From the log fire, to great hospitality and meeting the alpacas we couldn’t have asked for a greater time and will definitely be back!

Tracy and Chris are wonderful hosts that made us feel at ease and at home. They provided all the basic amenities and gave us a tour around the alpaca farm which was the highlight of our trip. We absolutely loved the cozy lounge and fireplace to which they provided an ample amount of firewood to utilise. Highly recommend this place 👌🏽

We absolutely loved our stay at Tracy and Chris’s place. The fire place was such an amazing touch and made our stay so warm and cosy. Tracy and her adorable grandson showed us around the property and introduced us to some of the beautiful alpacas on the farm. Would highly recommend Tracy and Chris’s place to all. My wife and I will definitely be back.
Great stay. Tracy was a wonderful host. The beautiful sunset on the farm and spending time with the alpacas were both highlights
Such a great place for a family weekend, romantic getaway or even just a girls weekend. Can not recommend enough!

Staying at Chris and Tracy's was the most relaxing weekend we could've hoped for! From the moment of booking everything was easy for us, and the welcome we received was warm. The place was clean and stylish, and had everything we needed. We can't wait to come back and sit on the couch by the fire with a glass of wine and watch the alpacas.
Tracy and Chris were excellent hosts and the cottage is beautifully appointed. We had the best time interacting with their alpacas and would definitely come to stay again.
Peaceful farm with lots of Alpacas!
What an experience! We can not recommend this space highly enough! Fantastic communication, location and home. Tracy took us to meet the alpacas which was a real highlight. Thank you!
A warm welcome from both Tracy and Chris, as well as their alpacas. A cosy stay, complete with a fire in the lounge room and scenic views from the window!
Fantastic place to stay! Great fun feeding the alpacas. Highly recommend.

This was the perfect place for a relaxing getaway out of the city. The house was lovely and cosy and the fireplace was already burning when we arrived which was so nice. The views of the farm and the alpacas from the house were beautiful and relaxing. The drive to the property was stunning and we saw so many kangaroos and farm animals. At night you can hear the crickets which is so beautiful. Only 30 mins from Angaston for a day trip and only 10 mins from a few other lovely towns. Would 100% recommend this place!

Amazing stay! Would highly recommend! This place is really not far from the city but feels so quiet and relaxing. We loved being close to the Barossa region and spent time exploring the local wineries. However we also loved being able to just relax in front of the fireplace and look out at the view. Definitely a perfect place for a winter getaway but would also be great to visit in summer. The alpacas of course are so gorgeous and truly a highlight! We were able to wander around the farm and see all the alpacas whenever we wanted. Tracy and Chris also took us for a walk around and let us feed the alpacas before we left which was fantastic! The place was clean and had all the amenities we needed with extra touches like breakfast a bottle of wine and plenty of firewood. We will be back!

Amazing!
Highly recommend this beautiful place!
Tracy and Chris were excellent host & went above and beyond to make our stay extra special (even helping my partner plan his proposal) Not only was the place neat & tidy we arrived to have the fire on keeping the place nice and cozy for us. Tracy took us to feed the Alpaca and show us around! We can’t wait to bring our family back as the kids will love it & we look forward to making this our yearly anniversary trip! See you guys soon! Xx
Amazing! Would highly recommend. Prefect place for a relaxing getaway. Tracey and Chris were great host
I had a great stay, they got the place ready for us to relax . Very clean and comfy. The location was very good too and quiet area aswell. Definitely will book again to this beautiful place ❤️

Amazing time at Aurora Sky Alpacas! Tracy and Chris are great hosts and feeding the alpacas was a highlight! This was our second stay here and we already can’t wait to come back in October! Would highly recommend!

It was a wonderful stay. Perfect weather to be outdoors and roam around. Chris and Tracey were so lovely and welcoming. The place felt like home as soon as we walked in. Super cosy and relaxing. We look forward to coming back.
Good experience

Tracy and Chris were wonderful hosts, they took the time to show us around their beautiful farm and meet and feed their adorable alpacas. Our daughter loved it! The bnb was lovely, clean and had everything we needed. Highly recommend.

Amazing place, we couldn’t recommend this Airbnb enough! Thank you Tracy for a wonderful stay. We had such a great time and loved spending time with the alpacas and sheep! We cannot wait to come back again soon!

Loved our stay at Tracy and Chris’s place! They were amazing hosts. It was very homey and had everything that was required. We really enjoyed seeing the alpacas and meeting the other pets on the property. Would recommend to anyone for a unique and relaxing getaway.

Well-appointed accommodation in a peaceful, picturesque spot. Hosts are welcoming but respectful of privacy. We had terrible wet weather so missed out on meeting the alpacas up close but it was still lovely to sit inside in front of the roaring fire with a glass of wine.
A truely wonderfull stay that exceeded all expectations with the best hosts in Tracy & Chris that anyone could ask for. The best B&B we have ever stayed at and highly recommend.

We had an absolutely wonderful trip, the house had all the amenities we needed, the wood fire was cosy in the cool weather and we even toasted some marshmallows on it. All the essentials like oil, salt, rice, pepper etc were there and were even provided with bacon, eggs and milk. They also have a Nespresso machine! We loved waking up in the morning, having a leisurely breakfast on the deck with the sun beaming down on us. Then going for a beautiful walk through the farm, and giving the animals a pat. We traveled with our six year old who thought it was the best holiday ever because Tracy kindly took her for a ride on the tractor, we also loved taking the baby Alpacas for a walk on the lead, they are really cute and funny!! There are lots of kangaroos around the property as well who would race us in our car! Chris and Tracy were the best hosts ever, always made sure we had everything we needed and topped up our firewood every day. The house is about 10 minutes to Gumeracha and Birdwood which was fun visiting the big rocking horse and the Birdwood motor museum. There were also lots of board games in the cupboard which was a pleasant surprise. This vacation is perfect if you want a quiet getaway and love animals and nature we will be back!
Great place for a weekend getaway! Our young family loved staying on the farm and getting to feed the alpacas! Recommended!

Lovely deck looking out over rolling paddocks. Good to enjoy a wine and hang out with mates.
Cosy inside with nice little touches also close to Mt Crawford.

Chris and Tracy's place is incredibly cozy with everything you'll need to go out and explore the Barossa. Great amenities, very clean, top location (15-30 mins from each of the Barossa "hotspots").

We loved having a glass of wine (that the hosts provided for us) on the couch by the fire while listening to the rain outside on the deck.

If you're lucky you'll get a visit from one of the furry friends!

Fantastic spot and will be back if we are in the area again!

Tracy and Chris are really lovely people and they made us feel super welcome. The house is clean, comfortable, spacious well equipped and, thanks to a very efficient wood heater and a plentiful supply of firewood, beautifully warm. The alpacas are really gorgeous and we were lucky enough to be able to watch some being shorn - a first for both of us. The location is ideal, with the entire Barossa Valley within easy reach for a day trip and the northern Mount Lofty Ranges, with lots of fascinating little villages in the opposite direction, not to mention the National Motor Museum just down the road at Birdwood. There are 3 reservoirs nearby with opportunities for fishing, walking or birdwatching. With 4 conservation parks and Mt Crawford Forest in the surrounding area there are numerous walking trails including sections of the famous Heysen Trail. We will definitely be back.

Lovely little getaway from the busy city life! Chris & Tracy did a great job with the property and we enjoyed the little touches provided very much. Was hard to say goodbye to the friendly chubby garfield and will totally come back with family next time!

Tracy and Chris were absolutely wonderful!
The Airbnb was cosy & peaceful. The fire place was a real treat and kept us warm and toasty the whole time!
The stars at night were amazing, and waking up to the view of Alpacas in the morning was the best!
We also loved walking around the farm meeting all of the Alpacas and Sheep.
A wonderful stay, highly recommend.
We will be back!

What a wonderful place to stay, Tracy and Chris were amazing hosts, taking the time out to show us around the farm and introduce us to the Alpacas. We really enjoyed learning all about the farm and looking after them!
The place was clean and tidy and had everything we needed, was a very comfortable stay and will definitely be back again.
Everything you read and more, you won’t be disappointed. Amazing location 60 minutes from the heart of Adelaide. Great friendly hosts Tracy and Chris.
Tracy and Chris were great hosts. They showed us around, let our little one feed the alpacas, and then left us to ourselves to enjoy all the great things on offer. What a great little getaway!
This is my second time stay, Lovely farm stay with those amazing alpacas,  great experiences
A lovely space, warm fire, interacting with the alpacas was great fun.

Chris and Tracy are amazing. Thanks for the hospitality and time to show us the property. I had a great stay with my husband there. The property is relax and cozy, also we loved the experience to feed the alpacas. I strongly recommend that place.

Many thanks
Cintia and Joel
Gundaroo Retreat is a great place to stay. The interaction with the alpacas was the highlight of our vacation. Tracy and Chris are excellent hosts who always have an open ear for their guests.
Thank you for a lovely relaxing time on your beautiful property.  We are missing the quiet and views over the Alpaca enclosure already!

Tracy and Chris great hosts. Accommodation was very clean with everything provided. Loved the peace and quiet. Interaction with Alpaccas was fantastic. Enjoyed our time with the pooches and cat. Loved hearing about your plans for Aurora Sky Alpaccas and Gunderoo. Wishing you well.
We enjoyed our stay! Tracy and Chris were most hospitable as we had checked in just before SA’s sudden covid lockdown. Our first alpaca experience did not disappoint :)
Fantastic experience, perfect for a girls night away
Great place, great hospitality. Got to feed the alpacas. Was provided with all the essentials we needed. Would definitely recommend
Great value, super clean, and amazing amenities. It was very convenient to have all the cooking essentials like oil and spices, as well as breakfast items. The alpacas are also very cute and fluffy!

We loved staying at Tracy’s place! It was in a quite location yet near enough to the shops and vineyards. Especially loved seeing the alpacas whenever we looked out of the windows and we even spotted a kangaroo right outside! Tracy and Chris also took the time to say hi and made sure that our stay was comfortable. Will definitely be back!

We had an absolute amazing time in the girls’ weekend we had at this beautiful farm house. Tracy and her husband are amazing hosts. The house was spotless clean and very stylist with stunning decor. We also did feed Alpacas in the morning and it was a wonderful experience. It was such a relaxing weekend. Highly recommended
Really enjoyed our time away. It was beautiful and we will be back soon.
Great host
Great place to rest

A really unique and special place to stay. Hosts Tracy and Chris made sure we had everything we needed. Plenty of space & well appointed. Loved meeting the alpacas & being immersed in nature, watching the sunset, listening to the birds, even saw some kangaroos. So relaxing. We'll be back.
John, Sally & Emily.

It has been such a great experience to stay on the farm and feed the alpacas. Miss the naughty George, the cute KF Panda and Gold Star already (sorry don't remember all their names but they are all super cute.)  I'm back at work in Adelaide today and have been telling all my workmates how special it was to wake up and see alpacas moving in front of your bedroom window and kangaroos hopping around in the early morning outside the kitchen window. As expected, the house is clean and comfortable, we feel very much at home. There are all essentials in the pantry with fresh milk, eggs, bacon etc. in the fridge, as well as the complimentary bottle of wine.  There is a Nespresso machine with a variety of capsules and a wide range of Twinings tea provided. Tracy is quick in responding to my messages and has done a great job in managing this Airbnb property . As a local SA resident, now that we are not encouraged to travel interstate or overseas, I highly recommend this farm stay for a special weekend getaway. Kids will love the alpacas and there are so much to do in the neighborhood: The Big Rocking Horse is only 10 minutes away and the Whispering Wall 15 minutes drive. Thank you Tracy and Chris, all the best and Merry Christmas!
Tracy and Chris are great, friendly host that provide a copy stay away from the bustle of the city life. The home exceeded our expectations and would definitely go back when back in SA

If you are umm'ing and arr'ing, let this be your JUST BOOK IT review. Honestly, my partner and I had the best time. Tracy and Chris are welcoming and down to earth and add all the little touches to make your stay perfecto. We felt amazing spending time with the animals and getting to know the ins and outs of the alpaca farm. A true experience to switch off and just be in the moment. We will be back!
Tracy and Chris were amazing hosts. There bnb is a perfect place for a relaxing and peaceful getaway.
We had a wonderful, relaxing stay. Tracy and Chris were welcoming and friendly hosts, and we loved getting the chance to spend time with the alpacas.

This place is clean and cozy and well facilitated. The hosts welcomed us warmly and let us meet with their cute alpacas, puppies and cat. We had such a great time there and It's definitely worth going to visit.
A beautifully presented B&B in the country!

Such a beautiful stay while visiting Barrossa Valley, Tracy and her husband were very accommodating and the passion they have for doing what they love really shows. We loved meeting the alpacas and finding more about them, I am an early riser so the next morning I went for a walk around the property and it was so lovely to see kangaroos in the wild and very peaceful. we made a paella outdoors and enjoyed drinks and board games on their deck. the house was very comfortable. we were sad we didn't stay longer. Thank you once again and I will see you on my next trip to Barossa.
Wonderful hosts and lovely alpacas! Will come again!
What a hidden gem. Would recommend it to anyone

We had a great stay at Tracy and Chris’ beautiful cottage in the hills, perfectly placed at the gateway to the Barossa, just a short drive to villages, eateries, farm gates and wineries. We enjoyed our days waking up to the alpacas feeding on the hills and ending the evenings out on the deck watching the kangaroos, bird life and clear night skies. The cottage was set with everything we needed, with a comfortable bed and all the staples. Tracy and Chris were warm, welcoming and generous and even invited us to hand feed the alpacas! Don’t hesitate to book!
Great way to experience the SA country side. Tracy and Chris both went out of their way to make our stay fun, much appreciated.
Unfortunately our car broke down so we had to cancel last minute. Communication was good up until then.
The home is really nice and beautiful. Everything was as clean as I expected. My little ones really enjoyed the dogs and the Alpacas.
Tracy and her husband were lovely and welcoming and the Alpaca Experience was amazing!
Lovely place, Perfect getaway! Thankyou Tracey and Chris.
thanks for a great stay! feeding the alpacaswas a highlight of our trip

A perfect getaway place for anyone who after a farm house combined with modern facilities and cleanliness. Chris and Tracy so lovely and accommodating. Feeding Archie and Zeus was the highlight of the trip, my little boy was so excited.
10 out of 10. Definitely will be back. Thanks for such a nice experience Chris & Tracy

Chris & Tracy are very welcoming & are exceptional hosts. They are very warm and happy to answer any questions but lets us have our space to chillax. The property is well-maintained after lots of hard work. We would love to come back again to see all the animals (alpacas - old & new, dogs and Bill the cat!) ☺️☺️

Gundaroo retreat is a stunning cottage hidden away in the hills. A great getaway for the weekend surrounded by nature (even a baby alpaca). The cottage is very clean with a beautiful smell. Would highly recommend to friends and family.
Lovely place and very comfortable. Lovely hosts.
Such a good place! Bed is so comfortable! Feeding the llamas was amazing!

The house is lovely and very clean. Brilliant outdoor space to sit outside and relax. Tracy and Chris are so friendly and showed outstanding hospitality towards us. The alpaca experience was amazing and we even got lucky enough to see a couple of new borns. Can’t wait to be back!
Expect a great experience and relax in a very cozy stay

Absolutely amazing stay! The alpacas are adorable, the place is sparklingly clean and the night stars are amazing! Amazing place to be off-the-grid and fully relax. There’s wifi but 4G may drop on and off so be sure to bring some board games! Would come back again 💖
The Gundaroo Retreat is a lovely place to stay. Situated in a quiet spot that allows you to relax and unwind. I always sleep well when all I can hear is nature. 10/10 would recommend.
This is such a beautiful farm stay nestled in the Southern part of the Barossa. A lovely space to escape with family or friends. Tracy and Chris are amazing hosts.

can't go past this amazing air bnb! very relaxing,  great to walk alpacas Tracey and Chris where very friendly and approachable.  Accommodation was stunning,  clean with beautiful views 10/10 will definitely go again.
Great place to stay and thoughtful hosts

We found this a wonderful place to stay, both for relaxation and also for hiking around Mt Crawford and exploring the local towns. The house is super clean with two lovely bedrooms and great living area and kitchen, felt like home. Tracy and Chris are outstanding hosts, so friendly and welcoming. Thanks for a truly wonderful stay.
Unique experience with plenty of thoughtful touches
Wonderful place to stay, relaxing, private and lovely host, highly recommend!

Outstanding place: inside and outside:)) we had wonderful time with our 2 kids! Comfortable, beautiful, clean, welcoming, gorgeous view, hart melting alpacas and their babies.. Very peaceful and plenty of attractions around.. Thank you Tracy and Chris!!

Tracy and Chris are fantastic hosts. The Airbnb was just as expected, clean and comfortable with a very homely feel. The location is fantastic, we drove to Lyndoch for wine tasting one day, Whispering Wall and Williamstown on another, the Big Rocking Horse in Gumeracha, and one day spent just relaxing at the farm.
The farm itself is beautiful and tranquil - and hats off to Chris and Tracy for their hard work in maintaining the farm. We stayed with our two children, both under 5, who had an amazing time and we are so grateful to our hosts for taking the time to let us feed the alpacas and provide some insight into their lives.
It was a perfect family-friendly mini getaway and would stay again, and recommend to others!

Note for parents - there was a portacot and high chair available, as well a small bath perfect for kids.

Beautiful property and lovely hosts. My Grandmother and I had a lovely time I. this relaxing place for her birthday. We loved the alpacas 🦙 too 😊 Tracey and Chris were very attentive hosts. I'd love to visit again and highly recommend this place to anyone who wants to relax in a beautiful location.

A cozy cottage on a farm. Beautiful vista and the alpacas were adorable! A great place for couples, friends and families. A bit out of the way from wineries but not too far. Nice personal touches, such as breakfast provided and coffee machine. Comfortable beds and lounge.
Rest, relaxation, getting back to nature. The perfect antidote to a busy life. The accommodation is fantastic and the hosts are generous and kind.
Wished we had more time there. Beautiful location, lovely views and a fantastic log fire.
Tracy’s alpaca retreat was a cosy getaway from the city. Close to wineries and alpacas at your doorstep. We absolutely loved our stay.
Great time with the family! Got 13 year old and a 1 year old and they both loved it. Very clean, a lot of space and great touches for the kids.

We spent our last day/night in the Barossa. After visiting some wineries, we arrived here with such a warm, genuine welcome. Off to feed the Alpacas and see the farm. What a super place to stay. We couldn’t have asked for more! The fireplace and big sofa welcomed us after a day of wine tasting! Honestly, we will be back again soon! It was such a great and different experience. Thank you to our hosts for all those extras too.

Beautifully presented home with all the things you need. Perfectly clean and comfortable.
Stylish touches added all around the home.
Loved learning about and feeding the alpacas. Beautiful surroundings and perfectly peaceful.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and highly recommend this experience.

We had an awesome time and enjoyed our 2 night stay, we loved siting both nights around the chimney and our 6 year old boy liked getting to know and playing around with the alpacas. We were a bit worried about the house being cold for our 6 month old baby but it was not the case as the fireplace can easily warm up the whole place. Thank you Tracy & Chris!
Great place to stay, relax and unwind in the country, the morning alpaca walk is a must, they have done a great job setting this place up, Tracy and Chris are wonderful hosts.

We loved our stay here. Tracy and Chris are amazing hosts and made us feel very welcome. Accommodation was clean and had everything we needed. It felt like a home away from home. Being able to meet and feed their Alpaca's just topped off an already amazing stay.
Cute lil farm, spacious accommodation.

We really enjoyed our stay here.  Lovely secluded location.  Waking up and being so close to the alpacas was really cool.  We got to feed them which was a fun experience.  House was very clean and we were provided everything we needed.  There is a lot of info in the house about the Adelaide Hills / Barossa region.  Very quick response time to messages.

Tracy and Chris were fantastic hosts. Their property is beautiful and we loved getting to meet the alpacas. The bnb was beautiful and clean, we absolutely loved our stay there and wished we'd had more than one night!
We absolutely loved the place and the help provided by Tracy. We enjoyed our stay so much, thank you.
Was amazing the alpacas were very cute :)

A cute little place to stay in the Barossa! Tracy was so lovely and thoughtful - she started the fireplace for us so the house was nice and toasty when we arrived! The Alpacas in the back are also so so cute!

Thankyou so much Chris and tracy. We loved everything about the stay. It’s just all that we needed. I’m amazed how much you guys love what you do. I’m already missing the warm fireplace. Good luck. ❤️❤️
I recommend this place who wants a warm cozy night away from their busy schedule.

What a beautiful scenic farmstay. We had an amazing girls trip & this place was just perfect!

Tracy was so friendly & welcoming, she made us feel right at home.

The alpacas were adorable & we loved being able to see them from the house.

Would definitely recommen to family& friends!

We’ll be back

Navigating to Tracy and Chris's property was easy! As we arrived we were greeted by the both of them, got a low down on helpful tips and were allowed to settle in.

once we were settled in Tracey gave us a tour of the alpacas and gave us a run down of their names and personalities! we even got to feed a few! They're so gorgeous and well looked after.

The air bnb was comfortable, clean and the fire place just brought everything together.

I definitely recommend you stay there just as a couple for a quiet little secluded trip or even with a young family, the alpacas are majestic, bill the cat is friendly and their two doggos Koko and (I forgot her mum's name) were adorable.

Thank you Tracey and Chris for a magnificent stay. We will be back!
Amazing hospitality and beautiful location!!

Huge thank you to Tracy and Chris for hosting us this weekend. Our stay was comfortable, clean, quiet and very homely- the house is decorated so beautifully! The vibe of the farm is lovely and all the animals are very cute. We will be sure to recommend to others and fingers crossed we will book again when we are next due for a little getaway. 5 stars!
Nice escape from town

Tracy you and Chris are the best hosts
We loved our stay and this is the highlight of our holiday. Your bnb is amazing you are awesome people andwe love whatyou have done with your property and now looking at buying some alpacas to have on our land
You guy are just awesome 😎 🦙🦙
Thank you
Pauland Tan
A beautiful, peaceful and magical place to escape the busy life. Friendly and attentive hosts, and amazing animals! The actual bnb exceeds the description.
nice and relaxing location , much bigger than we expected. we loved the wood fire .

Thank you Chris and Tracey for a wonderful stay at Gundaroo!

We instantly felt right at home here.
The place was clean and modern with beautiful touches of decor.
Both the bed and the couch were exceptionally comfy!
With a fully functional kitchen and the Foodland just down the road, it is perfect for those not wanting to eat out for every meal.
Quiet and scenic back roads perfect for walking enthusiasts.

What a beautiful spot in the Adelaide Hills, will definitely be recommending to others :)

I am very confident that you will get so much more than what you expect. During the stay, we felt very safe and well cared for. The place is absolutely clean, quiet and cozy inside yet vast outside. We had a wonderful experience by taking part in exciting activities such as feeding alpacas and petting sheep. Also we spotted a few kangaroos when we wandered around the beautiful farm. Not to mention, the hosts were very kind and thoughtful. I hope I can visit them soon in the near future.

I would definitely recommend this place!!!

Tracy & Chris are wonderful hosts and their charming farmhouse is perfect for a little weekend away! Everything is as described - alpacas right outside and an indoor wood fire which kept us toasty warm (very easy to light).  For those with kids, the place is family friendly - there’s a high chair available, plenty of space to run around outside and even a swing set. Gorgeous views all around and not far from everything you need. Definitely a great choice if you’re looking for a farm stay :)
Beautiful location with peaceful setting. Comfortable stay with cosy fire.

Tracy and Chris’ place was large, homely and well equipped. We stayed here to travel around the wine regions and arrived a little after dark. For those who will be driving in the dark - there are a few km’s of unsealed and unlit roads to Tracy’s place. It’s completely safe, we did it in a tiny car but just something to be aware of.

Tracy and Chris had already lit the fire for us so that we’d be warm when we arrived. Their home is comfortable and spacious and met all of our needs. Communication was very quick and easy.

We even got a chance to see the Alpacas the next morning, they were very cute and Chris gave us a little tour. Thanks so much for a lovely stay! :)
beautiful accommodation, amazing hosts and an incredible experience with the alpacas and the sheeps- will highly recommend to friends and family and will definitely come back again!
We had such a lovely stay at Tracy’s property. Great location, clean, and very homey. Would definitely recommend to family and friends!

Tracy and Chris are wonderful hosts, and their place is beautiful! The animals are delightful and we were lucky to see some lambs! Chris had the fire established for us upon arrival, meaning the place was wonderfully cosy! We will definitely be back!
Tracy and Chris are great hosts! We had a great experience staying at their house and meeting their beautiful alpacas. 🥰

This is one of my favourite locations. The farm is beautiful, the house had everything we needed and we were made to feel so welcome. We will definitely be returning. It's a romantic getaway for a couple and also great for kids.
Outstanding stay! We had a wonderful time. Comfortable, beautiful, clean and welcoming with a stunning view. Very peaceful! Thank you Tracy and Chris for being such fantastic hosts.

Tracy and Chris has hosted an amazing place on AirBnB, the housing was tidy and clean, and the fireplace was very warm. The alpacas and baby sheep were very cute and photogenic. Tracy and Chris had also taught us about the difference between an alpaca, llama and sheep’s fleece. It was an amazing experience and we would definitely love to come back! :-)
Enjoyed stay, plenty of wildlife, car museum and excellent pub meal

This was a wonderful destination for our little family holiday. We had a fantastic time. Especially our 4 year old daughter who absolutely loved the farm experience. There was so much to see and do on the farm and in the nearby towns. The house was very cosy and comfortable and Tracy and Chris were very warm and welcoming hosts. We would love to come back!

Wonderful stay on a beautiful farm with the cutest alpacas greeting you every morning. The house was lovely, clean and so cosy and warm with the fireplace. The house had everything we needed for a great stay. Thanks again
Gorgeous place to stay. Bush walks and the animals are just gorgeous. We had a lovely stay

I stayed here with my wife and 1 year old. Everything is provided that you need, the location is fantastic and Tracy and Chris get the balance right between being welcoming and leaving you to enjoy the farm! Very close to all the tourist spots too! Highly recommend!!
Fantastic location, close to the hills and Barossa Valley. The accommodation is cosy and well equipped. Hosts very friendly as well. Highly recommend!
Absolutely loved our stay! Tracy and Chris were great hosts! We’re going to miss waking up and saying hello to alpacas!

We absolutely loved our stay on Tracy and Chris' property. The views were beautiful and it was a very relaxing place to stay. We really enjoyed seeing all the animals on the farm, especially the regular visits from their cute ginger cat! We highly recommend this stay for anyone!

One of the best Airbnb I’ve ever been! Visited twice and will definitely come again in the future. The house is a place where you will feel like home. It’s very clean and cozy and well-equiped! Tracy and Chris is such a wonderful host, super friendly and welcoming. Would definitely recommend this place to everyone!
We had a fantastic time. our kids love the alpacas
They are very good host. Beautiful place to stay. They were helpful to make us comfortable in their place

Wow! What an amazing experience! Great for the kids! 😊😊
Excellent hosts, we loved every minute of it, wish we could’ve stayed longer.
Amazing little getaway house in the country. Has everything you could need and more. Lovely hosts and gorgeous animals.

We had been travelling from Townsville 5 days and needed a place to wind down before we could check into our hotel. There was an vacancy for the night and they responded pretty much straight away.
The place is amazing the view for the house and there a massive area for children to play plus look at the animals. The kids loved the cat and the dogs.
The house was cosy and felt like home we where really happy. The bed was amazing to sleep in i especially loved the fire place.
I’ve never used air bnb an till now it was a fantastic experience.

We absolutely loved our stay, the views were beautiful and it was a very relaxing and cosy place to stay. We really enjoyed seeing all the alpacas on the farm, especially with regular visits from their ginger cat! We loved the cosy warm fireplace and appreciate the generous supply of firewood. Thank you x
Good communication from Tracy. Lots of alpacas to see! A unique stay! :)

Beautiful location and home.

Tracy and Chris where super nice and easy to talk too

Was an excellent getaway with our 2 1/2 year old as it was child friendly and where made very comfortably to walk around on the paths of the property to look at the alpaca's and sheep, will definitely be going back soon

My partner and I absolutely loved our stay at Gundaroo cottage! The cottage is beautifully decorated and has great appliances (I loved the Nespresso machine), really comfy bed and a fabulous wood fireplace! We loved the super cute alpacas, dogs and Bill the cat! The cottage is sited well, even though it's connected to the main house, it is completely private. It was such a good experience listening to the abundance of birdsong, walking around the beautiful property, meeting and feeding the alpacas, chatting with Tracy and Chris, chilling with the kitty and enjoying the scenery. Tracy and Chris are fabulous, they're warm, friendly, helpful and thoughtful. It was a fun relaxing private getaway, and we look forward to our next stay!
Tracy was a great host, highly recommended and hope to be back soon :)
We had a wonderful time starting at Tracy and Chris’s farm home. The kids had a ball with the animals and surrounds

Thankyou for letting us stay for our mini get away! We loved the home and alpacas, and we felt very welcome :). For anyone reading the reviews, I would definitely recommend staying here, great price for how lovely it is.

We really enjoyed our stay - this is a perfect place if you are wanting a relaxing time away! the location is very peaceful and the house is so cosy. Tracy and Chris are great hosts and were very welcoming and happy to help with anything.
Worth every penny. Will definitely be back.
We had to unwind and relax and Tracy and Chris property allowed this. We loved the alpacas  .. they are so cute. My son loved the cubby house

We really loved this place! Great communication and country personalities which are incredibly refreshing. The alpacas are also quite brilliant, but our favourite was the lazy days on the deck letting nature do its thing. Amazing location! Would recommend.

We stayed here just after our wedding on the weekend and although we didn't really get to see the alpaccas in the morning my daughter was fortunate enough to see them the day before which was lovely.
place and view looked nice.
the bed was extremely comfy.
Tracey and chris were great hosts. The best way to describe their stay is that they opened their doors to a piece of their heaven. Anyone who wishes to rejuvenate should visit this place.
Had a lovely weekend getaway 😊
Very pretty house. Nice and clean. Tracy and her husband are very nice hosts. The alpacas are so cute. Highly recommended.

We stayed here for our honeymoon! We really felt like we were home. The place is very relaxing 😌 The couch is so comfy! The house smells so good! Plus complimentary bottle of wine & breakfast 💛 Alpacas was too cute! And the dogs & cat.
Cheers and Thank you so much Tracy & Chris !

We absolutely had a good time! Our daughter loves animal so much so that she wants to take Mr Bill home with her. Haha!
The house is well decorated and very clean.
Thank you Tracy.
Do yourself a favour by book in and experiment this beautiful home.

This place was a gift for a coupld of friends so they went there for the weekend and they were very happy about this beautiful spot! The place was clean and had everything they need. Plus they said the owners are really kind. Definitely suggested this place to everyone! Thank you for making my friends staying so special!
A lovely place to stay!

This was a wonderful bnb stay while we attended a local wedding. Check in was easy, and Tracy and Chris were around to answer questions and have a chat. We loved meeting the farm animals and walking around the property. The house itself is well appointed with everything you need, comfy and cozy.

This bnb was on such a beautiful property fit for the whole family. The house had everything you need for a comfy stay. The bed were super soft, we all slept well. The kids definitely had a ball and the alpacas added to the experience.
We had such a lovely time in this clean well maintained and gorgeous cottage. I highly recommend this place for stay to everyone
Fantastic location, very nice and quaint! Clean, lovely touches with the breakfast provisions and wine! Very comfy, definitely would recommend!
Beautiful grounds & the accommodation was spacious & homely. Was lovely walking down to see the alpacas & we also had a roo out the front in the morning.
Stunning country bnb with its own private entrance. Close to Birdwood and other country towns. You're welcome to walk down and say hello to the alpacas. Just a lovely spot to wind down and relax.
It’s ok!
Very well kept property in a great location. Delicious bacon & nice hosts with very good communication. Really nice place to get away & relax!
Lovely idyllic spot. Clean and very comfortable.

Peaceful surroundings
Great outlook to the alpacas and dams
Good hosts

Tracey and Chris are superhost and made us feel extremely comfortable at their property. The house is perfect , divine location and alpacas all add to the perfect get away experience. Highly recommended 👍👍

A truly peaceful retreat off the beaten track that won't disappoint. Very clean, well laid out and a surprisingly huge space to relax and enjoy views of alpacas and sunsets. So peaceful and quiet, hosts were even kind enough to let my 16 month old the use of their swing set and cubby house. My family would definitely recommend as you won't be disappointed!
great stay

Amazing stay and amazing hosts . Would recommend to anyone we know . Feel good vibes all around

Want a break from the world, choose this safe haven
An excellent place to get away from it all. Very relaxing, Chris and Tracy are fantastic and genuinely care about your stay. The farm is fantastic, and you can get up close with the alpacas.
Very comfortable stay with some beautiful surrounds. Great communication from Tracy 😄
Can see alpacas. Not worth it for money. No wifi. Very unclean. No reply to messages. Half eaten food in fridge. Bad customer service. View is not good at all.
Great little get-away - easily accessible with a car and perfect for a switch off :)
Lovely spot on Tracy & Chris Aplaca farm. Beautiful surroundings, very friendly hosts & great thoughtful touches.

Absolutely beautiful spot! The Airbnb overlooks a lovely dam and you can see a paddock full of alpacas from the deck.

The alpacas are absolutely wonderful and there were two gorgeous babies during our stay! They were quite comfortable with us watching them grazing and it is a definite must to head here. Cannot recommend it enough! We will definitely be back to relax and hopefully walk the alpacas when the weather is nicer 😊
Beautiful stay - Tracy and Chris were extremely welcoming and made sure my friends and I had a comfortable stay. Love how they showed us around their beautiful alpaca farm!
Great getaway accommodation.^
Friendly, well presented. Great interaction with the alpacas.

We were lucky enough to the first guests at Brooke and Peter’s place. It was as beautiful as the pictures look and was such a lovely place to stay. It was the perfect location to use as a base whilst we explored the Barossa. Brooke was very quick to respond to messages and they were lovely hosts, definitely recommend for a couples getaway!

We had a wonderful stay at Brooke and Peter’s. This is a beautiful cottage with Brooke’s immaculate attention to detail, perfectly positioned in the Barossa. The place is spotless and Brooke is a great host and very easy to communicate with.
Such a great stay, very thoughtful touches, clean and such a nice little town.
Beautiful, peaceful place. Lovely cottage and gardens. Awesome communication. Thanks.

An amazing little cottage that had everything we could need! A great get away for our anniversary, really enjoyed our time there. Was very clean and fully equipped for a stay of any length! Definitely recommend

Could only describe this place as ‘boutique’ and stunning and elegant.
A romantic space, with high end finishes

What a lovely space, cottage, and we would have wished we could have stayed longer, and wish the Barossa region was fully operational at what it does best for tourists

At short notice Brooke and Peter were able to accomodate myself- someone who had just had chemotherapy- and ensure a high end clean accommodation and with covid - no contact. Utterly professional and amazing communication
A beautiful area and space
Hopeful that perhaps once the ‘C’ word (both covid and cancer) are finished with- we will able to return

A clean and beautiful cottage design and high end finishes throughout, Amazing outdoor garden area

Beds- mattress where high end and pillows where amazingly soft
An amazing bath/ jet bath for those sore muscles

We truly drove 85kms out of our way to stay the night here, and it was worth it
Such a beautiful spot! We are already planning to come back.

This is a great place to stay if you are looking to explore the Barossa, walking distance to Lynch, local information booklets supplied, very comfortable, all new kitchen, bathroom and interior, very easy check-in and hosts are a very easy to communicate with. We Loved our stay.

Absolutely amazing, the attention to detail was sensational and better than 5 star hotels! Literally everything had been thought of and even more, very lovely place and we will definitely be booking again and for a longer stay next time for sure! Thank you again

We had a great 4 nights stay. It’s a very clean and beautifully renovated/decorated cottage that has everything you need. Functional kitchen for cooking, very comfortable bed which is difficult to get out of and a large bathroom with spa bath and shower which has great pressure. A bonus for me was the hair dryer that didn’t frizz the hair. There were some breakfast supplies and my husband was pretty happy with the coffee machine. The gardens were nice and was a peaceful location. Communication with Brooke was very efficient. Highly recommend.
We had a wonderful stay in this beautifully renovated cottage. We especially enjoyed the spa bath and cooking in the fully equipped kitchen. Hope to be back soon to visit the lovely Barossa Valley!
You will love it here!
Beautiful cottage, sparkling clean and modern.  Cozy and comfortable. Want to go back again!!!

This is without doubt an outstanding experience in the heart of a South Australian wine region. The property and grounds are impeccably presented and the appointment and comfort was of the highest standard we could possibly have imagined when we arrived. Not only was every space thoughtfully appointed, designed and put together it was warm, welcoming, clean and classy. We felt safe and delighted to spend some time there - our only criticism was that we did not have enough time to stay longer!

Our Hosts were able to help us with our activities and dinner bookings as well as providing us with assistance within minutes of inquiry. They were not only responsive, helpful and timely but so pleasant to deal with.

The wine and chocolate‘s were a beautiful touch, the linen on the beds perfectly crisp and of a high quality, the furniture stylish and comfortable, even the books on the bookcases were not only interesting but complimented the internal colour scheme and coordinated in hues of blue and mustard. As an interior designer myself the property was one of the absolute best I have had the pleasure of staying in and I cannot wait to book again to spend more time with the filtered light coming through the windows and explore the plethora of interesting books.

Rachel and Kimberley of Torrens Park & Walkerville

I must say that Brooke and Peter are absolutely amazing hosts and so easy to communicate with! We had the best stay here in their beautiful little cottage! It was very clean and comfortable to stay in! We will definitely be recommending this place for friends and family and will be coming back in the future! Thankyou Thankyou Thankyou! 🥰✨🥰
Amazing location, absolutely spotless, loads of information about the area. Plenty of ammenities. Everything you need for a visit to the barossa
Absolute amazing stay and would highly recommended to anyone looking for a beautiful stay in the Barossa.

The house itself is beautiful - a nice mix of historic and modern with lots of thoughtful touches. We really appreciated the coffee machine, heating in the bedrooms and think they have the worlds comfiest beds!!!In a great location (nice quiet street) and only a short drive to anywhere you could possibly need to go. We hope to stay again on our next trip to the Barossa - could not recommend highly enough.

Thank you Brooke and Peter for a lovely stay in Lyndoch, your cute cottage was very homely, warm, clean and comfortable with fantastic amenities too. We had a very relaxing stay and can’t wait to come back another time. Thanks again!

Such an amazing getaway! I’ve never felt so comfortable in someone else’s home! I believe it’s because it felt like home... this place was amazing and so much more then I could have asked for! Brooke and Peter have outdone themselves on this beautiful cottage! Definitely worth investing a couple of nights or even a week at this place! Highly recommended
Gorgeous little cottage with all the modern amenities you could ask for!
Such a lovely place, can’t wait to come back! Everything was more than perfect, beds were so comfortable and it’s in such a great area 😍
