Gorgeous, quaint cottage an easy walk to Lyndoch Main Street. Everything was spotlessly clean. The bed was very comfortable and the cottage warm and cosy.
Well presented cottage, fantastic spa bath. Had a lovely weekend away! Thank you
Brooke and Peter were wonderful hosts! The place is beautifully decorated, with lots of special touches. Appreciated the local recommendations as well!
Brooke and Peter’s home is absolutely beautiful!

We spent two wonderful nights at Brooke and Peter’s place and we highly recommend their accommodation. Beautifully styled, with really thoughtful touches,  really comfortable bedding and amenities within a gorgeous bluestone cottage. Brooke and Peter are superb hosts; the garden is really lovely and the location is excellent - we rode our bikes up the trail to Tanunda and back and also enjoyed walks down to the cafe and through the cemetery.   Lyndoch is a little pearl in the Barossa and this is high quality accommodation. We look forward to staying again.

If you’re looking for a place to stay while you explore the Barossa - look no further. The house is perfect and has so many little touches that just make your stay even better. The beds were very comfortable and the living room was perfect for reading a book, or drinking the complimentary bottle of wine while enjoying a movie. The kitchen is equipped with everything you could possibly need, and if you don’t feel like cooking there are plenty of restaurants a short drive from Lyndoch, as well as two pubs and a cafe in close proximity. It’s a perfect location for exploring local wineries and eateries, while also enjoying the serenity of a quiet country town. Brooke and Peter are lovely hosts and happily helped us when we accidentally locked ourselves out. Can’t wait to stay here again for our next Barossa adventure!
Amazing hosts with great local knowledge and tips. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone
Beautiful place, with little touches that make it very special! Will definitely be back :)
Lovely cottage beautifully decorated with some thoughtful extra touches. Great hosts.  Highly recommend

Brooke & Peter's place is the perfect place to relax after a day out exploring the Barossa. It is sparkling clean, stylishly decorated, and super comfortable. Brooke & Peter have thought about absolutely everything you might need for a short stay - special touches everywhere you look. Cannot recommend this place highly enough.
A lovely little cosy cottage, super clean and very homely as well. My partner and I will be back soon!!

Home is lovely and has everything and more for a comfortable stay, we highly recommend it. Location is perfect to tour the Barossa Valley by car and bike. Very clean and well presented. Spa was awesome! Thanks Brooke & Peter
Excellent hosts and high quality renovation on the cottage. Will be recommending to friends and hopefully stay again our self. Thanks guys
Was an amazing place to stay! Brooke and Peter were great hosts

Absolutely amazing host and property, we loved it so much we came back to stay for a second time but this time we knew to book an extra night as we enjoyed it so much. Brooke & Peter have thought of everything so no need to worry at all. The place is so comfortable & beautiful. We also decided to go for a helicopter ride at Barossa Helicopter tours which turned out to be really close by, next to the Lavender farms which was definitely worth it if you haven’t been before. Truely magical, thanks again guys.
Highly recommend, beautiful place for a getaway weekend.
Absolutely stunning cottage / beautiful setting, kindly stocked cupboard and fridge with jams and breakfasts, clean as a whistle, lovely bedding etc - and in a great location. Highly recommend.

We had the most beautiful stay at Brooke and Peter’s cottage. Brooke was so good to communicate with the whole time which made it so easy to check in and out! The place was left in pristine condition with the most gorgeous character furniture and modern styling! Lots of little thoughtful touches like choccies, wine, breakfast cereals and toiletries! We can’t wait to go back and can’t fault the place!

Brooke & Peter have thought of everything. Such a beautiful, cosy, relaxing space, whether you want to sit in the garden, relax by the fire or enjoy a spa and a glass of wine. All the little details they’ve added make it such a special place to stay. Exceptionally clean, perfect balance of modern and old world charm, all the amenities you would need for however long you might stay - highly recommend.
A wonderful place to stay - a beautifully renovated cottage, with all the little extras that make for an amazing experience.

Lovely old cottage well placed for quick trips to the best wineries around.
Excellent weekend away!
A lovely location and a beautiful home to relax for a couple of days.
Beautiful, stylish cottage, in a perfect location in the Barossa. Very clean and cosy. Highly recommend staying here!

The best find! Could not have been happier with our choice of accommodation for our couple of days exploring the Barossa! Extremely clean, comfortable and so many thoughtful touches. Thank you! We will be back!
A cosy and immaculate historic cottage on the outskirts of Lyndoch - thank you for our long weekend break in a relaxing setting :)
An amazing place to stay! The cottage was so clean, tidy and felt like home. Brooke was incredibly quick with her replies and very hospitable. We cant wait to visit the Barossa again soon! X
A lovely little cosy cottage, super clean and very homely as well. Can't wait to come back!

This place was even better than the photos! The styling of the cottage was beautiful and it really felt like home. What we loved most was having access to a kitchen where we cooked breakfast each morning, rather than needing to go out for every meal. Such a relaxing environment and I can definitely see us coming back 😊
Highly recommend!

My friends and I had the most amazing stay. The house was absolutely stunning and super clean, and we were all very grateful for all the little things like the bathroom products, choccy on our pillow and how much was available in the kitchen!!! We got to see the possum too which was cute. Will 100% be back, thanks again guys!
Brooke and Peter are the ultimate hosts of a beautifully presented, cosy cottage. They have thoughtfully provided all of the important touches that you require for 5 star stay. Thank you!
A lovely stay in Lyndoch with a touch of history in this cottage. Loved the spa bath.

Clean and beautifully renovated and styled, felt very lux, especially with all the bathroom provisions. Good kitchen facilities, with tea and coffee plus breakfast provisions. Wish we had been able to stay longer and use more of the amenities like the huge spa bath!
There is no other word to describe Brooke & Peter’s beautiful cottage, other than perfect.
Well done Brooke and Peter. You have a gorgeous cottage and every detail was executed perfectly. Highly recommend and looking forward to our return

We absolutely loved our stay at Ironstone on Jollytown. The cottage is so well equipped and comfortable that it was lovely to spend time there relaxing around our Barossa exploring. The spa bath was a delight, as was the cosy lounge with fireplace. Very clean and many thoughtful touches throughout. Highly recommend for a wonderful getaway.

The cottage was absolutely wonderful - so beautifully styled and welcoming. Brooke and Peter are fantastic hosts - very quick to communicate with and very helpful when we were looking for winery recommendations. Probably the best BnB stay we have had. Would 100% recommend the cottage if you are looking for somewhere in the Barossa.
Brooke and Peter's place was amazing. Great location to base yourself out of to get to the wineries in the region. A relaxing, well furnished home in a quiet location. Well recommended

Brooke and Peter were efficient in communication. Everything was set up and presented amazing. Even though I locked myself out, Brooke was only 10-15 minutes away and was a life saver. Would stay again!!
The cottage has been beautifully styled and renovated for a very comfortable stay while exploring the Barossa. The spa was super and great at the end of the day. Would highly recommend

Absolutely delightful stay in this beautiful fully restored cottage. The thoughtful extra touches and ammenities was beyond expectations. Hubby and I are huge animal lovers and it was great to feed the 2 possums that live in the outside wine cellar and come out at night in the almond tree to greet you. The cottage was cosy and homely and everything was so thoughtfully thought out. Breakfast cereal packets in the cupboard, coffee pods, cartons of milk, butter, other condiments and bathroom ammenities were all at hand if wanted, those touches are what sets this place above others. Our first experience staying at an Airbnb and we worried as to what we should expect but was definitely beyond all expectations, Brooke was only a message away if we needed her and she was always prompt and helpful with our questions. I have recommended this cottage to family and friends for their next stay in the Barossa. If your looking for a home base in the Barossa then you can’t go past Ironstone on Jollytown, trust me you will not be disappointed especially if you love animals and want to interact with Jolly the possum and her mate. Thankyou Brooke and Peter for a beautiful week at the Barossa ☺️ xx
Beautiful place to stay, not only the home the garden and serenity is more than lovely. If you're looking for somewhere to unwind and relax this is the place to stay. :)

Had a wonderful stay at Brooke and Peter’s cottage. It’s located near the main strip of shops and was a quiet and peaceful area. The Airbnb itself was beautiful, comfortable and the hosts made it very easy to check in. Will definitely return!
Really clean and comfortable with everything you need. Would definitely recommend.

Our stay was absolutely wonderful. We felt at home as soon as we walked in the door. The location is fantastic with very easy access to shops, cafes and wineries. The space is beautiful, cozy and clean. The kitchen is well appointed and we ate most of our meals in the home to make use of it. One of the best airbnbs we have stayed at!
Went over the Christmas weekend, had an amazing experience! Brooke and Peter went above and beyond to make everything perfect. The house was clean and cozy, couldn’t recommend it more!

A great location from which to explore the Barossa. A beautiful cottage, well appointed and presented immaculately. Very thoughtfully styled with great facilities, and lots of little touches to make our stay comfortable.

Highly recommended!
The cottage was immaculately presented and such a beautiful calming space for a relaxing get away.

Perfect little cottage for a weekend Barossa getaway! The place is filled with amazing amenities and thoughtful touches. One of the best AirBnBs I’ve ever stayed in. Kitchen is perfectly equipped with everything you could need to cook a proper meal. Thank you so much for having us in your beautiful home!
Beautiful clean and delightful home in a great location.  Would come back and stay again in the future!

My partner and I had a wonderful two-night stay at Ironstone on Jollytown. It was the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in! So many thoughtful touches... breakfast supplies (including local jams!), a bottle of wine, chocolates by our bed, a bath bomb and tea candles for the bath and so much more. The place is so well equipped and has everything you will need for a relaxing stay in the Barossa. Highly recommend!
The place was absolutely gorgeous and Brooke and Peter's personal touches made the stay so nice. We will definitely be recommending our friends to stay here!

Amazing place to stay! I don’t think I have stayed anywhere this beautiful with every detail and touch thought about (little butters, jams, teas, milk, beautiful bathroom products). Loved the location, not too far to travel to the wineries and into town. Will definitely be back!
Amazing cottage with everything you could ask for. Brooke was an excellent host. Would highly recommend it to anyone.

We had a lovely stay. The cottage was beautifully renovated with modern amenities and very stylish furnishings all while preserving the history of the building with the many touches of the 1800 era. Easy check in and great communication from Brooke. A great location within walking distance to some local wineries and an ideal base to explore the Barossa. Will definitely be recommending this place to family and friends heading up that way.
Lovely space with great amenities and is located in a perfect area with plenty to do.

a truely exceptional cottage that has been renovated to such an amazing level. Brooke and Peter have created an amazing space and everything from the decor, amenities and linen has been impeccably chosen to deliver an all round perfect experience. thank you again for having us!
The place was clean and welcoming. Had a very relaxing weekend
Brooke and Peter's house was lovely, it had absolutely beautiful decor and some thoughtful little touches. A very nice place to relax.

Brooke and Peter's cottage was beautiful, it was our home away from home. All the amenities were well thought of and the location was fantastic for visting all the wineries. It was perfect to come back to and rest after a long day! Could not recommend highly enough.
Gorgeous cottage, impeccably presented. Everything you need for a classy stay. Good facilities, highly recommend.

Brooke & Peter’s place is a beautiful, quaint cottage. It’s perfect for a getaway to the Barossa Valley. The cottage is beautifully styled and the little extra touches were so lovely.
We loved our stay and will definitely be back! Thank you!!

Thank you for a beautifully presented place.
Lovely flowers and butterflies and dragonflies in the garden too!!

Thanks for a great place

Brooke & Peter's place is beautifully furnished, spotlessly clean and very comfortable. Brooke is an excellent host who has put a huge amount of thought into anticipating everything her guests would need for a perfect stay. Lovely bathroom products, breakfast provisions and local wine were generously provided. The linen and towels are high quality. The kitchen is well equipped for self catering although the location is perfect for visiting wineries and restaurants in the Barossa. Communication and check in were very easy and we would definitely stay here again and have no hesitation in recommending it.
Fantastic house, beautifully furnished with lots of lovely touches. We had a wonderful time and will certainly come back.

The most beautiful cottage! In a great location, walking distance from cafes and only a short drive from wineries. The cottage itself is spacious, clean and perfectly furnished. Definitely recommend staying here whilst exploring the Barossa.

Perfect place for a Barossa getaway. Location is great & accomodation is 5 star. It is just like staying in a 5 star boutique hotel but with the luxury of being in the privacy of your own home. Lots of extras & thougtful touches make this a very special AirBnb. Highly recommend!!
Very lovely home, that we instantly fell in love with. So clean and the hosts are very thoughtful.
Brooke and Peter’s have created an ideal spot to stay in the Barossa. The cottage has been beautifully renovated with modern features and a few historic touches. It was a lovely and relaxing getaway.
A totally gorgeous property. Stylishly decorated, quality bedding, so many beautiful spaces to enjoy and pretty gardens. Thanks for everything.

What a gem this Airbnb is! Such a beautiful cottage, modern yet in keeping with the heritage of the property. Very clean and well equipped, the extra touches (bath robes, chocolates by the bed, homemade bath bomb etc) made our stay even more special. Great location to explore the beautiful Barossa and Brooke’s communication was brilliant and quick, keen to help in any way she can. Will definitely be staying here again if we are ever in the Barossa and will be recommending this place to our friends! Thank you so much! Siân and Stefano

For anyone looking to stay in the Barossa, this is the perfect place to book. We were blown away by how charming and cosy Brooke and Peter’s cottage was, and loved the little touches that they provided to make us feel more than welcome. The house and garden were so lovely and comfortable, it was hard to convince ourselves to go out and adventure around the valley. We cannot wait to be able to visit again!
Amazing! Loved the house! We will be back

Brooke and Peter’s place is a beautiful old stone cottage which has been sensitively preserved; this however doesn’t mean it isn’t equipped with everything you’ll need during your stay. The kitchenette is well kitted out and the cereals, porridge, condiments, tea and coffee provided are a wonderful addition, particularly if you just want to grab a quick breakfast at home before heading out exploring. The bed was comfortable, the shower powerful (always a bonus) and the toiletries provided left you feeling and smelling amazing. Lastly Lyndoch provides a great place to explore the Barossa from and there are also cafes and wineries within walking distance (check out God’s Hill wines, highly recommend it!) as well as a few places to eat at night if you don’t fancy venturing far.

Fantastic spot to stay in the Barossa. Close to all the major wineries. We stayed here for a wedding in the area and it was so nice to come back and relax in a beautiful space. We had breakfast in the garden as the weather was so good, very relaxing. Thank you!
Such a beautiful place to stay and Brooke and Peter are so lovely

This was such a wonderful place to stay. Brooke & Peter are by far, the best hosts we've ever had.
The home was incredibly beautiful & such a comfortable place to stay while in the Barossa. I cannot fault anything about the stay! It was PERFECT.
Loved this cottage. So clean, great amenities and awesome communication with owners.

Brooke and Peter have done an outstanding job with the presentation of their property. A charming house that is tastefully decorated and everything you could need  provided. Absolutely sparkling clean and a bottle of excellent wine as well.

A hidden gem in the Barossa. An extremely clean and welcoming cottage. A wonderful place to stay and relax. Great value for money with everything you might need for a lovely time away to explore this fantastic region.

The location was great and close to all things the Barossa has to offer.  Brooke's  cottage had everything we could possibly need and was perfectly clean. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend
We had an amazing stay! The cottage was clean with everything you could possibly need, in a great location too. Communication with the host was easy, would highly recommend!
Such a gorgeous little place - so tastefully decorated, modern enough without losing any of its historic charm. Great communication from Brooke throughout. Thanks for a lovely stay!

Brooke and Peter went above and beyond to help us have a wonderful stay in the Barossa.
The house was immaculately clean!
All the extra touches in the house were excellent and the bed and linens were super comfy.

Gorgeous cottage!! We stayed 2 nights and wished we stayed longer. The home felt so cozy and was perfect for ultimate relaxation. Brooke and Peter were very helpful with their communication and recommendations as well.

Brooke and Peter were the perfect hosts. Their cottage is in the perfect location and just beautifully decorated and renovated. It was a super comfortable stay and communication and the ease of check in and check out made it so easy. We will definitely be coming back in the future.
This listing is exactly like the photos. The bath tub was nice and big. Brooke & Peter were very helpful throughout the stay. We would recommend staying here.

This gorgeous cottage was the perfect base for a few days in the Barossa. Great communication with Brooke from booking through to after check out and very comfortable and well appointed accommodation. Would definitely recommend and stay again!!
Perfect little cottage with all you could possibly want. Every room was gorgeous, just like the pictures show. Definitely recommend staying here.

The hosts have made this BnB like a home away from home. Their attention to detail was incredible. Such a picturesque cottage. Warm, inviting, peaceful, relaxing. Couldn’t have asked for a better place to enjoy the Barossa. You will not be disappointed. Thank you Brooke & Peter.

Highly recommend Brooke and Peters Cottage. Its as cute and cosy as it looks, very well appointed and in a great location. The hosts have put a lot of thought into what is important for guests and exceeded our expectations. Will be back for sure.

Reg and Rob

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Ironstone. The cottage is in a great location short drive to the main part of town and it has plenty of character. The home was beautifully decorated. Brooke and Peter were very responsive to any enquiries.
Beautiful with chilled out vibes in Lyndoch. Such a thoughtfully presented cottage - really stylish interiors with quality appliances and linens. Nothing is left to chance. Highly recommended.
Beautiful house and location, had a lovely stay and will definitely be back!
This is a 5-star place! Brooke and Peter have created a fantastic AirBnB and have immaculate attention to detail. Don't look any further, if this place is free, book it!

Brooke and Peter’s cottage is beautiful, perfect place for a relaxing getaway in the Barossa.
The attention to detail made our stay very enjoyable.

Thank you for the hospitality and for providing such a beautiful cottage for us to stay in. The cottage is located very close to what the barossa has to offer and is very convenient. We will be back in the future!
Ironstone Cottage is a fantastic place to stay. A beautifully appointed cottage with everything you need and beautiful extras, all set in a wonderful cottage garden. A great location.

Brooke and Peter were the greatest hosts. Communication was amazing and very accommodating. The best bnb experience ever. The cottage is beautiful and immaculate, and we loved every minute of staying there. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a nice getaway.
Nice small touches & beautifully furnished, would recommend to anyone 😊
Brooke & Peters cottage is such a beautiful & clean home with so much character! Amazing location, so relaxing but still loads to do in surrounding areas. Will definitely be back.

Would definitely recommend booking here! It was a lovely cottage and super close to an abundance of wineries. Brooke and Peter have an incredible taste and provide amazing amenities - can’t wait to book again in future ❤️

We had the most beautiful stay at Brooke & Peter’s house. The communication from Brooke leading in was second to none, and I couldn’t recommend the place highly enough. In a great location on the doorstep of the Barossa. The cottage was so beautifully and tastefully furnished, it was very cosy and homely, whilst it also had a very luxurious feel. We can’t wait to stay here again. The bottle of wine on arrival was a great touch. Thanks Brooke & Peter.
absolutely beautiful cottage, spotless and perfectly presented.  will be recommendingto all my family and friends
Perfect place for a getaway. The place is highly maintained felt like 5 star hotel. The decorations is beautiful, had it fell like home. Comfortable beds. Great SPA!

Highly recommend! I have pretty high standards of cleanliness and styling and these were certainly met here. Linen was beautiful quality and great location to visit all my favourite wineries in the Barossa.
Charming, modernized and well equipped character cottage with lovely gardens.  Very well equipped and well located!

Beautiful cottage in a quiet part of town. Close to so many wineries to enjoy during your stay!
Fully equipped with everything you could need plus fireplaces to keep you extra warm during the winter months.
House was clean, tidy and maintained very well.
Lovely cottage.  Brooke and Peter were very helpful. Beautiful garden. Very clean. Beds comfortable. A great place to stay in the Barossa.

Absolutely wonderful cottage. The cottage is so clean, modern, comfortable and spacious. The spa bath is to die for and the bed was super comfortable. Brooke and Peter were very informative and accomodating hosts. The added touches and complimentary items like the wine on arrival, preferred choice of milk and pod coffee machine made the experience all the more better. Can’t recommend this place enough!
The best Airbnb stay I’ve stayed in. Clean, cosy, stylish, comfortable and affordable, ticks all the boxes. Will absolutely be back!
Fantastic little cottage. Loved the attention to the little details. Fantastic communication. Would definitely recommend!

It was the perfect place for us to spend our honeymoon. Such an amazing home and kept clean and perfect like a 5 star hotel.
Thank you for an incredible stay.
Beautiful place to stay , everything was fantastic.

Thank you Brooke and Peter. What a perfect cottage for some time to relax, discover and simply enjoy. Your attention to detail, helpful hints and generosity made this a break we will not forget. We can’t wait to visit again. We will certainly be recommending your cottage to family and friends. ❤️❤️
A beautiful place for a quiet getaway…
Beautifully renovate cottage in a perfect spot in the Barossa.

Brooke and Peter’s air bnb was an absolutely stunning place to stay. All the furnishings and decor were gorgeous and we had all the ammenities we needed. Brooke was also very quick to respond to any of my messages which made it an even more enjoyable experience. Highly recommend!
Very cute little cottage in the heart of the Barossa. We loved our stay.

absolute fabulous in every way. It met my expectations and more.  Just clean, totally awesome location and delightful place to pick for an airbnb getaway retreat for the barossa. Would definitely stay here again,  recommend to my friends and family!

We loved our stay at Brooke and Peters place. A beautiful home, very tidy and comfortable. Great spaces to relax and unwind, indoor and out. Loved all the little special touches provided.
Brooke was very helpful in providing some great recommendations of places to visit in the area. Would definitely stay again!

This was an absolute gem of an find! Absolutely LOVED our stay - very clean and well decorated house, beautifully equipped and easy check-in. Great communication with the hosts prior to arrival as well! Highly recommend this place to stay!

We enjoyed 3 days at Ironstone Cottage in Lyndoch, a great stepping point to the Barossa Valley wineries, galleries and farms.   Accommodation is luxurious and the renovation and styling of the cottage is exceptional.  Little touches such as library room, electrical fireplaces, outdoor seating area in a well established cottage garden were greatly appreciated and ensure an atmospheric stay.  Our hosts couldn’t have been more thoughtful.  We highly recommend this property.

Dear Brooke and Peter, thank you so much for letting us stay in your beautiful home. Everything was perfect. We have appreciated the cleanliness and attention to details. We were torn between the desire to go out exploring the Barossa and the pleasure of staying at home enjoying this relaxing environment, listening music and sipping a glass of red wine which was made available to us.
The location is very handy to reach every place in the Barossa with very short drive.
We haven’t met Brooke but communication was perfect and we also had tips for places to see in the nearby areas. Self check-in very easy! Truly recommended!

Gorgeous place to stay, luxurious, very clean, great attention to detail. Highly recommend staying here. Visit Kies wines for some great wine tasting and delicious food next door at the monkey nut cafe
Amazing Cottage with everything you could need!!

An absolute home away from home, rain or shine. The mattress is super comfortable and supports the back very well. The kitchen is more than fully equipped from peanut butter and vegemite to Carman's cereal to olive oil to clingwrap to steak knives to casserole dishes to my favourite Nespresso Machine with generous amounts of coffee pods. And lots more... The separate areas for dining and living and reading space mean that we can enjoy "me" and "us" time together as a couple. Heating and air conditioning ensures we are always comfortable whatever weather we have when we are in the Barossa.  Thank you Brooke and Peter for sharing your home with us.
A very well presented house. Their communication is timely and courteous. Felt very welcome!
An absolute gem. Beautifully presented. Just perfect. Will definitely be back.

OUTSTANDING! Brooke and Peter were life savers! 24 hours out from my wedding we had a cancellation and no where to stay. I jumped on Air Bnb and found this absolute gem. Brooke was fast to reply and ended all panic stations fast!

The cottage itself is absolutely gorgeous. So clean and the bed was so comfy!

We hope to be back one day!
Thanks again guys

Thank you again for the hospitality, this is our second stay in this cottage the accomodation and amenities are the best the Barossa have to offer! This is definitely the best place to stay for a weekend getaway with plenty of restaurants and cellar doors nearby. :)
Great stay

The most perfect barossa stay we could have asked for. Thank you Brooke & Peter for hosting such a wonderful weekend. Your cottage is divine, impeccably renovated and spotlessly clean. Your attention to detail is second to none. We would love to stay here again. Thank you x
Brooke and Peter’s beautiful cottage was a lovely place to spend a few days. Quiet and peaceful surrounded by beautiful gardens, l would highly recommend a visit

This is a lovely stay right at the entrance way to the Barossa. Great location to base day trips to wineries, whilst the cottage itself has been lovingly restored and renovated to be up to date. Whilst staying there the amenities were perfect, everything functioned exactly as stated and the privacy and seclusion of the cottage feels like you don’t have neighbours.
Would definitely recommend this beautiful cottage to those going to the Barossa and we look forward to staying again!

What a beautiful cottage located in Lyndoch, not more than 15 minutes from the nearest wineries and cafes. We were impressed with the level of cleanliness and standard of communication from the owners.
What a great place! Clean, quiet and beautiful home with everything you need for a comfortable stay. Highly recommend.
A beautiful space, highly recommend a stay at Brooke and Peter’s charming cottage!

We loved our 3 night stay - it is a beautiful cottage, very clean and comfortable with everything you need and more!
Great communication with the friendly hosts.
We have recommended to friends and family already and we hope to return again soon.
5 stars for sure!
Thanks, Jackie

We loved our stay in the Barossa. The cottage had everything we could need and we spent a lot of time unwinding there in between wineries. Lots of thoughtful touches too. We would not hesitate to return.

This is a gem of a property in the Barossa valley. Not only is it incredibly clean and modern, Brooke and Peter’s personal touches and punctual communication made the whole process so seamless. This is easily the best Airbnb experience I’ve had from communication, to cleanliness, to first class amenities. Thank you Brook and Peter for this experience! Already recommended to multiple of our friends!
A very clean and quaint cottage with beautiful gardens a short drive away from many local wineries. Brooke and Peter were easy to communicate with and helpful with recommendations. Great stay!

We had an excellent stay at Brooke and Peter’s place. Beautiful property, you can tell they have a really good eye for detail. Brooke and Peter were very prompt in responding to our communications and they provided all the information we needed to be able to enjoy our stay and check in/out easily. Would highly recommend staying at Brooke and Peter’s - perfect for a Barossa Valley getaway. Thanks Brooke and Peter :-)

Beautiful, well maintained spot with lovely new renovations!
Will definitely be back.
House was even better than described. Communication with hosts was great. Enjoyed our time there and would definitely recommend the house as a place to stay.
Beautifully furnished, great location for exploring the Barossa. We loved it.

One of the better places we’ve ever stayed. An absolute dream of a cottage where the hosts have thought of every little thing. From Aalking through the garden and smelling the fresh flowers to the amenities throughout the cottage. It is a slice of luxury in the Barossa

This was an amazing place to stay in the Barossa. Great location, we could walk to local cafes, restaurants and shops. The house was lovely with lots of special touches throughout that made it feel like home. This is somewhere we will absolutely recommend and hope to stay again. Thank you Maz.
If you're going to the Barossa Valley this is the perfect place to stay. Great location and hosts, would 100% stay here again.
Superb location with great access to the Barossa. A nice house with nice touches. Maz was a great host and full of helpful advice.

My partner and I had an amazing stay at Tal Haus. The location was perfect, we could walk into the main shopping area of Tanunda within about 2 minutes and were well situated to explore all parts of the Barossa, all within about 10 minutes drive. Maz was very thoughtful and left a very substantial amount of food for us - my partner loved the honey biscuits from Apex Bakery so much he ate the whole jar! Would definitely recommend Tal Haus to family and friends.

Beautiful, comfortable home that was perfect for exploring the Barossa! Fantastic location to walk into Tanunda.

We appreciated the super-sharp knives when we decided to stay in and make the most of the kitchen :)
Beautiful house in a fantastic location. Can not fault.
Great place, 1 min walk to everything on Main Street Tanunda but doesn’t feel like Main Street at at all. Perfect location and everything you need for a few nights stay in barossa
Great location, value for money and loved the fine local touches. Would recommend to a friend :)

What a fabulous home well and truly exceeded our expectations and with a lovely and welcoming host, we felt right at home. Small thoughtful additions throughout made our stay even more comfortable and local visiting family envious of our accommodation.

I wouldn't hesitate in recommending this property and when we return we know exactly where we'll be staying. Absolutely wrapped with our choice and such a beautiful space and area that we will truly miss.

Thank you for such a warm and inviting stay to host Maz :)
Maz's place was clean and welcoming, the furnishings were very comfortable and the location is walking distance from everything you need. A great place to stay.
Great location just a short walk to town centre.
Such a perfect place to stay for a weekend getaway. Sparkling clean, close to everything and so many beautiful, thoughtful extras such as local produce for our brekkie. Will definitely be back!

Thanks Maz for providing such a clean and tidy accommodation. The house has everything we need. The host is very nice and suggested a few local cellar doors and restaurants to us which were amazing. A very enjoyable stay, highly recommended.

Maz’s house is perfectly located, very comfortable and clean. It’s extremely well equipped, and she leaves provisions for a great breakfast, along with tea, coffee, lovely ginger biscuits, and other basics.

‘Tal Haus’ is a beautifully restored and tastefully decorated home right in Tanunda. Maz was excellent to communicate with and left thoughtful provisions for us. As we arrived late from interstate this was really appreciated. Restaurants, shops and hotels are within walking distance and many wineries, distilleries and other providores are within a short driving distance.
Comfortable beds, generous living areas and beautiful gardens made for a very relaxing stay. Thank you - Fiona and Reeve - Gold Coast

Great location, lovely host. Beautiful home, perfect for creating sweet holiday memories. Suited our family- our toddler had lots of space to roam and explore. Loved the  motion sensor night lights- handy at night in an unfamiliar space. Highly recommend this home.

Maz goes the extra mile to make you feel comfortable and welcome in her lovely home, the house was spotless and in a great location to walk around the Tanunda area. Close to shops, wineries and local bars and restaurants. Highly recommended

We were super happy from the time we pulled into driveway until we pulled out. Best air bnb I’ve stayed in. So many thoughtful touches. From the breakfast supplies to the automatic lighting. The location was perfect, the story of the house itself, just lovely.  I could go on and on. Do yourself a favour and book now!  Oh and I would like to give a shout out to the bed and the linen that was just sensational! If I could give more than 5 stars I would.
Great location. Great hospitality.
Great location and stay full of thoughtful touches whilst we were exploring Barossa - would definitely recommend!

Comfortable and enjoyable stay. Very helpful information booklet in the home to help explore the area. The beds have beautiful comfortable linen and home in stylish with a touch of its original state too. Great host and communication

Amazing. This was a super treat. The home was beautiful. They had really gone out of their way to make sure us 'the Guests' in the home were looked after. From a stocked Pantry and Fridge to beautiful comfy bedding. The home was spotless. The home is located in the perfect spot, we got to enjoy walking through Tanunda and trying out the amazing restaurants there.  We will definitely be back.  Thank you so much Maz.
Maz’s place is fantastic, spacious & clean in a great location. Highly recommended!

Maz has a beautiful place in the best location, walking distance to every where in Tanunda. She will give you advice on the best places to eat, drink and see in the Barossa. Very helpful. Great large house, value for money. So happy with our stay! Highly recommend, we will be back!
A great property, perfect location and wonderful ongoing communication and support from the host.

Well positioned, easy walk to shops and restaurants. Some noise which could be expected being on the main road. House stay cool during the 42c heat wave and the air conditioning worked very well. Nice supplies for breakfast.

Maz's place is a very comfortable cottage right in the centre of Tanunda. It has everything you need; all the amenities, clean and tidy, easy access, only a few steps to the shopping mall, etc, etc.

What else can we say except that it is a great place to stay if you want to explore the Barossa.

We highly recommend this place.
Awesome place, really clean and so comfortable, will definitely go back

Very comfortable 2 bedroom & 1 bathroom (no en-suite) old style house and lovely linen and furnishings. Close to Barossa wineries - Seppeltveld, Jacobs Creek, Chateau Tanunda & Maggie Beers Farm. Maz left lovely supplies of local produce for breakfast & snacks. Lots of local advice and info. An hour to Hahndorf. Thank you.
What a great place to stay. Perfect position in Tanunda and a lovely house. Decore is very nice and so homely. I definately want to go back for a longer stay. Thank you Maz.
Best place to stay in the Barossa for both location and value. The place itself was larger than expected and had everything we could have wanted. Highly recommended.

Nice place, very clean, comfy beds. Didn’t get to spend much down time in the house as the weekend was very busy for us, which was unfortunate as it felt so homely and inviting. Would recommend to friends. Thanks again Maz for accommodating us.
Max's place is an antic place but yet modern with all amenities provided. Its highly recommended for a place in Tanunda
Great cottage in a beautiful town.

This little gem was in such a brilliant location moments walk from cafes wineries and very central to touring the region. Place was clean and comfortable, great stack of toys for the kids. Will be back
Great house. Beautiful house. Amazing location. Highly recommend.
A neat and tidy little house with an outstanding location and thoughtful hostess. Highly recommend.

Maz’s place is in the perfect location for exploring Tanunda - the heart of the Barossa. Everything you need is within walking distance. The house itself is spacious, clean and homely with great amenities. A local selection of breakfast foods is provided which is a lovely added bonus. Highly recommend.

Our family had a wonderful time staying at Tal Haus. Tal Haus is centrally located in Tanunda and walking distance to shops, bakeries and cafes. Maz is a great host and was always more than happy to answer our questions about the region and local wineries. Our family loved the local produce and snacks provided, it was more than generous. Thank you for making our trip to Barossa an excellent one!

Was such a lovely place to stay. Super central and just a 30sec stroll away from a lovely wine bar to get you started on your tastings. Maz was excellent at communicating and the place was beautiful and tidy

House was lovely! Very clean and tidy.
Great location right near the local shops, cafes and restaurants.
Maz was very attentive and responsive with very clear instructions.
Great recommendations for activities

Maz is the Ultimate host, the house was lovely, postioned in the centre of town, I will stay here on my next visit to Barossa if available.

Thank you

David
Great place to explore Tanunda and the Barossa.
物有所值，一切都是完美的，院子很漂亮，超市就在边上，房间很干净，床品高级又舒服，红酒杯也是高级的，还有好多宝宝的玩具，宝宝都很开心，特别惊喜的是房东准备了特别丰富的早餐还有零食，真想多住几天，推荐推荐，满分满分！
A lovely home that's perfectly situated between wineries and restaurants in the Barossa Valley. Thank you for having us for the weekend.

We had a lovely stay here. Comfy beds, tastefully decorated, very clean and lots of extras. Coffee, breakfast supplies and snacks! Games and toys for the kids were also a nice touch. Fantastic location and easy to find. A lovely little home away from home.
美丽的巴罗萨，热情的西拉子美酒，可爱的酒厂，还有最好的房东和住房！厨房和客厅宽敞明亮，位置极佳又很好找，完美的一段旅程！
Absolutely loved it! Perfect walking distance to town and not far from wineries. Beautiful touch with the food!!

Tal Haus is located perfectly in the heart of the Barossa- easy to walk around Tanunda to many good pubs , restaurants
and vineyards.The home is comfortable and Maz has done a lovely job mixing new with old. The bed was very comfortable and quiet to sleep , also had block out shutters to make room extra dark. Ceiling fans and AC also made the home comfortable.
Breakfast provisions and other pantry staples was very appreciated. South Australian hospitality at its best.

Such a convenient location, right on the main street within walking distance of the retail centre of Tanunda.  The place is clean and tidy.  We enjoyed our stay here, and communication with Maz was excellent.

Outstanding hospitality! The house was very clean, the bedding was extremely comfortable and Maz was very thoughtful supplying food for breakfast. The house is in a perfect location and felt very private and secure.

A great location in the Main Street of Tanunda. Stylish and comfortable place with plenty of yummy provisions in the fridge and stylish touches throughout. Very comfortable place to stay while visiting the Barossa. 🍷🍷

Fantastic location, within walking distance of a number of great restaurants and wine bars/cellar doors.

Maz also gave us some great tips for which wineries to visit which we really appreciated. We were also able to check in a bit early and Maz was great at communicating with us in advance and on our day of arrival.

Thanks for a wonderful stay!
Nice place to stay and great location.

Tal Haus was a perfect location for walking to shops, cafes, restaurants and wine bars. We stayed with a baby so this couldn't have been more perfect. Used the kitchen a few times to cook breakfast and dinner. Lovely, local milk, bread and breakfast supplies provided. A very comfortable home away from home!
Great location, nice house, clean, good amenities, really comfortable beds.
Perfect location!! Tidy, clean and spacious!
Beautiful stay with lovely touches like great coffee machine and stylish furnishings. Place is very clean and beds really comfy.
The added touch of locally produced bread, milk and breakfast made our stay that extra bit memorable
Enjoyed our stay in a comfy home.

My partner and I had a lovely stay in Maz’s home. The location is perfect, right on the Main Street and within walking distance to cafes and the supermarket. The thoughtful touches of breakfast and chocolates made our stay even more special. She was very accommodating and was more than happy to allow us late check out so that we could go for a morning hike.

Great location, walking distance to lovely shops (Living by Design, Alabaster), terrific restaurants — Musque (the 5 course lunch is superb - so skip breakfast on the day), Vino Lokal (the Reuben is a religious experience), and Char Barossa (terrific burgers). Spacious house, nice living room, TV with great entertainment options, very comfy bed in Master bedroom.  Find time to visit the Barossa Chocolate Factory and drop by the Kalleske Cellar Door - primo vino lokal.

My wife and I really enjoyed staying here and would’ve stayed longer if we had the time. Maz made the whole experience easy and seamless. The house is large enough for a small family or a couple of friends.

The house comes equipped with everything you need. The laundry has a dryer and washer, bathroom has heating lamps with spare shampoo and hair dryer, lounge room has lots of streaming services, board games for families to play and a security blind for privacy. The bedrooms are large with plenty of cupboards to hang clothes for long stays. The kitchen really does have everything you can want and then some. Maz thoughtfully left bacon, eggs, bread, milk and juice to start your day.

It does get cold in Tanunda but there are heaters in most rooms including the kitchen.

Every room is beautifully decorated and feels like home. I would definitely stay here again.
Lovely place right in the heart of town. Some beautiful complimentary touches, will come again.

What a great little place.

The host made everything regarding the house easy and pleasant.

What needs to be emphasised is the closeness of this place to the middle of town... it's right there.

A lovely old home presented with tasteful furnishings & super comfy beds. Very close walking distance to excellent local dining options. Lovely provisions supplied (bacon, eggs, bread, milk, honey biscuits etc). Easy off street parking.

Fantastic location! Surrounded by fantastic restaurants, bars, cafes and cellar doors! Nice homely touches and a very comfortable bed! Maz was very thoughtful to supply breakfast and some lovely cookies to have with our coffee. Overall, we were really happy with our experience in the Barossa and can't wait to come back again soon! Many thanks!

Tal House is a lovely, well appointed home in an ideal location. A lot of extra special touches and features that are most appreciated, and make a home away from home. Excellent communication from start to finish and offers of assistance at any time are also appreciated. Local eateries and amenities within steps, and a lovely garden to enjoy. Highly recommend for anyone visiting the Barossa but wanting space, privacy and home comforts. Highly recommend Maz as a host and the lovely Tal House to any and all!

Maz's house was lovely, clean, and in a fantastic location.
lovely and cozy.
Thanks again!

Tal Haus is a beautiful home in a great location. On the main road and walking distance to all the shops and cafes, but far enough that there's not a lot of noisy foot traffic going past.
The house is very well kept for its age and we fell in love with it. Has just about everything you need, and so much space!
We'll be recommending to anyone we know that plans a Barossa trip, and will book again if we make it back to Tanunda one day.
Beautiful place, close to everything!!
Beautiful house, beautiful location, perfect spot 😊
Lovely home, perfect location, Maz was a great host.

Tal Haus is in an ideal location, beautifully appointed, with many extras & special touches to make you feel at home. The property is exceptionally clean & would suit couple/s or family combinations, an easy walk to main street cafes, restaurants & shops. We had a perfect stay in Tal Haus & would happily return on another occasion.
Great location close to cafe's, restaurants and wineries. Tal Haus has everything you need for your stay. Lots of thoughtful little touches. We thoroughly  enjoyed our stay and will be back again!

Maz’s place was absolutely fantastic. Best location right in the middle of town, the house is beautifully appointed with thoughtful and stylish touches throughout. Maz was super helpful and accommodating. We had a wonderful stay and would definitely stay again.
Awesome place right in town perfect for a quick getaway close to restaurants and wineries. Super easy weekend away
Maz’s place is simple but the attention to detail she’s put into making this a phenomenal place to stay is clear to see. It has absolutely everything you could hope for in a stay. Thanks again Maz!!

Maz’s home is the perfect place to base yourself for a weekend in the Barossa. So close to Tanunda’s Main Street restaurants and shops and not far from heaps of great wineries.

The house is clean and tidy with plenty of comfy touches- however we recommend bringing a torch as the interior lighting can be confusing and some lights don’t work.

The front porch is a great place to unwind with a local wine after a busy day tasting! We would definitely stay here again!
Wonderful location and excellent communication, would definitely stay here again in future.
Stylish home, with great amenities and the comfiest of beds for a night away

Quick response.
A nice place for famile.
Maz kindly provided us breakfast!
Great accommodation right in the middle of Tanunda. Highly recommended.
Excellent, well appointed house. Fantastic location.
Lovely house in a great location
Maz's place is located in a perfect spot in the middle of Tanunda. Great communication and spotlessly clean would definitely recommend.
Great house in a good location, would recommend! Loved the extra touch of providing breakfast foods and a pantry... house was clean and overall a very enjoyable stay.

We had a great time at Maz’s place. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. The neighborhood is very conveniently located. Would absolutely recommend to stay there.
Great place in a perfect location for exploring Tanunda and the Barossa. We loved the welcome provisions that Maz left for us. Maz was a very responsive host.
Great location and very clean house!
Great spot, so close to everything, the pantry was filled with enough to get us through & a lot of effort put in!
Wow what a beautiful stay right in the most perfect location. Maz was a fantastic host.. quick responses and the most amazing thoughtful touches around the house. 😊

Absolutely gorgeous place to stay!
Close to everything in Tanunda and just beautiful. Maz was a lovely host and everything was ready for us early because Maz was so accommodating! Would love to stay again.

Maz has a great place in Tanunda
So close to everything including walking distance to the grocery store, restaurants and easy to drive to wineries
Place was large and comfortable
Little touches like breakfast and fresh flowers were lovely
Would certainly recommend this property- particularly lovely to provide toys for the little ones.

A very clean place located in the heart of the CBD. Some small quirks with the light switches and room layouts but definitely nothing deal breaking.
Definitely some quirky art here too if that's your thing!
Great location. Nice big house with lots of space. The gardens are lovingly cared for.
Fantastic location, walking distance to many great eateries, wine bars, pubs and shops. Beautifully styled and many thoughtful inclusions.

Beautiful house in a great spot.
Maz is a awesome host

A perfect location in Tanunda for accessing the Barossa Valley!
Walking distance from local restaurants and cafes.
The house is well styled and clean, and the extra touches of providing some food for brekkie was so much appreciated. Whilst only there a night, we felt right at home.
Max provided some great suggestions and very clear instructions on how to check in/out.
Nothing to fault at all! A great Airbnb!
Sensational location and great communication from Maz... would recommend this B&B to anyone wanting to experience the Barossa. Cheers 🍷🍷

Lovely living areas beds and bedrooms.  Spacious kitchen and adequate bathroom. Communication great and generally convenient and comfortable place to stay. Thanks Mazz. Amazing meal at Vintners Bar and Grill.

Maz was a wonderful host. She had the whole house smelling wonderful and super clean. I loved the added touch of local produce for us to try for breakfast the next day. The beds were comfortable and the place felt very homey. The location is amazing and if you ask for suggestions, she will give you a long list of things that will keep you going for weeks. Definitely recommend
Beautiful house in the perfect location, could just walk to go out for dinner 😊

We had a lovely time as we were close to the wineries. Location was great! walking distance to the supermarket and to the restaurant or for tasting in ZWine, also we hired the bikes and it was great location to used the bikes too. Thank you.

Location was perfect, merely steps from 1918 and the main strip. House was homely with good heating/cooling. Yummy provisions left and access to TV streaming made it a home away from
home, thanks for a lovely stay!

Exceptional! Highly recommend staying here- the proximity to everything in town is amazing, the house was perfect for four people and Maz is a stunning host.
Wine and cheese on the porch was the place to be!

Maz left lots of little extras that we didn’t expect.
The house is about a 5 minute walk to restaurants and the hotel. Very convenient!
Thanks Maz

We had a great stay.  Can't beat the location in the center of Tanunda and so close to so many wineries, restaurants and shops.  Maz's place was exceedingly clean and we really appreciated the smart tv as our stay coincided with the recent lockdown.  The bed was one of the most comfortable we've ever slept on.  We'd definitely stay here again!
Great location.  Love the style, comfortable and lots of helpful information,

Fantastic location and a very neat and tidy house. Beds are very comfortable and bedrooms are spacious. Particular shoutout to the supplies provided for breakfast. Lovely fresh, local produce. Couldn't recommend this house more!

We had a great stay! The house is in a great location situated on the Main Street but far enough from the busy end to enjoy the quietness. The beds were really comfy and we definitely enjoyed breakfast that was provided to cook for the morning.

A very well positioned roomy house in the Barossa.

Very comfortable, be it for a couple or more.

We were well looked after.

If you ever after affordable, stylish and homely accommodation when visiting the Barossa you can look past this place. The home is quite large and furnished beautifully. There is a lovely kitchen which came with some local produce so you can save a bit by cooking meals yourself. Communication with the host was very easy and quick. The host offered advice on everything Barossa has to offer and explained the check in/check out process simply. My partner and I absolutely loved our stay, have recommended it to family and friends, and we’ll definitely be back.

A beautiful place in a perfect location to explore the Barossa. Lovely personal touches made this an excellent stay.

Maz was very helpful and easy to get in contact with.

I look forward to staying here again in the future.

We had a fabulous stay at Tal Haus. It’s within walking distance of some excellent bars and restaurants in Tanunda, as well as a handful of wineries. The house itself is huge and very clean and comfortable. The provisions left for breakfast were a really welcome touch. We would absolutely stay here again! Thanks Maz!
Great location,  man street of tanunda, close to wineries and supermarket. Great host.

Maz was great - we were doing some wine tours and she let us drop some food we needed to keep cold around to her home before check in. She then put it in the fridge at our accommodation for us. That was a huge help.

The house itself is in a good location on the main road. It is spacious and tidy, but not flash. The bathroom and kitchen are a bit older, but have everything you need. Nice living room space. Heaps of parking space but no lawn.

A fantastic home in a brilliant location - right in the heart of Tanunda. Clean, stylish and spacious rooms, and a few little treats in the kitchen which we really appreciated. We were also welcomed with Christmas decorations which added such a nice touch to our holiday stay. Our little one loved roaming the halls and also the toy box 😊
The host was very friendly and accommodating. We had everything we needed for a great stay.
A real home away from home - thank you!

Maz’s place is such a clean, welcoming and spacious place to stay. It is very conveniently located next to shops, cafes, restaurants and stones throw to some magnificent wineries. We would not hesitate recommend Tal Haus to anyone!

Amazingly convenient location yet still quiet enough at night. Generous pantry supplies. Very spacious home and comfortable living areas. Thorough and friendly communications. Would happily stay here again when we are next in the Barossa. Thanks Maz!
Maz was a great host that let us check in early. Milk, eggs and bacon in the fridge. Big house and an amazingly close location. Great living room for the family to enjoy.
Good location!
This place is wonderful! Nothing to fault.
We had a short but enjoyable stay at Tal Haus.  House is spacious and very clean, the bed super comfy. Delicious brekkie provisions, more than enough for 2 people. Next time will stay longer!

Highly recommend staying at this humble abode. Best location and walking distance to restaurants and cafes. Maz stocked up the fridge with eggs, milk, bacon, bread, juice and plenty more which was very thoughtful and convenient. There is a grocery store just around the corner aswell. We loved our stay! It is a very cosy and pretty cottage with everything you need. Maz was very lovely and responded fast. Thankyou Maz :)
Great little place to stay
Stayed 2 nights with my wife and 4 month old. Great location, nice house. Items for breakfast were supplied which was fantastic. Thanks for having us.

Tal Haus is a fantastic base for exploring Tanunda and the Barossa.  If it was any closer to the middle of town we would have had to sort the mail :), and it is such a lovely house. It stayed cool on a 39 degree day and is cool in lots of other ways, with interesting prints and other decorations.  Sparkling clean and well appointed, and we really appreciated the guidebook Maz has put together, it was a great resource to help plan our stay.  Would come back in a heartbeat.

Such a great location! Everything was easy.  Maz left brochures and personal recommendations for restaurants etc.  The shower was great and there was even bacon and eggs in the fridge!  Dear old house, full of character, highly recommend.

Spent 2 days here and had an excellent stay. The location was perfectly situated where it was easy to get around (abundance of restaurants and shops within walking distance). The house was cosy and had plenty of space which was nice.
Great location, lovely home. Definitely recommend
Excellent location for all your evening activities. Good quality smart TV and very comfortable bed. Good safe sheltered off-street parking.
Fantastic location, would stay again.

I had a lovely (unfortunately short) stay at Maz's beautiful house. The house was very comfortable and homely. So so close to shops and cellar doors! The creative curating was a nice touch- the art, books and games were all enjoyed. Really loved a late check out and having breakfast provided. Thanks again for an awesome stay.

Maz was very responsive and gave so much local insight before our arrival. The place was as described, so close to places with great food and the local supermarket. Would definitely recommend staying here. Thanks Maz!

Our second stay at Tal Hause and again exceeded all our needs. Maz is a very generous host and provides pantry staples, local bread and bacon, lovely bathroom products and great quality furniture, sheets and towels.
This is a lovely home and perfectly located in Tanunda and easy walk to pubs , restaurants, supermarkets and all Tanunda has to offer. We hope to come back again.
A lovely spacious quirky home with everything you need in the heart of Tanunda. You will enjoy the hospitality and very generous host.
it was close to all amenities in Tanunda

Maz's place was absolutely fantastic, her place was super clean and very homely. The house is incredibly close to the town centre of  Tanunda with shops and bars a short walk away.  Maz was also kind enough to leave some essentials in the fridge and pantry for us which was a very nice touch, recommendations for the surrounding area were also spot on. Great stay and would highly recommend.
Beautiful big house right in the centre of town! It has everything you need for a comfortable stay!

This was the perfect base for our short trip to the Barossa. Maz was super helpful with local recommendations and easy to communicate. We had a very comfortable stay and I would certainly come back if I get the chance!
Very convenient, within walking distance of cafes and restaurants. comfortable, super clean and spacious.

This cottage is lovely, sparklingly clean and in a great location.
Our Host left us plenty of provisions such as tea,coffee and breakfast supplies. Check in and out simple and easy. Can recommend!

Loved staying at Maz’s place! Picturesque little house in a great location, walking distance to the main strip. Well equipped with some lovely little touches like bacon and eggs. Very clean! And worlds comfiest bed ☺️ Would love to come back one day.

Maz is a dream to deal with! I asked for recommendations  and received so many wonderful suggestions! The house is clean and beautiful, lots of homely touches as well. It’s well located in Tanunda  with many wineries and cellar Doors close by :) would stay again in a heartbeat ! Xx
A good spot, super clean and very handy to the restaurants of the Main Street yet also very quiet

We had a wonderful stay at Tal Haus. The location is in walking distance to Tanunda's best restaurants, and a great base for driving to wineries and other attractions in the area, everything is so close. The house had everything we needed, including yummy breakfast provisions,  and it was great to sit on the front verandah with some Barossa wine and cheese at the end of a day exploring.
Great place, great location,  very clean and lots of nice personal touches.
The house is very well appointed, extremely clean and with the comfiest bed!  Very well located for a stay in Tanunda or the Barossa.  Highly recommended!
Maz is a fantastic host. The house is perfect for a weekend away. Walking distance to everything you could need.
Great home in a convenient spot. Soooo clean and tidy and loved the considerate touches. Eg fresh bacon eggs, tomatoes and milk for breakfast. The place had everything we needed.

Maz's place is spacious, clean, comfortable and very conveniently located to explore the Barossa. The place is full of thoughtful touches to make your stay easy, and there's a great guide book with loads of local recommendations that we found really handy! Would highly recommend.
Great location. Beds were very comfortable.

Excellent location, great space and very clean and tidy.
Maz was super friendly and contactable if required. We had a great time. :)
Max’s place was great. Very clean and comfortable. Has everything needed and nice and central to everything. Very nice and homely and warm touches. Thanks again
Great location!
Had a wonderful time at Tal Haus! The house was perfect for our little Barossa getaway and were spoilt by the breakfast options provided by Maz.

We had a great stay. It’s right in town and Maz has thought of everything. I loved that there was a coffee machine, but she even supplied pods!!! It’s clean and the furniture is comfortable and modern. There are lots of extra quirks that Maz has thought of like leaving bacon, eggs, milk, juice and more!
Would definitely recommend staying here!

The location is perfect as it is within a short walk to all cafes and bars.  The home is very comfortable and very welcoming.  It is also the cleanest Airbnb I have stayed in.  The breakfast provisions provided were plentiful and the choice was fantastic from cereal to the full egg and bacon breakfast.  I truly recommend this home to anyone that wants to stay in Tanunda as you do not want for anything.
amazing cottage in the heart of Tanunda.
Nice place in an awesome location.

A great stay, such a lovely home. Very clean with everything you need. Huge kitchen, nice dining and living area. Great bedrooms.
Loved the brekkie items.
Everything was perfect.

Great place to stay in the heart of Barossa. The beds are the most comfiest iv ever slept in. The breakfast and snack inclusions are an extra little bonus. You do hear a bit of light traffic noise in the morning,  but nothing Ear plugs can't sort out and it's. fabulous stay! would highly recommend :)
Great location, comfortable living area and bed too. Kitchen has all you need and highly recommend 1918 restaurant and Z WINE.
Maz is a fabulous and responsive host. We had a wonderful stay, Tal House is in an awesome location and has everything you need! Hope to be back soon.
Fabulous location.

It is no wonder why Maz is a super host. All was smack on perfect.

The beds were soooooo comfy, i melted into bed and slept like a baby

I stayed at Maz's lovely home for 3 nights on the main street of Tanunda while my team and I were hiking the Heysen Trail for the Jodi Lee Foundation Trek.

It was a perfect central location as we were travelling throughout the Barossa on various points along the Heysen Trail. It was very nice to be within walking distance to the restaurants, supermarket and shops.

The home itself is cosy, clean and full of homely touches. I appreciated the artwork on the walls which show the personality of the hosts. We did not cook meals apart from breakfast, but the kitchen was well appointed and had everything we needed. I appreciated the provision of breakfast items which came in handy as we started very early in the morning before the shops opened, so thank you very much!

The beds were very comfortable and the heaters were a lifesaver on these cool autumn evenings. There was plenty of hot water for 4 adults and having towels provided was great as it lessened the amount of items I had to pack.

We only stayed a few days but for longer stays there was plenty of wardrobe space, use of a washing machine and dryer.

Maz has put a lot of thought into anticipating her guests' needs and she was in close contact with me throughout my stay which made me feel looked after.

I would definitely consider her property if I am staying in the Barossa in future.

Great location, close walk to main road with restaurants, cafes and shops. House was clean and had an extra touch with Maz providing ingredients for a cooked breaky, as well as milk and juice.We will return for our next trip to the Barossa.
A fantastic place, close to city centre and wineries. Great location for a family or a couple. Highly recommended.

Tal House in Tanunda is a perfect base for exploring the Barossa Valley. Tanunda is a lovely town with some excellent cafes, restaurants, bars and galleries, all in easy walking distance.

The house itself is spacious, comfortable and has everything you could want for a great stay. Maz is an ideal host: quick to respond and ready to offer assistance if needed.

We thoroughly recommend Maz and Tal House.
A perfect property that is perfectly located in the heart of Tanunda
Clean and tidy, beds extremely comfortable, great location, walk to and clubs, recommended.
Tal Haus is a perfect place to stay. So comfortable, clean and central to everything. It was a pleasureto stay at Maz’s house.
Maz was an excellent host! Fantastic communication prior and during our stay.
Maz’s house is ideal for a family. We really enjoyed our stay, it was very comfortable, a lovely garden, kids games and a perfect place to stay in the Barossa.
Great location for exploring the Barossa region. Easy to walk and access the town amenities and shops. Comfortable beds and pillows. Overall a great place to stay.

We had a great stay at Tal Haus. The property is located right on the Main Street of Tanunda and very convenient to access all the shops a d restaurants. The property itself had everything you could possibly need for a holiday. It made for a great week away! I would stay here again :)
Great big house that is about 5-15 mins from all the wineries you’d want to go to (including the smaller ones that a lot of people don’t know about yet).
A lovely little cottage in a great location. Easy to find and check in. Clean and cosy. The breakfast and thoughtful touches were much appreciated!

Very easy to find in an excellent location just walking distance from many cafes and restaurants in the Main Street.
Maz offered some wonderful suggestions regarding activities, wineries and restaurants to enjoy while we were there.
Could not fault communication.
Would definitely recommend.

What a great location! The bungalow is within walking distance of everything in Tanunda. The amazing wineries and other places of interest, including Maggie Beer’s Farm Shop, were a short drive away.
The kitchen was great and had everything you needed to cook a great meal if you didn’t want to eat out. Having said that, we made great use of the pubs and restaurants in town.
We had some really chilly nights, but we put on the heating as soon as we walked through the door each evening and as soon as we had changed into our track pants and sweatshirts the place was as warm as toast. The bed was so comfy that we both slept in well past our normal wake up time. Bliss!
All in all, we felt like we were home away from home. We only wished we could have stayed longer.
Thanks so much for a fantastic stay Maz.

We loved our stay at the house and in Tanunda. The house was spotless, well equipped and nicely and comfortably furnished. We loved just relaxing at the house after a busy day touring. The host was extreme helpful and knowledgeable. I unhesitatingly recommend the house and its  location. Wish we could have stayed longer.
this is a fantastic characterful property in a great location. Alot of attention to detail - amenities,  thoughtful food items, stylish decor. We would love to stay there again!

We had such a wonderful stay in Maz’s beautiful place! It was the ideal place to relax, perfectly positioned near wineries and other Barossa delights, with shops walking distance down the road. Maz was easy to communicate with and the extra touches including some local produce was a lovely surprise. Next time we’re back, we’d definitely stay again.

Maz's place is central to downtown Tanunda with all you need withing walking distance.
In the heart of the wine valley.
Clean, good amenities, warm and well appointed.
Great location and very clean and tidy. Would recommend to anyone wanting to stay in Tanunda
We really enjoyed our stay. The location is great and within walking distance to dinners, shopping etc. Beds are comfortable and kitchen and lounge area have everything you could need.
Great location in Tanunda. Would stay there again.

this place is perfect for a relaxing time away. The house is comfy, clean and low maintenance so cleaning up after yourself is easy.  perfect location for browsing shops and eating at the local restaurants too. The welcome goodies and other essentials mean there's no need to go to the shops at the start of your holiday

This is a homely place, well situated in the Main Street of a lovely town with plenty to see and wonderful dining options. Scenic drives, a great country market, galleries, plus only an hour from Adelaide if you need a city ‘fix’.
If interested in music, there is a magnificent restored pipe organ in the Tanunda Gallery. Each Wednesday there is
an informative conducted tour of it with a finishing flourish of music. We were treated to Purcells Trumpet Voluntry.
Great spot. Everything was lovely. Ticked all the boxes! Maz was great for touching base before and during the stay to make sure everything was okay. Would stay again. Thank you!
Good Hosts, great communication will go back.

Fantastic location and Maz is a great host - quick to respond to all communication and the guidebook in the house was a great guide to local gems. Our only disappointment was we didn't stay long enough to check out all of Maz's recommendations!

The house had everything you would need for a fuss-free stay and is walking distance to a great range of shops, pubs and cafes on Tanunda's main street. I would very happily stay again.

Maz has thougth out her house very well for her guests, great bedding-very cosy. A large TV with several streaming services which we enjoyed on our one night in, with local cheeses. She is quite unique in that she provides lots of little extras including local bread.
In a wine region I thought it was wonderful to have very nice wine glasses for a glass or two in the evening.
It is well worth reading her local suggestions for restaurants ond wineries, she is spot on.
Highly recommend the Tal Haus and would love to return.
Great home in a great location. Our second stay here.
Maz’’s place is beautiful! Clean, great location and spacious. The bed was super comfy and Maz was awesome to communicate with. The house is also very central - we will be back for sure!

Amazing location! Supplies for breakfast were a bonus.
Will stay again!
highly recommend this place for your stay in Barossa.
Excellent place to stay, very convenient to town and the amenities were fantastic, we had a blast playing boggle in the evening :-).
great place and awesome location

A conveniently located home in walking distance to local dining and only a short trip to all the magnificence the Barossa has to offer.
Well presented with all the essentials you could possibly need.
Maz is a wonderful host with excellent recommendations for places to see and easy to communicate with.

Such a beautiful place to stay with kids. Everything was good and as described by the owner. Love the location of this property, very safe and close to the main market area, garden on the front, side and back. I would like to visit again with my family.
close to town centre
An excellent place to have as a base to explore the Barossa.

Beautiful house in a beautiful location.
Maz made it so easy check in and out and supplied a lot of information about the local area.
Would stay again
Beautiful house

Maz's place was perfect for what we needed - well stocked and furnished, comfy beds, and location couldnt be better. Communication with Maz was prompt and she was really helpful with any information we needed prior to our trip. We will be back

A comfortable older style accommodation in the heart of Tanunda. Large rooms, polished wood flooring in the main part of the house, and plenty of storage space. Walking distance to cafes, supermarket and pubs and wine bars.
A very well equipped house with lots of thoughtful extras that is within very convenient walking distance of the main street of Tanunda. A great spot for your next Barossa trip!
Great location, clean and large space, very friendly and attentive hosts!
Great cottage. Extremely convenient location. Everything you need is provided for.
Beautiful house, The owner went above and beyond to ensure that our stay was amazing.
Good spot but furniture bit dated
The location is amazing, walking distance into Tanunda. Very clean and the decor is beautiful. We would happily recommend this property
This place was fantastic - great location, well furnished and very spacious
Great place to stay.  Everything you need for a few days in the Barossa, location, comfort of the house, lovely provisions and great communications.  We will be back. :) Tania.

Great location.
Beautiful clean home.
The most divine beds - so comfortable.
We will recommend to family and friends

Loved our stay in this gorgeous old cottage in the heart of Tanunda. Comfortable beds, nice hot shower, comfy couch to curl up & watch tv on at the end of a busy day seeing all the sites the Barossa has to offer. Everything we needed to enjoy a relaxing weekend away. Highly recommend!

Lovely property. Very centrally located in the town. Tanunda is a cute town with great local shopping, pubs, cafes and wineries. Maz’s place would be perfect for a girls or couples getaway. The host was helpful and responsive.
Great location! Interesting art taste, especially the one in the hallway.
Great location, walk everywhere. Comfy beds, spacious house. Recommended!

Great close location to the centre of Tanunda.
A great place to start exploring the Barossa Valley.
Loved the location. Being so close to the supermarket, restaurants/bars and shops made for a great weekend. Older style accommodation but clean and comfy. The breakfast supplies were a lovely touch.

Great size house, comfy beds, tv and games supplied, clean, and the host leaves great supplies for breakfast. Plus walking distance to amazing wine bars and restaurants in the cutest town! Will do it again!
Very comfortable, everything you need, great location.

Really fantastic location, <5 minute walk to Tanunda restaurants and shops, really well situated for any wine tours. Maz was very helpful with suggestions and questions beforehand (especially with us changing our booking a couple of times) and lives very close for any problems.
The place itself is big and everything functions: we even managed to do some cooking on Christmas Day! As with most older houses, a few creaky floors, a bit of dust under the beds etc, but overall clean and nicely presented. There are air conditioning units in the shared areas and front bedroom, and ceiling fans throughout, making it quite easy to cool the second bedroom and keep it cool.

A small note about the area, but a lot of things were closed over the Christmas period. We still had plenty to do and see, but if there are specific places you want to visit in the Barossa, it's worth checking out what their holiday opening hours are.

All in all, we had a lovely stay.
Fantastic communication, location and ease. Thank you Maz
Great communication and lovely stay. Would stay again 😊
