Maz’s place was absolutely perfect for our stay in the Barossa! So well equipped and spacious, it was awesome to come back to and relax. We only wish we could have stayed longer.
Nice place in the center of the Barossa. The host was great to deal with and gave awesome recommendations
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Tal Haus. It is in the perfect location & Maz was very accommodating & responsive. Would highly recommend!
Great location and lovely accommodation, would definitely stay again. Thanks Maz
Great location, very clean has everything that you need for a great stay in the Barossa
Lovely lovely accommodation! And Maz was amazing from start to finish ☺️

Thanks a million for welcoming us onto your family property! 5 min walk from the beautiful quiet vineyard to the main st of Tanunda. The most gorgeous  plunge pool and the other little bits and pieces like fogging bathroom window, local gins to sample or your very own cellar. We will definitely be back!!

Perfect setting, well presented cottage, private cellar with some of the hosts own wine which he makes from the vineyards you overlook, plunge pool and driving range. Do you need any more than that!?

We got engaged in the plunge pool and couldn’t have hoped for a better spot for it!

INCREDIBLE air bnb!! Plung pool overlooks vineyard, private wine cellar, a friendly dog to take you for a walk around the vineyard, a free bottle of wine, gin tasting and chocolate in the fridge. Definitely will be coming back!

We had two lovely nights at Scott’s place. Amazing views and such a great location.
The house was really comfortable and well set up.
And we loved the local treats left for us.
We highly recommend this place and hope to return some day.
Thank you!

our family of 2 adults and 2 kids (2 and 4 year old) had an excellent stay. Scott was easy to communicate with and the extra touches to accommodate the kids were really appreciated including toys and books for them to play with, toasting marshmallows over the fire by the river, rides on the polaris to view the vineyard.
The property is very clean with all the modern amenities including a heated plunge pool overlooking the vineyards.
There is also a cellar which you can pick wine from to enjoy during your stay.
Highly recommend this property for families or for a romantic getaway.

We absolutely loved our stay at Scott’s place. There were so many thoughtful touches, including gin to sample, wine and chocolate. We really enjoyed using the beautiful plunge pool and thought all facilities were great. Would definitely stay here again and were very sad to leave!
Scott’s place is stunning! Everything about it is high quality. Very thoughtful special touches throughout. I would highly recommend for those looking for something special
An amazing house, great location and Scott was an excellent house. Ten out of ten!

Our stay at the little cottage was amazing! It has been restored very tastefully and has everything you could want in a relaxing setting. The plunge pool was exceptional and we made good use of it! The beds were super comfy and the linen and towels were high quality. We really enjoyed the cellar and the opportunity to try some of the wines grown and made at the vineyard. The house is in a great location, walking distance to Murray Street. We would absolutely stay again - fantastic, friendly hosts, always happy to share their local recommendations. Thank you Jan, Craig and Scott.

If we could give this place 6 stars, we would. The view is spectacular and the cottage has been beautifully renovated. The plunge pool is an absolute treat! Scott was incredibly accomodating and it was great talking with him about his vineyard and wines (which are amazing!).

If we could have given Rogasch Cottage 10 stars we would have!  A superb little gem hidden away amongst the vines within 5 minutes walking distance to the main street bustling with cafe's and restaurants.  Scott was such a welcoming host along with Jan and Craig - nothing was too much trouble.  We enjoyed a private tour of the micro-vineyard as well as joining them fo (Website hidden by Airbnb) on our first night.  Beautifully renovated, the Cottage is a mix of old and new with all the luxuries one could ever ask for along with your very own stocked cellar.  Wine, local gin, chocolate and even a litre of milk in the fridge welcomed us on our arrival.   Carefully thought through touches make this place an absolute must stay.  Watching sunset in the plunge pool is something we will remember for a long time.  We were sad to leave but are already planning on a return stay!  Outstanding Air BnB :)
Very comfortable cottage in a great location. Worth a stay just to watch the sunset from the pool.

This place is amazing! Staying here really made our trip to the Barossa extra special. The plunge pool with views over the vineyards was a highlight and my partner also had fun on the driving range next to the house. Each night you can go down into your private cellar and choose a bottle of wine which was a lovely touch. We cooked in the old fire oven on the balcony but there's also a fully equiped kitchen. There's local gins to taste with capi tonic in the fridge. Also chocolate! and milk for your nespresso is all provided. We never wanted to leave the house. It's also only 5 mins walk from town and close by to so many good wineries. Even though you're right in the thick of it you feel miles away. This would have to be one of my favourite airbnb's I've ever stayed in.

Absolutely phenomenal place... nuff said...
Gorgeous view, great place for good times.


Jan, Craig , and Scott where awesome people very down to earth and relatable.

Can’t thank them enough for offering up this place!!

The cottage is setup to take advantage of the amazing vineyard views, it’s so relaxing either on the couch or in the pool. Was really happy with the quality of the appliances and furnishings. Retrieving a night cap from the cellar was a real novelty. Its walking distance from the coffee shops and restaurants on the main street which made it so easy after a night enjoying a couple of glasses of wine. Would definitely recommend a stay here.
If ever near the Barossa, look no further for accommodation...this place has it all. Perfect place to rest and relax with stunning views, sunsets and plunge pool!

Amazing renovated cottage in the heart of Barossa within walking distance of Tanunda’s main street.
Every detail is thoughtfully taken care of and the facilities are of a very high standard.
The hosts, Jan, Craig, Scott are very inviting and always available when required.
Ten stars out of five.

The place is lovely. Small, but high quality bed linen, modern features and views to die for. The pool was utterly gorgeous and everything was thought of down to kitchen provisions and the cool choose your own cellar feature.

Do I think it was worth $700 a night for a relatively small space that is basically an annex to next door? No. On our first night, I returned home to find a man urinating outside the property....witnessed by my small children and he was so drunk he splayed his genitalia around-they were upset to say the least. I contacted the host immediately who said he’d look into it...yet we received no response. This was utterly unacceptable.

The house needs to be advertised as a tack on to the main house, there isn’t a lot of room or privacy, but the views, cellar (be careful of the door, my partner received a black eye as it dropped down on his face) were super cool. Great location 3/5 stars $1,400 a weekend? Totally overpriced.

Perfect place to explore the Barossa from, the location is a walk to the village and a short drive to most vineyards. The property is a tasteful mix of modern and period and very nicely finished. The pool and cellar are great touches, we loved our stay here

We absolutely loved our stay! The vineyard views were stunning and we loved the amazing spa and celler! The extra details such as complimentary wine and chocolate were lovely! We can’t wait to come back!

Simply amazing. The place is better than the photos. Beautiful  quality touches with such an amazing view. Scott and family went above and beyond - appreciated the wine tasting, quick responses to anything, the bedding was beautiful, heated pool was  fabulous and really appreciated such a thoughtful and unexpected birthday present. Would definitely stay again.
The most amazing central/hidden location! Thanks so much for an epic stay x

Amazing location situated right in the heart of everything but still secluded and private. The cottage was absolutely beautiful and had so many added extras we never expected. High end bedding, towels and furniture made it feel like a luxury resort. Pool was a real winner for us with amazing views. Scott was absolutely amazing, couldn’t have asked for anyone better. He was so friendly and helpful organising us a tour of a winery close by and giving us a private tasting of his micro winery on the property. Would 100% recommend to everyone and we will definitely be back again!

What a fabulous place! Everything you need to feel relaxed: beautiful views, heated pool, open fire, coffee and wine.  Conveniently close to everything but with privacy as well as lots of space to explore. The owners have done an excellent job with the finer details including beautiful linen, and also creating special spots to sit and relax both inside and out.
We loved our stay so much, we can’t wait to organise another stay towards the end of the year as there really wasn’t enough time to enjoy how much your beautiful place has to offer!

Absolutely beautiful place and location. So much more than we expected, definitely worth the cost. The wine tasting and tour of the property with Scott and Craig, just made our last night so special. It was great to hear and see the history and taste the wine that has been produced from the vines we looked over during our stay. Perfect location in Tanunda, close to town but also very private, and the house is just spectacular.

This place is far better than the pictures show... Which is hard to believe.
Everything was perfect, and the free wine, gin and port was the icing on the cake.
The heated pool was unbelievable, we spent all day there.

And to top it off a free wine tasting, all Scott's wine were awesome, we are looking forward to purchasing some bottles when this vintage is released.

11/10
Don't miss out on Booking this place!
Excellent spot for a winter getaway. Scott and the cottage were both brilliant
Great place. Location is fantastic. Scotty was friendly and we enjoyed the wine tasting. Wish we went when it was warmer and less rain so we could enjoy the patio more.
Thanks for an awesome Stay. The cottage was a perfect stay for our mini moon! Amazing view, great location, and so relaxing. Highly recommend.

We had an amazing time at Scott's cottage! There are countless little gems throughout the accommodation from the amazing views in the heated pool to the private cellar stocked with wine made from the property's produce. We also did a tasting with Scott and really loved the experience. We couldn't have asked for a more relaxing experience, with our goal of getting out of the city. Looking forward to visiting again!
Gorgeous spot. Highlights were the hot tub overlooking the vineyard, the fireplace and the little wine cellar. Lovely.

An absolutely gorgeous cottage in such a peaceful spot - you wouldn’t know you were only a minute from the main street. The plunge pool was as warm as a bath with beautiful views, and the cottage itself was bright & airy whilst maintaining the character and charm of the original home.
Can’t wait to come back the next time we visit the Barossa.

Fab stay! The plunge pool was amazing (and heated to 35 degrees!). Inside was stunning, cellar was cute and the bath tub! Wow!
Netflix on the TV, Nespresso machine and only a short stroll to town It’s perfect!

We had the most amazing time. The pool and driving range were the highlights and we loved the location. My only recommendation would be some more basic pantry staples (butter, vegemite, cereals, etc) as this would have made our stay that little bit more convenient ☺️
Amazing location and host. My partner and I had such a great time. From the beautiful plunge pool overlooking the vineyards to having our own cellar the weekend was just wonderful.
Incredible

With an excellent location just off the Tanunda Main Street, Rogasch Cottage is just the right balance of comfort, style, privacy and personal touches in a superbly renovated old cottage that will surprise and delight! Our young family enjoyed an indulgent weekend complete with sunset swims, vineyard views and cosy fires and found this to be the perfect setting to relax at the end of a busy day. Equally we could have stayed put the whole time with more than adequate amenities for self-catering and generally relaxing and unwinding in luxe surrounds. Scott was quick to respond to enquiries and went out of his way to ensure we had everything we needed. The micro tasting on the property was an absolute highlight and a nightcap in the cellar before bed time was not to be missed! Don’t deliberate. Just book!
This place was amazing, awesome views the pictures don’t to it justice. Positioned close to everything, although you won’t want to leave this little oasis. Will be returning for sure.

A truly luxurious home that provided wonderful relaxation at the end of each day. All the homely touches including the gin, muscat, and wine samples by the private pool made it the highlight of the trip. Additionally, we found the house to be walking distance from anywhere in Tanunda including Turkey Flat winery.

I’d recommend the house to any as a staycation destination in itself, with trips out to the wineries as a bonus add-on.

Perfect getaway spot at tanunda in barossa valley looking over the vineyard with a nice glass of wine from there private wine cellar is one of a kind. The heated 35 degree spa is amazing with the view. Gorgeous cottage to take the next step for a romatic proposal, nonetheless 5 star and couldnt ask for a better place to stay.

What a place!! From the kangaroos between the vines in the morning, to using the old bread oven for stone baked pizza in the evening. It’s an amazing place... and super close to Tanunda town centre. It was everything we hoped it would be and couldn’t give a higher recommendation. Scott makes some incredible wines too!!

Absolutely LOVELY getaway. The thoughtful touches around the house and efforts made by the hosts made the experience even better. Craig was an absolute legend for taking us around the vineyard for a wine tour. His hospitality was excellent and to take time out of his day to show us around didn’t go unappreciated. The place itself was stunning and very comfortable. It was just the perfect place to spend some time with my family for the weekend. My parents were even more impressed with the experience than I was. I’m so glad we were able to support such a deserving family on this stay! 10/10 stay!!
Fantastic place to stay
Amazing cottage in a great location. The cottage has everything you could want. The hot tub was our favorite part. Amazing wine on offer and the view never got old.
Great location and amazing views and lovely hosts.

Absolutely beautiful place to stay.
We had the best of both worlds.
Week started off quite chilly, so was great to sit by fireplace at night with wine out of the cottage cellar ( 1 bottle a day included in stay), and then the weather became quite warm by end of our stay, so was fantastic sitting in hot tub overlooking the vineyards.
The beds are so comfortable, we slept like babies.
There is an outdoor bbq, plus an outdoor pizza oven.
We were able to walk around the property and into the vineyards, and Scott ( the host) even gave us a wine tasting from the barrels, and from the bottled wine.
5 min walk into main st of Tanunda.
Can't wait to stay here again

My wife and I were very much looking forward to rounding off our honeymoon with a few nights at Rogasch Cottage, and we weren’t disappointed. Every element of this stay is superbly thought out, from the coffee selections, having both beach and bath towels, TV and aircon in every room, and wine for each night you stay. We had a real blast doing the wine tasting with Scott, and even had the privilege of buying some AMAZING wine they produced on the property. Though an expensive stay, there is not a single cent wasted and we will definitely come back in the future. Well done guys! Elijah and Kayla
Amazing cottage in beautiful Tanunda, spa pool is excellent, extremely well equipped, comfortable and tidy place with lovely hosts. Highly recommended

What can I say the place was just magnificent and was such a nice stay we will be coming back again. Scott was a fantastic host he was prompt and very thorough with communicating to us and we were lucky to go on his micro brewery tour and learnt about his wine making and history about the cottage and vineyard. The view was amazing and the plunge pool was amazing. Everything listed was perfect and couldn’t have asked for a better stay. We will be recommending this to our friends and family.
An amazing place, location, host and experience. Would gladly go back and will make sure to look for the wine brands in the future. Many thanks for an awesome time.

10/10 accommodation!
Perfect location and picturesque setting. Would stay again in a heartbeat.
The cottage is really very beautiful, with lovely touches and amenities. I would really recommend it.
Amazing place, would have no hesitation in recommending to anyone. Scott was a great host

This place is stunning, the plunge pool overlooks the vineyard and the view is gorgeous. Scott has thought of everything you could possibly need including a bluetooth speaker and pool glasses so you can enjoy a wine in the pool! Location is a 5 minute walk into town where there are lots of restaurants/cafes and shops. Would recommend.

Amazing views, peaceful setting ,well worth the trip out there
Loved the pool looking over the vineyards
Great weekend had by all.

Such an amazing place to stay!
The outdoor pool is an amazing feature.
The communication from the host was great and the place was super clean.
Scotty is a fantastic host and has done a remarkable job with the winery in such a short period of time. The cottage is excellent as are the wines, and all with a lovely view.

From start to finish it was a memorable stay. Scott helped me get in touch with a local boutique florist and when they delivered it prior to checkin, Scott placed them in a vase in the perfect spot.
The plunge pool is pure bliss and always warm. Once you get in, you’ll struggle wanting to leave. Not only is the view of the vineyards iconic; but also the lack of light pollution at night gives you a beautiful look into the nights stars.
There were many amazing touches, from a stocked wine cellar with a complimentary bottle, to a tipple of local gin.
Thank you for hosting us!

Was an amazing getaway, the view was fantastic, wine was delicious and lived up to all expectations. The micro tour was alot of fun and was nice to explore the lovely property. The dog was definitely one of the highlights of the trip, so make sure to give him a good ol pat if you run into him.
Very accommodating in a perfect location definitely recommend staying here!

A very special place.
My personal highlight was the warm plunge pool on a full moon night and the progressive wine tasting throughout the property where we discovered some gorgeous hidden nooks and crannies.

A beautiful cottage which is both very comfortable and nicely appointed.

The cottage / location has an interesting history (documented on-site) and a certain charm as a result. It’s quite remote (right on the edge of town) and is close to nature. The night skies (when cloudless) are spectacular.

It’s in a good location (Tanunda and it’s restaurants are in walking distance). The great views, plunge pool, usable fireplaces and wine cellar make it extra special.

Scott and Jan are hospitable hosts with a range of nice touches thrown in.

What an amazing place to stay! Spectacular views, their wine is the best I’ve had. Wonderful people, the kids loved it there too. Perfect location, a walk down the road to the Main Street. Everything about it was perfect!

Our stay at Rogasch Cottage was the perfect way to start our honeymoon, the plunge pool with the view over the vineyard is amazing. I loved the touch of a personal cellar supplied by the owners, and the spacious design of the cottage.

We were lucky enough to have a tour and private tasting of the Forage Supply Co wine list grown on the property which was a highlight of our stay, if you get a chance, make sure you do it too.
I would highly recommend this property to anybody looking for a central, relaxing and picturesque base to their Barossa adventure.
Great place!

This far exceeded our expectations and we cannot wait to come again.

Such a beautiful spot and friendly hosts. The cottage is well equipped, stylishly & thoughtfully furnished. From the beautiful fresh roses, local gins to taste and private cellar it really did not disappoint!! A honeymoon and birthday to remember. We came with our one year old daughter and it was perfect for dips in the pool when she was asleep or walking into town for an early dinner and a few wines. A quick drive to endless wineries. A week well spent!
The accomodation was truely a hidden gem. Scott was also an amazing host and very quick with responding. His local knowledge also helped making our trip incredible.

Rogasch Cottage exceeded our already very high expectations in every way! From the amazing hospitality to all of the special touches set up for guests we couldn’t have asked for anything more. We were lucky enough to be able to experience a special wine tasting on site and get to know the owners of the property which really made the trip special for us. The location is absolutely perfect, we were able to walk down to the main street of Tanunda for dinner each night which was great. 2 nights certainly wasn’t long enough!
Amazing cottage tucked away from Tanunda's main street.  Outlook and plunge pool make this a great retreat.
Such an awesome place to stay. So close to the Main Street but feels so tranquil at the house, a true Barossa stay!

This accomodation exceeded our expectations. If it’s on your short list - do not hesitate, book now. The property itself, view and all the special touches were outstanding. Absolutely one of the best we have stayed in.

Located in one of the most beautiful parts of wine country, this is an excellent getaway experience for couples or a small family. A redeveloped cottage with a fascinating history. Amenities are top class if you would like to stay in and cook for yourself, however you are located within 10 minute drive of some beautiful restaurants and vineyards for some world class wine tasting. The stunning pool overlooking the vineyard on a nice day is not only picturesque but remarkably pleasant. Scott is a warm, enthusiastic host, with a great story to tell, and some beautiful wine to share. Highly recommended!

Our stay far exceeded our expectations!

The cottage was absolutely beautiful. Restoration has considered and upheld the historical nature of the property, while adding a touch of modernness and elegance to comfort.

The hot-tub/plunge pool was exquisite and very well thought out.

We loved spending time with beautiful Paws while she waited for the family. She is truly the most beautiful Border Collie, and clearly very loved!

We would love to walk the grounds when we can make it back. There is so much that we didn't get the time to explore.

We will definitely return!

An exceptional Airbnb. We loved our stay, the cottage is just perfect. We had such a warm welcome from Craig and Paws. Really lovely hospitality from Craig that made the experience so special. Everything was so wonderful I would highly recommend. Thank you!
Charming and elegant cottage overlooking a stunning vineyard - we loved our stay and the special touches with small cellar for wine selection and a private tasting. Would highly recommend!
absolutely loved the little cottage. we will be back again soon!

This cottage was absolutely breathtaking start to finish. Pure magic from the first moment you walk in the door! Old heritage bones with classic modern updates throughout, a golf tee-off (into the vines below!) with local tastings and wine provided!

Sunset and sunrise in the spa was my favorite, the beds are comfy, the fireplace was a cozy touch, and the scenery and peace was more than we could have hoped for.

Thanks to the hosts! We’d love to come back again someday and stay longer ❤️
Great place to stay for the weekend.Amazing views, so close to the town centre for shops and restaurants. Great place all around, would recommend

Fantastic place with rich history! Far exceeded our expectations, photos don’t do it justice! Had a lovely tour of the property complete with wine tasting and drinks by the fire, highlight of our trip! Would highly recommend. Thanks again Scott, Craig and Jan!!

You will not be disappointed.
Accommodation - attention to detail is on point. From the minute we walked in, we all thought WOW!
Quality of bedding and towels will not go unnoticed.
Hot Tub - she lives up to her name, water was beautifully warm and the view is incredible.
Communication - Scott and Jane respond promptly, you are never left hanging. They absolutely get 5 stars for customer service.
Lastly, location - it’s perfect as the Main Street is just a small stroll down the road.
It’s a gem to be enjoyed.
This is probably the best Air BNB we have ever stayed in. If you think the photos are amazing the actual experiencis even better. This is the perfect Tanunda accomodation. Look no further.

Great cottage really close to town. Perfect little getaway. You think you are miles from anywhere but town is a short walk away. The cottage is really well done. A perfect mix of old style and modern comforts. Ideal for a couple or a family of 3 to 4.

This is the most exceptional Airbnb we’ve ever stayed in! The cottage was adorable and exquisitely set up. It’s worth staying just for the hot tub, but then there’s the view, the short walk to Tanunda Main Street, the personal cellar stocked with wine for us to enjoy and the fireplace as well! Very special. Craig, our host, took us to the winery’s magnificent cellar, where we had a tasting and a fabulous yarn or two for the afternoon. And if you can tear yourself away from the cottage, the Barossa is one of Australia’s premium wine destinations. Enjoy! 🍷

This is more than a place to sleep, it is an experience! We got engaged at this property and the owners went above and beyond to set the place up for my fiancé with flowers, a grazing board, fire ready and sparkling Shiraz. We also enjoyed the included gin and port tasting, the selection of wine available in the cellar, the golf course off the balcony into the vines and of course the spa! I was surprised how close this is to town - only a 5min walk and one street over from the main restaurant strip. It really is the best of both worlds - looking out at the view you would not know you are right in town.

We went on a winery tour of the property and were inspired by the great work Scott is doing for the community with his boutique brand. He even arranged for a Port Adelaide player to hand sign wine with a note for our engagement and dropped it at our next accommodation after we checked out. My partner lives as breathes Port Adelaide and will cherish this for a long time!
Stunning location, gorgeous cottage. Water pressure in the shower was fantastic. Beds super comfy. Constant supply of firewood for the open fireplace. Loved every second of our stay!

Everything about this place is beautiful, with fantastic attention to detail in every way. The cottage is a short and pretty stroll to the main street and has stunning vineyard views. The fireplace, hot tub, bath with a view and private cellar make for a unique stay in a beautiful part of the Barossa. Check-in/out was convenient, and Scott is a wonderful host.

The Ultimate Barossa Accommodation! The whole 2 night getaway at Rogasch Cottage was flawless.
Scott is fast to respond and easy to communicate with.
The cottage will exceed your expectations, it is perfectly clean, stylishly decorated, the beds are large and very comfortable, the heating works quickly at making the place cosy and the hot tub and the view over the vineyard is beautiful. Add in the very cool little cellar with lovely reds, muscat and tawny to taste, the gins to sample, a fire place, golf tee off next to the hot tub and the close proximity to cafes, pubs and restaurants (10 min walk), this place comes pretty close to unbeatable for a Barossa getaway.
Stay here! It is absolutely beautiful and a comfortable place to stay. Communication was quick, nice extra touches, king size beds. So accomodating I can’t recommend more. I would stay here again

Could not recommend this stay more - The hot tub was exceptional and doing a wine tasting with Scott was definitely a highlight. The cottage had everything we needed and exceeded all expectations! Only wish we could have stayed longer but will hopefully be back soon!

The cottage was beautiful. Just a lovely place to spend a rainy winter’s weekend - nice and toasty by the fire with gorgeous views across the vineyard. Even went for a dip in the lovely warm pool. The place has been cleverly designed and has everything you need to feel at home. Hospitality is above and beyond with lovely gin tastings and sneaky blocks of chocolate. Scott was very accommodating of our small humans who had a great time roaming the property for golf balls, patting the friendly doggo and screaming at the chickens (chickens probably feel differently). We will definitely be back.  Maybe without the kids next time.
The cottage is fantastic. Watching the sunset from the plunge pool is a nice way to end the day. We walked to dinner, and were within easy reach of some great wineries (and a brewery).

This is an incredible place to stay. The little extras that are offered throughout the house were a wonderful touch, the hot plunge pool overlooking the vineyards was even better than expected. A beautiful place we would stay in again and again
Our second stay and despite the wild winter weather we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves and made good use of the heated pool and open fireplaces.
One of the best Airbnb’s we’ve ever stayed in. Amazing cottage with so many perks. I only wish we stayed longer. Very cosy and accommodating. Will definitely be booking again in the future.
Absolutely fantastic, the heated pool was gorgeous and the private cellar was a great touch too!
A perfect spot, absolutely stunning… to be so close to the town, but so secluded was fantastic. The deep hot tub and open fire really set the mood to help you really relax and unwind.
What an amazing property. Loved every moment and the extra touches were lovely. Very generous and awesome comfort at this place :)

Amazing stay complemented by great food and wine! The property was secluded despite being so close to the main street of Tanunda. Scott was an awesome host, and we will definitely be back. Would recommend to anyone!

This is a real hidden gem off the Main Street of Tanunda. The renovated 1860’s cottage is absolutely stunning, with the best blend of heritage charm and modern luxury. The vineyard views from the rear deck and hot tub are amazing, not to mention the delicious wine. Our tour of the winery with Scott was fantastic and we definitely look forward to coming back soon!
A wonderful place, superb location and obviously has the wow factor. Perfect for a romantic weekend away:)

We had a great time. The cottage is extremely comfortable with wonderful views and the heated plunge pool is fantastic. An easy walk to the restaurants in the main street and beautifully quiet and relaxing. Great character and reflective of the region. We found the cottage ideal for our needs (two friends having a long weekend).
excellent experience! fantastic location and very hospitable hosts!
Overall a great experience

Fantastic blend of stylish heritage and modern luxury in a stunning setting. The tasting was definitely a highlight. We would definitely recommend this accommodation to other travellers. We felt very welcome and had a great time. This was definitely and experience, not just accommodation!
A beautiful space tucked a short walk from the Main Street. A great stay with everything you could need, modern amenities, and lovely views overlooking the vineyards. Would definitely recommend.
Absolutely beautiful location

This is one special place! Do yourself a favour and book it immediately!
Beautiful, peaceful, convenient and well appointed with generous inclusions - including a lovely tour of the property (a must do).
Thanks so much for having us!

The accommodation and location are amazing , Scott and his Dad are incredibly friendly and go out of their way for their guests , do yourself a favour and also do a tour of the property and vineyard with Scott you won’t be disappointed absolutely incredible and inspiring and wine is good too !! will definitely be back and telling everyone to stay Rogasch Cottage when they come to the Barossa Valley

Our stay at Rogasch Cottage was absolutely perfect. The location was great for touring the local wine region and enjoying the cafes and restaurants of Tanunda. The cottage itself was super spacious, had great amenities and  the hosts really went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. We hope to be back again!

A sensational property with equally sensational hosts. We stayed at the cottage for 3 nights and loved it! The beds were comfy, the views are incredible and the pool is the icing on the cake! They have thought of almost everything - you have everything you need. We also enjoyed a few experiences the cottage has to offer, including the micro winery tour, the fireside supper, and Craig (host) even drove us to a few wineries (how good is that for service). We also had a great time having dinner in the surprise hidden cellar which was a fun experience. I cant recommend this property highly enough. We cant wait to go back again!

My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights over a weekend and it was fantastic. The heated plunge pool was definitely one of the highlights with the amazing view! A lot of places have “heated” pools but often is still quite cold compared to the outside weather however this was truly heated to a very comfortable temperature that you don’t have to brace yourself before going in. We enjoyed the tour of the property and the wine + gin tastings. We ended up buying some wine to support the Forage Supply Co cause.  The location was perfect to walk to all the nice cafes and restaurants in Tanunda. The house was well equiped with appliances Anand coffee/ tea. The unexpected bonus for anyone driving an EV is that there is an NRMA fast charger within walking distance of the property and the town!!! Highly recommended and we might even stay there again another time.
Gorgeous property,  and amazing complimentary tastings!  Probably one of the nicest places we have stayed. We will absolutely book again.  Thank you

Wonderful accommodation with beautiful views. Modern inside with everything you might need. While very close to restaurants and the Main Street it feels like miles away secluded into a vineyard. Great stay and experience all together. We definitely will come again.

we loved our stay, and got engaged here. will definitely be back some time in the future. Scott and his parent were wonderful hosts, especially with the micro tour. such an awesomeand inspiring story of what these guys are manifesting outside of the wine bottle. we wish them sincerely all the very best.
The cottage was a perfect weekend getaway. Could have easily stayed another week.
Amazing location with stunning views. Very generous hosts with samples of local produce. Great privacy and we felt like we were in our own little worlds during our stay. Will definitely be back!

Rogasch Cottage is a fantastic place to stay which greatly exceeded our expectations. We stayed for our anniversary and it was the perfect location for some much valued time together.

The outlook of the property is breathtaking, with views over the vineyard visible from inside the property and from the heated private plunge pool. The amenities are warm and welcoming and you feel at home and relaxed as soon as you enter.

Scott was a great host to deal with, with clear communication throughout the booking and check-in process.

We highly recommend Rogasch Cottage to anyone looking for a relaxing stay in this beautiful part of the state and will likely be returning ourselves!
This property was amazing, so many nice/luxurious touches to make it a week away we will never forget.

- great location
- modern clean place with heritage features restored
- amazing heated pool with breathtaking view
- guided us through making woodfire pizza in a 1800’s pizza oven
- hot chocolate and marshmallow toasting by the creek
- tour of micro winery and cellar with owner
- cute friendly dog “paws”
- bonus golf driving from hill

Such a beautiful cottage in such a convenient spot! Perfect for walkable access to Tanunda and right in the heart of the Barossa. The plunge pool was a real highlight and was so beautiful to listen to the birds and watch the sun set over the vines.

I highly recommend, this was absolutely beautiful and exactly like the pictures! Exactly the little get away we needed, We did the tour of the property and tasted some of their delicious wines! Definitely would stay again!
Great experience, good location and amazing view from the beautiful pool!

Had such an amazing stay! The little tour and tasting was so great! The view in the pool
Looking out over the vines is amazing! Such a great spot so close to the Main Street and such a welcoming friendly stay

lovely getaway just minutes from the main strip in Tanunda.
You can walk to the shops etc from the property. Such a sweet cottage with so much history that has been refurbished nicely. The plunge pool is heated and was so much fun on a sunny day and overlooks the vineyards.
A bit more privacy like blinds/curtains over the windows in lounge would have been great/ felt a bit safer.
would recommend this place 100%

Amazing stay 🙏
Everything about this stay was perfect, extremely accommodating, better then expected! love the vibe of the place and the owners. they go above and beyond to make it a trip to remember. will return again!

The house was absolutely beautiful and served some amazing views.

We especially enjoyed the pool/spa where we spent a lot of our time.

We met Craig and Jan who were both lovely and hospitable, hosting us for a few drinks on their deck. They gave us a tour of their own home as well as the hidden gems of the cottage. Not to mention their gorgeous dog, Paws, giving us a few laughs.

Absolutely amazing stay.

Perfect views and accomodation.
Highlights were the wine cellar, gin tasting and plunge pool.
Could not fault anything. Will definitely be back.

Absolutely wonderful location, beautiful outlook over the vines and fields whilst being a short walk from town. The property is very well maintained and the pool warm for a dip even on mild days. The beds are comfortable and the kitchen facilities great if you want to cook. A wonderful place to stay.

Hot tub amazing with gorgeous views.
Great location walking distance to shops short drive from wineries.
Overall a lovely get away.

Scott was super accommodating and a great communicator. Very easy going bloke which made it extremely easy to settle in and went above and beyond to meet our needs. The cottage was set up superbly and the views were also unreal. Couldnt recommend this place anymore.

A beautiful accomodation!
Very clean
Comfortable beds
Nice living and dining area
Great view
Amazing heated pool
Great utilities
Peaceful and quiet
Access to netflix
Great location, easy to get to local wineries and restaurants
Quick and friendly response from Scott
Loved and enjoyed my stay
I highly recommend this place
A wonderful tranquil spot to escape & relax. Great walking location to Main Street of Tanunda

We loved our time at Tracy’s place in Tanunda. It was such a clean, tidy and homely space which was so comfortable. We appreciated the provisions in the house which really made our life easier. We would highly recommend Tracy’s place to anyone looking to stay in a central Barossa location in a home away from home with ease of access to so many of the great wineries the region has to offer.

5 Stars. Tracy was very helpful with checking etc and communication was great.  The house itself was great and exceeded our expectations. Good sized rooms and great facilities. Its only a couple of minutes walk to the main street, good for a morning coffee run or heading out for dinner. Definitely recommend

Great house in a great location both for local Tanunda facilities and bars/wineries as well as access to the Barossa region.
Beautiful house with some great touches like the coffee machine.
Thanks for a perfect stay!
Perfect for our family Christmas- great facilities and excellent base for exploring the area.

We had a fantastic stay at Tracy’s place.

The cottage was very comfortable, the amenities were above expectations and Tracy was wonderful at providing local tips.

I would highly recommend staying here when visiting the Barossa
Amazing! Loved everything, house was comfy and very clean. Loved the touches of coffee and local food and wine for the first day. A beautiful house in an amazing location! Highly recommend

This has exceeded my expectations. This is perfectly located within walking distance to amenities, the cottage was perfectly presented with a very thoughtful information guide.
Look no further, this is the perfect cottage for your barossa valley getaway.
I would highly recommend staying there and I will definitely be back.
Thank you so much Tracy for your hospitality.
Beautiful house, great location, thoughtful touches with great communication.
Great location in walking distance to restaurants. Good facilities and welcoming hosts. Homely feel
Great location that was sparkling clean on arrival.  Tracy is a great host - thoughtful touches, makes you feel welcome and great communication.

Tracy’s place is in an ideal location.  The house has been nicely updated and furnishings all very comfortable.  Our group of 5 all commented on how their beds were particularly comfy.  Lots of thoughtful touches, welcome bottle of wine, ice in the freezer, beaut breakfast supplies etc.  Tracy even lit the heater so we came home to a warm house.  Would highly recommend this property.
We had a wonderful stay at Tracy’s, check-in/out was easy, place was beautiful and location was absolutely perfect.
Exactly as listed and really conveniently located in a very quiet street with easy access to everything you might need in the main street. It was a perfect base for our exploring of the area.

Fantastic location within walking distance to the town of Tanunda which is littered with great cafes, restaurants and boutique stores. Tracy is a very warm and friendly host and the house oozes old school charm. Tracy left some local produce for us to sample for breakfast which was a nice touch, particularly as we arrived into town late with two little ones.
Fabulous location, close to everything but in a lovely quiet street. Lovely items for breakfast, and nice and clean. Everything we needed for a great girls weekend.

Very clean, comfortable house in a great location, walking distance to some great wine bars, shops and cafes. Tracy was fantastic host, lots of little extras which made our stay feel like a real vacation, and was wonderful in accommodating our littlies with high chair, cot etc. Everything about this house was comfortable; We loved the cozy lounge room with super warm gas fire! Highly recommend.
Beautiful, cosy cottage. Can highly recommend staying there and am looking forward to our next visit!
Tracy and her place were both amazing! Location and hospitality were fantastic with lots of nice touches.

We had a wonderful five day stay at Tracy’s place. The food provided for our breakfast was fantastic and a lovely touch. Her place was spacious and clean, the beds were a great size and very comfortable. Plenty of towels and linen provided which was great. The fireplace in the front room generated a lovely amount of heat although the rear of the house tended to be on the colder end so extra blankets were required on the beds.
The cottage is in a great location, close to the town’s cafes and shops and so easy to drive around to the multitude of beautiful wineries. We would happily stay again.

We had a lovely 10 night stay whilst visiting family. Allowah was a home away from home with everything we needed, in a whisper quite location, but still close to everything. Tracey was a wonderful host, restocking us with fresh towels, coffee and scones for our long stay. The only bad thing I can say is that we had to leave!

House is in a great location to the main street. Very cosy and warm house. Communication was instant and very easy. Bacon and eggs and wine provided free of charge and was amazing. Thanks once again. Highly recommend.

Perfect home for a stay in the Barossa! Cozy in winter but with plenty of space - and so close to Tanunda and the rest of the valley. Tracy has a great touch for providing top notch accommodation with lots of little touches and hospitality which my family and I really appreciated! We'll be recommending to family and friends - so don't hesitate if your dates are available!

Spotlessly clean home away from home with everything you could possibly need.
Many thoughtful touches and inclusions and luxury linen and towels.

Thank you Tracy!
Fantastic accommodation.

Tracy’s home was the perfect place for a weekend getaway. The location was excellent, within walking distance to shops, cafes restaurants etc. Tracy’s home was very clean and had many thoughtful touches. Would highly recommend!
Homely beautiful home. Awesome location. Very much enjoyed our stay! Highly recommend!
Lovely place to stay
The house was lovely and very comfortable, everything you need for a nice long weekend.  We had a great time !
Very comfortable house which is in a great location only 15 minutes walk from the centre of Tanunda.
Great peaceful location, a few minutes walk into Tanunda. Awesome breakfast staples for our first breakfast. Tracy is a host who cares about her house and your stay. Highly recommended.

This is the most perfect cottage to stay in whether it's for a weekend or a longer stay. it has a warm and inviting energy that makes you feel immediately at home. the location is just perfect too, just a few minutes drive to the main Street and local wineries. I highly recommend this cottage, you won't be disappointed.

The home is beautifully presented with thoughtful added touches. It had everything we needed including two ample supplies for a breakfast cook up. It's an easy walk to the Main street of Tanunda for meals or shopping. Tracy was very obliging and quick to respond to messages.

Tracy's home is an older style house but is so clean and welcoming. Tracy left us items for breakfast which we were so thankful for. The house is in walking distance to Tanunda town, perfect location.
Lovely place, enjoyed the space with family and friends, great location and wonderful host.

What a wonderful place and location. Super clean and had everything we desired and needed. Tracy went above and beyond, allowing us early  entry to the property and even removing some birds that became stuck. Highly recommended and look forward to visiting again.

Very clean, awesome rooms with comfy beds and clean linen, very modern and beautiful bathroom, amazing food bits and wine left for us, great stay, and close to everything like the pub and shops! Loved staying here.
Great Host.  Everything as described, quiet street.  The fully stocked fridge was appreciated for our breakfast. Highly recommend and would stay again.

Well, Tracy's home is just like a home away from home.  Welcoming, clean and an extremely comfortable bed!!!!  The location is  just perfect - central enough to walk a short 10 minutes to the best restaurants the Barossa has to offer.  The breakfast provisions were delicious along with the bottle of wine and treats.  We cannot thank you enough and will definitely be back.
Modern, clean accommodation in a beautiful location. Photos don't do it justice. Would definitely stay here again.

Rosa’s place is in a great location for exploring the Barossa - close to many wineries, the Barossa Markets (must do on a Saturday morning) and Maggie Beer’s farmhouse.

The house is spacious, beds are very comfortable and the shower is great. The kitchen has everything you need to cook for yourself. We really appreciated being given some local muesli, bacon and fresh eggs to use during our stay. We would happily stay again.

Great place to explore the barossa valley. The accommodation is really modern. Very good communication with the owners. The house is located between vineyards, so it was great that they provided a breakfast. We would definitely recommend this Airbnb.

A beautiful open space that is sparkling clean. Bedrooms are huge and linen is great quality. Beds and pillows are very comfy.
Living and kitchen areas are very open with high ceilings and big windows.
Tucked away on its own, but so close to the Main Street of Nuri, it’s a perfect spot for a family getaway. We stayed here to be close to family for Christmas and will be back for sure.
Rosa is lovely. Very quick to respond to all enquiries by text or email, and met us for a quick chat on checkout. Thank you 😊
Great place and location. Would recommend and come back again.

Beautiful cosy and spacious brand new place in a great location to enjoy a tour in the Barossa Valley. The beds are super comfy with beautiful linen and the quietness of the area will allow you to have the best night(s).

We had 4 nights staying at the house, and it was beyond our expectations. Host Rosa needed a new set of photos. Because the house is actually better than the pics shown. It’s a new house with immaculate condition. Very soft Sheridan towels and linens. The beds are comfortable. Kevin has bad back and he’s fussy of mattress, however he hasn’t complained his sleep. We highly recommend the house.
A very lovely, modern home in the middle of Barossa Valley. Simple and elegant, very clean as well. Close to wineries and restaurants. Thanks for hosting us!
Very comfortable, clean and spacious house. Host very quick to respond to texts.
Lovely spot close to everything the barossa offers, tidy and homely.  Good value for money
What an amazing brand new place! So central to all the wineries and town. Rosa and Gerry were great hosts and accommodated for us and our little one. Would definitely stay again.
Lovely place to stay. Close to everything you need and very spacious!
Rosa’s place is better than we could have imagined. Peaceful space to relax amongst the vines. Great spot near shops and wineries.
Lovely views with a beautiful house to stay in, close to wineries and local towns.

Rosa's place is in a great location, so close to some of the best winery and distilling options in the Barossa! Rosa also provided delicious breakfast options which allowed us to start our day replenished :)
Overall a nice stay :)
Lovely house and perfect for our weekend getaway! A thoughtful assortment of continental breakfast items and a great variety of teas!! Would thoroughly recommend!!
great place to stay what visiting the Barossa, clean and airy.

The house is beautiful, everything was brand new and it's very spacious. Communication was good and we had everything we needed during our stay. It was comfortable and quiet so we slept well. It's close to drive into town. Thanks Rosa!
Great place! Highly recommend
Rosa’s place is modern and clean. It’s well located for exploring nearby Barossa wineries and the town of Greenock. Nice touches with breakfast and teas. Thank you
Great spot to base yourself if you want to explore the beautiful Barossa!

Great location to explore the Barossa Valley, friendly host, clean new house, Rosa and Gerry have sheep too on their property and let us go next door to watch them (for our toddler), there were some baked goods provided on arrival.

My only note for others with young kids would be that the portacot provided did not have a mattress (instead they had a folded up doona on wooden slats) but it wasn't an issue for us as we had coincidentally brought a mattress.

Would stay again!
Lovely place to say, nice and clean with great hospitality
Beautiful little place which has everything you need
Very nice, new house. Great beds and linen. Lovely large bathroom. Was convenient to places we needed to go and very quiet and private.

Amazing place, when you open the door you are astounded by the stylish and modern venue, amenities, bedrooms and bathroom. Only downside is patchy cellular reception and no wifi. However the dining table had adequate cellular reception to create a functional wifi hotspot. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a luxurious stay in a beautiful area!

A quiet, clean and spacious house in a great location! All the wineries and restaurants we wanted to visit were nearby. There’s no wi-Fi so we relied on our Telstra mobile phone coverage but it was patchy.
will definitely be back again was a lovely place!
Such a beautiful place to stay, would recommend to anyone visiting the Barossa
A great place to stay in the centre of the Barossa valley! The house is very clean with great amenities, however do mind there are a lot of mosquitoes about so don’t leave the door open!

Great central spot, near wineries, Greenock 5 mins up the road.  Big bathroom great for sharing.  Easy parking. Rosa is great at communicating and really prompt in her responses.  We enjoyed our stay and it offered great value.
Great location with a spacious and modern interior. Property is secluded and Rosa was super accommodating when we asked for a late check out. Would definitely stay here again!

Booked this for my family who were very pleased with accommodation. The place was clean, beds very comfortable and the linen/towels first class. The food provided (bread, croissants, muffins) as well as tea and coffee were very much appreciated.
They would book to visit again and recommend it to their friends.

Rosa is a wonderful host and presented her property immaculately. It's a fantastic central location within close proximity to the best that the Barossa Valley has to offer. The house itself has all the creature comforts to ensure a comfortable stay including ducted air-conditioning, generous sized bedrooms and bathroom, and modern furnishings. We look forward to visiting again soon!
Beautiful place to stay and great location
Highly recommend. Great location and Rosa was very helpful with winery and restaurant recommendations. Spacious bedrooms and big bathroom. Great spot for kids.
Great location, communication and very clean! Beds were comfortable and the place had everything we needed for our short getaway.
A really top notch place to stay. Modern and incredibly clean. Rose has provided an exceptional stay in a really great location
Rosa and Gerry are lovely and really accomodating. The place is new and clean, the pictures don’t do it justice.

Beautiful space surrounded by nature! we absolutely loved our stay! such a gorgeous secluded sanctuary to get away and unwind, and a short drive to the closest town which has everything you need. thankyou Rosa!
Very comfortable place to stay in the Barossa. Had all the amenities we needed and close to town and wineries.
We had a wonderful stay in Tanunda. The accommodation was central and in walking distance to the Main Street. Our hosts were very attentive to detail. Highly recommend. Thank you
Very convenient location, close to Main Street restaurants. Lovely well appointed very clean accommodation with great care taken to make our stay special. Thank you so much. We will come again.
Awesome place. You won’t be disappointed

Thanks to our hosts - Lizha and Geoff - we were made to feel so welcome from the moment we booked. Our hosts were so attentive and provided so many lovely touches including beautiful breakfast, snacks, drinks and toiletries. The home is beautifully clean and so well appointed along with an unbeatable location right in the middle of town. Highly recommended :)

We had a wonderful stay. The house is very clean and beautifully decorated and the indoor plants added a really homely feel. And there were lots of thoughtful extras that made us feel welcome. The location is really excellent - a short drive to the wineries and a short walk to dinner places. And the hosts’ communication was really good.

What a wonderful place to stay for the weekend. The place had everything you needed - a complimentary breakfast and gorgeous soaps and little extras for maximum enjoyment. Walking distance to the town. Superb Airbnb

This house is an excellent base for a visit to the Barossa Valley. The house is so well equipped and furnished that it will satisfy the most demanding visitors. The supply of basic requirements and breakfast options is perfect. All you need to buy is fresh bread from the baker next door.

Tanunda has some great restaurants all within an easy walk and the house guide gives you valuable tips. There is a very good supermarket close at hand and plenty of good coffee shops to choose from. A safe, secure and roomy garage for the car and easy access to the house for all guests.

All in all a great find and we have no hesitation in strongly recommending it to others and if we are ever in the area again we would certainly look to book it.
What a beautiful place to stay, love the small touches.
What a wonderful house in a central Tanunda location. So well presented and full of lots of nice touches including a generous welcome basket. Very responsive hosts. Highly recommended.
Our stay was very well enjoyed, with lovely touches and an impeccably clean house. Would come back again.

We had a great time at Marlovisa’s place. The place was immaculate and we loved the little touches... right down to the cocoa powder for our Nespresso coffee. The house is conveniently located a short walk to all the action. Thank you for the great hospitality.

Whilst this place is not cheap, it is set up with everything we needed and more, with multiple generous touches throughout the stay.  From start to finish, communication was brilliant, the house was all in tip top condition, the little extras including food and drinks and fine quality shampoos and so on added to the sense of enjoyment and value for money.  We wanted to leave a little later than the check out time as it worked for our next social engagement and the hosts allowed that with no quibble = we felt cared about.

Such a lovely stay. Amazing location, so many thoughtful touches and really warm and cozy. Will be making this our regular accommodation for trips to the Barossa.

Thanks for a great stay

Great location. 2 minutes walk to Tanunda’s Main Street and wonderful restaurants and Apex bakery.
Sparking clean with lots of lovely touches and complimentary items in the pantry and fridge to make you comfortable.
Thoughtful and responsive host.

My partner and I just completed a 4 night stay at Ruby’s and we were not disappointed at all. The personal touches made it inviting, warm and welcoming. A home away from home. Eliza and Geoff were very communicative and never left anything unturned throughout our stay. Well worth the visit.

This place was exactly what we were after. Comfortable - so much so that we could relax in the home. Perfect location - easy walking distance to all restaurants, cafes and hotels.
The balance of this was ideal, as we live in a small town, eating out was important, and the ease of getting home was fabulous!
The little touches that were included really did make the house a home - we travelled from 3hours away and get some snack when we arrived was great!!
Thanks so much, we will stay again!

Thankyou so much
Your home was immaculately presented and so close to everything We enjoyed the breakfast provisions along with the red wine and port
We had a great weekend and will be back with friends
The Ruby residence was a stunning house in an awesome location in Tanduna.
Beautiful space and great hospitality

Beautiful property with a real homely feel.
So many additional touches for your comfort.
Hosts go above and beyond for their guests

If you want a restful and pleasant time in the Barossa this is the place to stay.
Best BnB I’ve ever stayed at.
Extremely clean, very welcoming with candles and jazz music playing and aircon on.
Great quality of bed sheets and towels. 2-3mins walk from location to restaurants ect.
Next visit to Barossa I will be staying here again.

My bestie and I had a magical stay in the Barossa at Ruby’s Residence. We were blown away at how everything had a little personal touch and thoughtfulness was around every corner. The beds were super comfortable and the amenities outstanding! We felt very “at home” in the house and found it was the perfect location for our Barossa adventures during the daytime whilst being a peaceful retreat in the evenings. Highly recommend Ruby’s Residence for a luxurious yet cozy stay in the Barossa.

If you are travelling to the Barossa, STAY HERE!!! The property is just off the main road but completely quiet. Lizha and Geoff have gone above and beyond in terms of thoughtful amenities that you might forget, as well as leaving milk, orange juice, tea, nespresso coffee and a few little treats in the kitchen.
The house was clean, smelt lovely and during our stay we felt just like we were at home.
Lizha and Geoff responded promptly whenever I needed to message them. I would definitely stay here again.
We had a wonderful stay, thoughtful touches made it very welcoming. Extremely homey! Amazing location. Highly recommend to others!!

We enjoyed our stay. Location excellent as close to everything, easy to walk to shops, restaurants etc. Comfortable accommodation with everything you need on hand. Lovely touch with wine and nibbles as a welcome gift. Thank you for having us and Happy New Year!
Excellent all round - location is excellent, house is well setup, tidy, and well equipped, and comms were easy and prompt. Highly recommended!

Located in walking distance to shops, coffee and restaurants, this house was ideally suited to our 1 x couple 2 x singles group. We radiated around the valley attractions, restaurants and wineries and retired late in the afternoon to the great amenities the house had to offer. We will be back!

outstanding all round
a great stay cation ... beautiful plants and paintings and location

A great place to stay in Tanunda. So close to the main street where there are many places to dine at. Ruby's was spotlessly clean, and has everything that you need for your stay. The home smelled so good too. The bedding is very comfortable also. Would recommend Ruby's to all, and would definitely stay again, if visiting the Barossa Valley.
Such a lovely place to stay! Plenty of thoughtful touches. Would definitely stay again

We throughly enjoyed our stay. Thoughtful touches such as a welcome package and jazz on arrival made you feel at home. Beds were comfortable. Location could not be better. Comfortable stay for 5 people. Would highly recommend. Thanks for sharing your home with us.
Amazing location and such a homely feel. Absolutely everything was provided.
The website does not do Rubys Residence full justice. Proximity, cleanliness, facilities,comfort, welcome, communication, personal touches all first class. Highly recommended.

Ruby’s was in a fantastic location within  walking distance to the highlights of the main street. The owners had thought of everything and the platter and local wine on arrival was very thoughtful and a lovely way to kickstart our stay in the beautiful Barossa. We would definitely stay at Ruby’s again.
So convenient, so well stocked and very clearly cared for. We were very comfortable here for our three days and will definitely stay at Ruby’s on our next trip.

Such a great place to stay - we arrived on a very cold winters day and it was so lovely to open the door and find the heating on, jazz music playing and some lovely welcome goodies! We chilled out right away - this place is so comfortable and homely, super well equipped and with so many thoughtful touches.  We loved our stay here!  Great location - very quiet and yet so convenient for walking to local restaurants and shops, for quiet strolling around the historic neighbourhood and for exploring all parts of the Valley.  Lizha and Geoff have been so thoughtful in providing for a relaxing and very comfortable stay.  We will definitely return!
Great house, great location with everything in Tanunda a very short walk away. Highly recommend

A quaint place to stay very close to the Main Street and all of the popular places to eat, drink and shop. Quirky décore.  Comfortable and clean.  Host left breakfast items for us as well as other nibbles to enjoy which was very generous!
Walking distance to everything. Comfortable stay. With all the little extras. We loved spending time at Marlovisa place. Would love to come back again soon.

Wonderful location so close to everything in the heart of Tanunda. Loved bike riding and driving to the surrounding wineries, and then were able to return home to walk to the many local wine bars and eateries for the afternoon/evening. Supermarket also super close for anything you might need. Ruby’s cottage was immaculately clean, warm and comfortable. Lizha and Geoff have thought of absolutely everything. Thanks for a brilliant stay.
Amazing house in a brilliant location. We couldn't have been happier with everything. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a base to explore the Barossa.

Loved everything about this place. It was spotless, comfortable and the perfect location for experiencing Tanunda and the Barossa Valley. The hosts have made sure that everything you could want or need is provided from the essentials to the thoughtful touches they have included to make you feel welcome. Would definitely recommend Ruby’s Residence and look forward to coming back.

So close to town, so you can walk to everything
House was exceptionally clean and very well presented
Lots of extra little touches that made our stay even more special
A very special place
Very clean and great location, central to cafes, wine bars and shops on the Main Street. Had everything we needed and very comfortable.

We had a wonderful experience staying at Marlovisas house - perfect location right in the middle of town but very peaceful. The house was impeccably clean and well appointed with so many lovely goodies to enjoy during our stay.
We enjoyed our trip to the Barossa so much, we are planning the next trip and we look forward to coming back to stay with Marlovisa again.

Fantastic location just steps away from the main st of Tanunda this beautiful cottage has everything you need for a great stay. Absolutely spotlessly clean with lots of unexpected extras I cannot recommend this property highly enough - we loved our stay
This home is beautiful and comfortable with every detail being thought about. It was truely a home away from home. The location couldn’t be better being a short walk from the Main Street.

Loved this place! On arrival there was welcoming snacks/food and drinks representing the local produce as gifts (think chocolates, wine, milk, juice, cheese and biscuits etc) and well stocked staples in the kitchen. The aircon was on, music playing and a beautiful smelling candle on. House was spotless, large, plenty of reading materials, bath etc. All of the linen and towels were Sheridan etc and felt very luxe. Definitely a country chic place. And it’s literally a 1 minute walk to the Main Street. Would 100% recommend. We loved it. Especially all of the thoughtful extras. A wonderful and relaxing stay.
A clean and modern apartment in an excellent location within walking distance of all the main attractions of Tanunda

Bianca's guesthouse was very modern, clean with beautiful furnishings. Clearly a lot of love and effort has gone into making this a welcoming space. Bianca was friendly and polite, giving us a few tips during check-in, but left us with plenty of privacy. Would recommend to anyone as a great base to visit some wineries and check out the local area. Thanks!

We loved the way Bienca had furnished her accommodation. A lot of effort and passion was required . Beds were extremely comfortable and great bathroom and kitchen . Very peaceful ,clean and fresh. Loved the little extras eg. Breakfast ingredients and fresh choose of milk . We also took our bikes and rode to local wineries .  Great Bush getaway.
Great place to stay

A hidden gem in the Barossa
Once you step in the accommodation you’ll be impressed by the immaculate little flat
Great attention to details
Bianca has thought about everything
Would give 6 stars if we could
Will definitely come back if we visit the Barossa again

We enjoyed a warm , friendly welcome from Bianca and her family. The cottage was immaculate and spacious, and well appointed with luxurious and thoughtful touches. This is a gem at the gateway to the Barossa Valley. We would like to visit again!

Bianca's home is a lovely, stylish space close to all the best the Barossa has to offer! We loved staying at the property, which was beautifully decorated and suited us perfectly. Bianca and her family were also friendly and helpful during our stay. We hope to visit again next time!
Great location to get to all the wineries that Barossa has to offer. Place was extremely clean also

This little gem is super close to the Barossa Valley. Luxury hidden paradise. Everything is brand new and super clean. It’s clearly been put together with a lot of love. Highly recommend a meal at Musque food and wine only 10 min drive away.  Whistler wines, Hermera and Kellermeister were some of our favorite wineries during our visit. Would love definitely stay again on our next visit to the Barossa Valley!
Amazingly clean stylish place to stay. With epic native birds waking you up in the morning. Great location
Great stay, very comfortable space. Will definitely stay again

Bianca's place is absolutely phenomenal! The grounds are gorgeous. The rest house is beautifully done up! It is sparkling clean and has lovely large windows that give you beautiful glimpses of the grounds. She and her family were an absolutely wonderful bunch of people and excellent hosts! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and are surely going to come back to spend more lovely days at her place!
lovely spot, great for access to the barossa's wineries

We absolutely loved every second! Beautiful place and beautiful surroundings! Highly recommend!
Thanks Bianca x
Great place, quiet with great facilities
Spotless property, a little out of the way, but the wonderful quiet makes up for that. Bianca is a cheerful, friendly, helpful host.

The house was bright, clean and very welcoming!

It had all the required amenities and was perfect for our weekend away!!

Would would recommend this house to anyone and would certainly look to return in the future!!

This cottage has been beautifully updated & is a gorgeous place to stay away in the Barossa valley. Accomodating & friendly hosts with thoughtful touches within the airbnb & throughout the stay. The serenity and space surrounding the cottage is beautiful. I would personally stay there again & would recommend to friends.
Great place.  Beautiful quiet little space with gorgeous views and a comfortable space
Great little granny flat in a secluded spot in the Barossa. House was clean and tidy. Great views.

We had a fantastic stay at Tamu guesthouse! The hosts were very welcoming and great to communicate with. The guest house is on the edge of the Barossa Valley but not far at all to drive to wineries and restaurants. We were also able to get a taxi from Altona to go out to dinner which was very convenient. The location is super quiet which is great for relaxing - and we even got to see some kangaroos! The guesthouse has everything that you could need, is beautifully decorated and extremely clean. I definitely recommend staying at Tamu Barossa.
A beautiful, warm and cosy cottage, clean and everything we needed. Very close drive to Tanunda and local wineries. Bianca was a very hospitable and accommodating host. A lovely place to stay!

We chose Bianca’s guest house for some tranquility and nature and that’s exactly what we got.

We saw lots of kangaroos and birds. We went for walks in nature at the conservation park right across the road. We saw lots of beautiful wild flowers.

The house is very clean and comfortable and quiet. The location is close enough to town to make it quick and convenient to jump in the car and get supplies or go out for a meal. Bianca’s dining suggestions are spot on. We had some of the best food experiences ever.

Bianca and her family are lovely.

We strongly recommend this place.

A lovely. little cabin in a very peaceful location. Spacious and beautifully appointed with  a great shower! . The hosts were very friendly and  helpful . There is a very nice walk 200 metres away. We would stay there again.
A lovely peaceful place to stay. Very clean and well presented with lovely spacious light filled rooms. Everything you need is there and the perfect location to explore the Barossa.
Great base from which to explore the barossa valley, very comfortable and stylish with easy check in and check out. Would recommend to anyone planning a trip to Barossa.

We enjoyed staying at ‘Tamu Barossa’ which looks even better in real life than the photos show.  The cabin has been upgraded, with a fully functional kitchen and quality fixtures throughout.   It is located in a quiet, private area with views onto trees.  There is a wonderful and large walking reserve just a couple of hundred metres down the road where we saw kangaroos and lots of birds.  Wineries and the sculture park are also close by.  ‘Tamu Barossa’ is located in a tucked away part of the Baroosa, often overlooked.  Bianca is a gracious and warm host and not at all intrusive.   We have no hesitation recommending her place.
A beautiful cottage with all the amenities you will  need. The layout is great and is really nice and quiet.

The guest house was very clean and modern, communication was great and we enjoyed our stay. Quite strict on the rules however and we received quite an angry and unpleasant telling off for parking our car closer to the accomodation while packing up which soured our experience.
Amazing location and close to all the vineyards. The place was spotless and loved the fast communications!
Great spot, newly renovated nice place with everything you need

Bianca's place was lovely and clean in a convenient location about 15m from the back of the main house. It contained enough cooking utensils for a basic meal with all your basics provided. We enjoyed the peacefulness and wildlife and would certainly recommend Bianca's place.
The place is good for a couple to stay a couple of days close to Barossa region.
The accommodation was lovely and even thought our stay was cut short (thanks to SA's lockdown) we would definitely go back to stay again.

Tamu Cottage is a little oasis situated on a small property.  It offers complete comfort and tranquility with all the amenities that one would expect.  The cottage is so very clean and the fixtures of high quality - why would you want to stay in a hotel when you can stay here for a fraction of the price and the ambiance it offers.  Bianca is lovely and very easy to communicate with.  The beds are so comfortable and we really appreciated the complimentary coffee pods, milk and breakfast muesli - not to mention the extra special chocolates.  We would recommend this accommodation to anyone.  Julie & Paul - Adelaide.

Such a relaxing and beautiful stay, just as described. The place was so peaceful, you’d never have known there were any neighbours.
Very nicely decorated, fully functional and comfortable. Plus the recommendations and local brochures were of great assistance.

We had such a relaxing stay at Bianca’s guesthouse. The place was newly renovated and the interior design was a beautiful farmhouse style. We had everything we needed in terms of amenities and location was perfect for exploring the vineyards. Would highly recommend if heading to the Barossa.
A nice and quiet place in a perfect distance to all the highlights of Barossa Valley. We enjoyed our stay and would repeat it anytime.

Bianca’s place definitely exceeded expectations. Amazing space that’s clearly had of lot of time being done up. It’s very comfy, spacious and very quiet spot after a solid wine tour. Couldn’t ask for a better location either, short walk or drive to so so many wineries, cafes, pubs and everything else in between! Would love to come back sometime.
Simply stunning! A beautiful peaceful space with everything you could possibly need. Perfect for relaxing and close to some stunning wineries. Cannot recommend enough.
A beautifully renovated place to read and relax. Bianca was a fantastic host and I would love to stay again in the future.
Amazing location,  easy to get to , close to the Barossa , a lovely renovated space , super clean, highly recommend

Beautiful self contained 1 bedroom cottage. Full of amenities: fully equipped kitchen, bathroom and gorgeous little touches from the host (including Nespresso machine). Excellent location; convenient  to all areas of the Barossa. Only 10 minute drive to Tanunda. Highly recommend for any length of stay in the Barossa
Excellent place for a quiet weekend getaway. Very clean and great facilities. Thank you
A very spacious and comfortable place to stay. The guesthouse was spotless and the Nespresso machine and breakfast basket was a nice touch. We will definitely be back!
Bianca's place in Altona was the perfect location to spend a peaceful weekend in the Barossa Valley. We would recommend Bianca as a host and would happily come back to Altona.
Bianca was very helpful prior to  the stay with the useful local  tips,  unit looks brand new, clean and in a great location. we have also been provided with  baby stuff and cute towel
Tamu is a lovely, peaceful little spot that is a short drive to local wineries. Fantastic amenities, everything you might need has been thought of and provided!
Such a beautiful little place and welcoming..very peaceful atmosphere!Would definitely recommend it for people who want to relax and enjoy the beautiful atmosphere ❤️
Well appointed, modern, tidy, quiet, clean. Close to Lyndoch and a beautiful nearby walking trail just down the road which is worth exploring. An enjoyable stay.

Quite a spacious place for two people, with nice touches throughout. Very quiet location and close to the wine region. Close to the hosts' own house but still private. Good base for exploring the Barossa valley.

Great place to visit the Barossa. Would recommend to friends/ relatives. Host Bianca was great.
Had everything we needed in the place & bed was very comfortable!
