We loved our stay!  Perfect location, private, surrounded by vineyards on every side!  The house was spacious and comfortable and fit our group of four perfectly.  Thanks again for a wonderful stay!

Beautiful big home in a great location! So peaceful, even with the kids..they were too busy exploring the home and playing with the swing! We spent the night with the family and everyone loved it! Dorham was great with communication and assistance!
Amazing spot, great place to host dinner etc. everything was clean and easy in/out.
Good stay
Triple Creek Guest House is a fantastic place to stay, out in the country with an impressive size and decor.

It is a beautiful home! It is a huge house with lots of space for a big group of people. Each bedroom was very spacious (especially the main bedroom with an en-suite!) and the beds were very comfortable. The house had a good heating system to keep you warm in cold days in Barossa.

Just a few other facts to prepare your stay!
It uses rain water tank( like lots of farms houses do) and the tab water had a bit of colour. I’m sure it is safe to drink but ensure to bring bottled water if you don’t feel comfortable.
The kitchen has a very limited supplies so if you are planning a family or group of people staying, you will have to come prepared (like coffee, milk etc). Not many cooking tools like pots, pans and utensils are available either.

The house was in the beautiful setting of vineyards and totally private, and we all enjoyed our stay here!!

Triple Creek Guest House is an amazing place, surrounded by vineyards and in the middle of nowhere but close to Barossa towns. It is so quiet but has top quality fittings. A great place to stay for 3-4 couples.

Great location for easy access to the beautiful Barossa valley. Property is great for families to spread out
And enjoy themselves. Would recommend!
I prefer not to
Great house for a large group to stay. Beautiful location an easy drive away from other wineries and Tanunda.
Amazing secluded location and great for a large family! Lovely property
Definitely will book again.
Great home. PLENTY of space. everything you need!

We enjoyed our family weekend away at Triple Creek.  A great location and beautiful  surroundings to walk around and a very comfortable spacious home.  Was great to be able to take our little  dogs along to.
Great hidden gem right in the heart of all the wineries. We will be back
Surrounded by vineyards this location is perfect to just stop and take it all in!
The location is amazing. Very peaceful as you’re surrounded by vineyards, 360 degrees. No traffic at all. The house is very spacious with all the amenities you could need or want.

This place was amazing, the photos don’t this place justice. When you walk in the front doors the house size shocks you, looks can definitely be deceiving.

The location was spectacular absolutely breath taking, lots to see and very peaceful.

I came here with my bridal party the night before my wedding, the place was just perfect, large enough to fit a football team and beautiful enough to take amazing photos.

They have all the utensils needed for cooking, bathrooms were very clean, beds super comfy, everything was just perfect.

Communication was a dream.
This place is amazing, the photos don’t do it justice, beautifully big and spacious home with lovely views, Would stay again & would recommend to anyone :)

Nestled in amongst the vineyards this home is restful and private. A wide variety of birdlike & wildlife - rabbits, kangaroos, blue wrens, honeyeaters etc. Also, if you want a modern home with lots of space and WiFi etc then this place is awesome.
My young adult children (18-22) and parents (70's) all enjoyed the time spent here.

Hosts were responsive and genuinely interested in our enjoyment of their place.
Thanks.

We were blown away by how spacious the house was. It was so clean and the beds were extremely comfortable - we didn’t want to get out. It was wonderful having nature surrounding us and we enjoyed walking around the property. We had a wonderful stay.
Outstanding property amongst the vineyards! Spacious, clean and tranquil.
Would highly recommend staying at Triple Creek Winery. The views were stunning and the house was spacious and comfortable! Perfect for a group trip. We enjoyed our stay.
Fabulous large house in a relaxing country location. Perfect for families!

This house is beautiful and very spacious. Everything you need is inside and outside of this home……set in a vineyard adds to the charm. Dorham was very quick in responding when questions were asked and the addition of wines to be purchased as well as a complimentary bottle and after dinner mints was the icing on this luxurious escape! Thanks guys 🥰

The hosts are amazing to communicate with and are super nice! The house was so clean, and the location was just beautiful! We had our micro wedding here, and it was just gorgeous! The house, surroundings and all! 10/10 recommend
Excellent home in Fantastic location, not another place in sight, you're at one with vineyards and countryside!
A beautiful setting. Lovely large house. Tranquil!
Highly recommend staying here.  Clean, spacious and close to popular wineries and attractions.  Communication with Dorham was easy and effortless.
Spacious house in the heart of the Barossa!!

Lovely modern spacious house with amazing views and very comfortable. Close to nearby wineries and Tanunda. Loved being able to bring my daughters dog.
Excellent communication with owner. Would highly recommend
We stayed for a girls weekend and loved the spacious home and beautiful outlook over the vines. Great getaway in a quiet but convenient location. Would recommend

Great Experience! Lovely house, clean, and spacious. We could walk to Hentley Farm and Seppeltsfield which was really convenient.  Waking up to a vineyard every morning was spectacular. A great Barossa Experience.
Great house, relaxing, central to the Barossa. Comfortable and clean. Highly recommended!
Absolutely loved our stay here!
Beautiful spacious home nestled in the vineyards. Close to towns and Cellar doors. The full Barossa experience. We highly recommend this stay.
Spacious and clean place to stay. Great place for big groups if you are coming for holiday.
Wished we stayed longer! The place is really clean and relaxing. The view of the vineyard from the house is amazing!
We loved our stay! Beautiful location within the vines. The house is huge, way larger then in the photos! Great house for a big group.
Excellent place, enjoyed the stay!
Excellent in every respect.  Huge house in as new condition in a beautiful location.

The house is very spacious. Huge main bedroom suite and ample room in the living area which comprises dining, living and kitchen. The house is well appointed and the pleasant outlook over the vines. The area is quiet since it slightly out of town. Not too far to get to a range of restaurants and well placed to readily visit large and small cellar doors. Or just stay in and cater for yourselves.
We stayed here before our wedding at Seppeltsfield, beautiful location, perfect venue and Dorham was a great host. Can’t wait to stay again

If Under the Vines is available for your dates, stop looking and BOOK IT NOW. As a Superhost, I appreciate when a host has gone the extra mile. Karen has gone the extra 10 miles. The finest stay with Airbnb I have ever had, in my 5+ years on the platform. She is very thoughtful, the space is carefully thought out. The location is PERFECT for exploring Barossa Valley right between Nuri and Tanunda, just perfect. Incredible views. It is hosts like Karen and places like Under the Vines that make Travel so exciting. 11/10 experience.

Such a beautiful place and really is such a relaxing getaway, so many great local tips and the little restaurants and bakeries nearby are great, we also went fishing nearby and had a great time. The house is beautiful and was just the holiday we needed, Highly recommend 10/10.

We couldn’t recommend this cottage highly enough. Sparkling clean, beautifully appointed with lots of little touches to make our stay special. We will definitely be back! Thank you, Karen. The effort you have gone to with the cottage was simply amazing!
Absolutely amazing place 100% recommend this house for anyone! Thanks so much Karen for the hospitality!

Lovely place, and such a generous breakfast. All the ameneties and extra touches that you could possibly want so we felt so welcome and at home. We had the best time, comfy bed, peaceful surroundings and a movie curled up on the sofa. Thankyou so much Karen we couldnt have asked for anything else. x
A brilliant stay. Great getaway, great location,  excellent value

If you would like to stay in a beautiful environment in a vineyard with quality amenities then this is the ideal for you. The premises and promises are exactly as described on the site. The accommodation was well presented and very very clean. The food supplied in the fridge and also dried foods were of a very good quality and abundant - an extra nice surprise along with many printed suggestions for spending time in the Barossa. We will be returning again very soon.

Great property & Karen really knows how to make visitors feel special. Some amazing & unexpected items in fridge and pantry for us. Only reason for 5 stars is that 6 is not an option! Do yourselves a favour & stay here on your next Barossa trip, Iknow we will!

You will not believe how absolutely perfect Karen’s place is, from the second we walked in the door we were incredibly happy.  So many little touches to make our stay special and everything is so comfortable and feels luxurious.  A really generous and thoughtful host. Thank you Karen. 😊

We loved our first stay so much at this beautiful cottage that we came back for a second time and absolutely loved it! Thanks so much to Karen for all the special touches (breakfast supplies, delicious coffee, cosy fire and spa bath, sparkling clean) that make this feel like your home away from home.   A very comfortable home with everything you need to make your holiday perfect! Thank you!
Beautiful place located centrally to everything for a perfect time in the Barossa.

Beautifully clean and presented - even the fire was already set to be lit! Breakfast provisions were plentiful and tasty. The setting really is beautiful amongst the vines and secluded and private while still being close enough to town. We would definitely stay here again.

PERFECT!
⭐ Location superb
⭐ Super clean
⭐ Quite and private
⭐ Wonderfully cosy and comfortable
⭐ Awesome Host!
I cannot fault this property and if I could give it more thsn 5 stars I would.

A fantastic Barossa getaway. Everything you could possibly want was provided. The setting among the vines was beautiful & short drive to all the local towns, wineries & attractions. The accommodation was first class with lots & lots of little extras which made it perfect. Thanks Karen, we will spread the word......

Karen's house is a sophisticated refurbishment of a building on a working vineyard on the outskirts of Tanunda. With two large bedroooms, two lovely bathrooms (not ensuite), a full laundry, an excellent kitchen and a large living area with a wood burning fire it is one of the best equipped short term stay houses I have seen anywhere in the world.
Whilst you do need to drive into Tanunda the setting is peaceful and the location is very central for the many vineyards in the Barossa. I highly recommend this property

This place is a great pairing to your Barossa experience. My partner and I felt so relaxed as we came home and relax, making full use of the well stocked kitchen and luxurious appointments. Would recommend.
This is a quite unique place set literally among vineyards of the Barossa.  Karen is a terrific host who goes the extra mile for guests.  Highly recommend.

Lovely spot - quiet, conveniently located to
Major Barossa towns. Great breakfast provisions. Thanks Karen.
There is no better place to stay to enjoy the Barossa. Absolute  home away from home with luxury accommodation and very generous wholesome provisions. We didn’t want to leave.

Well furnished accomodation quite literally amongst the vines.... private but still a close drive to shops and wineries so we found this a great place to base ourselves. We loved all the thoughtful touches such as the well stocked kitchen and bathroom, the wood fire place and outdoor area with bbq. We would stay again.
Lovely place to spend a few days, very comfortable and lovely garden to sit amongst the vines. Only a few minutes from Tanunda, and delicious breakfast provided too! Hope to be back!
Great place to stay, attention to detail. Karen has thought of everything, very clean, comfortable and relaxing.
Fantastic home away from home

Karen was a wonderful host and there were so many wonderful touches (brekky supplies, chocolates, the list goes on)!
The location is perfect, close to Tanunda but in a really peaceful and private spot, right among vineyards.
Highly recommend a stay here.
Absolutely brilliant. The place was everything we were looking for. It cannot be faulted.
We really enjoyed our stay. Spacious and very relaxing.

Karen is a fantastic host. Would highly recommend this place, great location & ease of comms throughout. Very thoughtful added extras makes for an extremely comfortable stay. We would definitely stay again.
We had a fabulous stay. The place was clean and had everything and more for a relaxing stay. We felt very spoilt and comfortable.

We had a wonderful time during our stay at the Under the Vines cottage. Set on a vineyard, the views are fantastic.
Big comfy beds, spacious living area and a great kitchen with all the breakky essentials included. Karen is a lovely host who was very accomodating for our little bub.
Close to some beautiful wineries and eateries too. We’ll definitely be staying again on our next visit.
This house was beautiful

Amazing high spec accommodation. Beautifully decorated and extremely comfortable. Location is second to none, walking distance from cafes, wineries, shops and parks.

We will definitely return and choose this accommodation due to the luxury, location and convenience.

10 out of 10
Stylish, renovated property in perfect location for visiting Barossas best wineries. We had a wonderful, cozy weekend in this beautiful house.
What a stunning place to stay; everything of the highest quality. Great location, walking distance to lots of places to eat and drink. Hosts could not have been more helpful. Highly recommend!!

An amazing property combining the old with the new.  Stunning extension and very luxurious.  Every detail is there - zone heating, bathrooms for every bedroom, underfloor heating. Louise is an excellent host and has all of the tips for where to go.  An excellent trip!

Excellently appointed beautiful northerly
Aspect. Very comfortable for 6 individuals or 3 couples.
Love those heated floors
House was sparkling clean, beautiful interiors  and top end appliances. Made our stay so comfortable and we did not want to leave - will be recommending to anyone heading to the Barossa!

What a fantastic property. It is clear that a lot of hard work, an eye for detail and stylish decor has gone into the house.

It was a pleasure to stay in and so centrally located!
A stunning property with everything you could ever need. We had a terrific time at 10 Murray Street, can’t wait to come back.

Unfortunately, due to an mixed up in booking our preferred dates we weren't able to stay at the property we had originally booked and needed to find somewhere else to stay for my family of 7 at very short noticed. Thankfully, we came across Louise's Place and sent an inquiry if we could book for that day and the following..with relief we received a messaged back within minutes and were all sorted for our two night stay in the Barossa (Website hidden by Airbnb) family can't thank Louise enough for her clear communication, friendly manner and customer service in ensuring we got to enjoy a well deserved family breakaway...The journey became on our arrival to this beautiful property. Loved everything about it...the 3 king beds with quality linen, gorgeous ensuites in each bedroom, master chef kitchen, heated flooring for the chilly mornings, great outdoor space for the 9 and 2 year old to play, minute walk to the Tanunda shops which was perfect for all and so so much more. Thank you again Louise. Warm regards, Jacqui Freeman

If you are fortunate enough to find this fabulous house available when you are visiting the Barossa, grab it quickly, you won’t regret it!

This home is incredible. Stunningly designed, beautifully appointed and walking distance to all the best cafes, restaurants and bars.

Louise responds quickly to all your questions and makes checkin / out easy.

We felt quite sad driving away from this place.

I thoroughly recommend this lovely home and will definitely make it our home when visiting the Barossa.
Great location, close to ammenities, fabulous home - will be back
Wonderful little get away, better than what we expected. A very spacious house, very clean and welcoming. Within walking distance to local stores and cafes.
10 Murray St is very comfortable, spacious and beautifully decorated. It is well located and an easy walk to restaurants and stores.

Stylish comfortable and excellently located in a great little town for exploring this beautiful region of SA
Fine touches and beautiful fittings made this our rural home for a few days .
It was lovely both to return to and wake up in both indications of a great property.
Bathrooms and beds were beautiful as were the linens and the house has a great layout outdoor area was welcome and we enjoyed several games of Boules on the lawn .
Definitely return .
Fantastic place for luxury and comfort. Unbeatable 💕
This is an awesome property in a great location. Ideal base for a group of friends to explore the Barossa.
Absolutely perfect if you are visiting the Barossa. Extremely luxurious and so well equipped for daily visits to wineries and the town. You will not regret choosing this place to stay!

The exceptional standard each AirBNB place should aim for. Beautiful house, excellent amenities (the best beds I’ve ever slept in!!!), perfect location - the cottage is totally on point, as is Louise’s customer service. Worth every cent!!

This is a perfect location to visit the region, coffee places, bars & restaurants are just a few minutes away. The house is stunning! On top of that communication with Louise was super easy. I highly recommend a stay here. Will definitely be back.!
Beautiful house, great location and perfect for a girls trip away!
Louise’s home was fantastic a short stroll to the shops restaurants in tanunda the house was very clean and modern would highly recommend
Beautiful & stylish house as well as being in a great location in Tanunda. Well thought out accomodation and Louise was so accomodating of us. We will be back for sure.
Great amenities, stylish, good position, great value
Amazing location, amazing house! Fantastic place for three couples.

One of the best airbnbs we have stayed in. Worth every single dollar! In fact (and I probably shouldn't say this) I think it's worth more! We can't wait to stay again.
..although I should write a horrible review just so that many don't book our new fav barossa accommodation.😝 X

We adored our time at this beautiful property. The location is perfect for exploring Tanunda (walking distance to cafes, restaurants and more) and a great base for exploring the rest of the Barossa. The house itself is beautiful styled, impeccably clean and has everything you need (including heated floors!) and more for a comfortable weekend away. We will be back for sure.
Amazing! Perfect Location, Amazing House!
You will not be disappointed with 10 Murray street. The modern, clean property suited us to perfection. Thank you

This beautiful home was much more than I expected, as soon as we walked in we felt like it was home, we will be back again and again, this is definitely our go to place when we go to the Barossa - thank you Louise

This is a beautiful house right in the heart of the Barossa and prime location for exploring wineries and restaurants in the in the region.  The house has everything you could possibly need for a weekend away. We had the beds separated into 6 single beds which I was perfect for our group. Louise was very accommodating and responded quickly to any questions.  I would highly recommend
Everything is wonderful.  Location, cleanness, facilities all perfect.
Fantastic location and accomodation. Will definitely be back.
Amazing property to stay in with my bridal party before the big day! Thank you to Louise for being so accommodating!

This accommodation was amazing! It was bigger (and even better) than the photos appear.

All six of us said we would love to stay again.
House is top spec. Beds great, ensuites for all 3 rooms and loads of space. Cant recommend this rental highly enough.
Imagine a cute old cottage transformed into a modern masterpiece. A superb experience. Walking distance to shops, cafes and restaurants and a short drive to vineyards.
A truly beautiful home in a fantastic location. Host Louise was very welcoming and accommodating.

A very beautiful cottage with absolutely everything you could need. We enjoyed our stay very much.
Highly recommended!
A very tranquil and relaxing place to stay. Beautifully fitted out, and handy to all amenities. I could live in a house like this!!
Everything is perfect.
We loved our stay at 10 Murray St!  Beautifully appointed, the home is spacious, luxurious, warm and inviting.  Thank you Louise for being such a wonderful host.
This Air B and B is lovely- the wide open rooms and spaces, the heater flooring, the beautiful textures and furniture made it a wonderful weekend. Louise’s communication was excellent!
great location,  amazing property,  Louise was so helpful and informative

A truly well considered, beautiful experience. From the moment we pulled in it was everything you’d dream about. Each guest is spoilt with their own ensuite, and if you do want to ever leave the house it’s perfectly located - so many amazing places to eat, shop and experience the Barossa.

Beautiful place to stay and feel like you are at home - whether you are exploring the Barossa or need a little getaway this place is great for both. Very clean and well fitted out. Will definitely be staying here again thank you Louise!

This property is ideal for a family or special friends. Heaps to do in close proximity. The classy bathrooms attached to each of the 3 bedrooms makes this perfect. The entertainment area with large openings doors to the back yard allowed us to make use of the nice weather with a couple of fun group games on the back lawn. I cannot recommend on this place highly enough.
Beautiful house. It was very clean and had everything we needed. Louise was a great host. A wonderful place to stay.
Amazing house and very friendly host. Highly recommended

We loved everything about this house and our stay. The beds are really comfortable and  all the amenities are great and as detailed. Louise is very responsive and helpful. We look forward to a return visit.

The photos on the website were amazing but the house in reality was even more impressive! Perfectly located in the main street and within walking distance to gorgeous shops and bars, the scene was set from the minute we turned into the driveway. A beautiful garden provided a stunning outlook and every detail inside and out was beautifully considered and crafted. Such a gorgeous home allowed us the opportunity to relax and enjoy each other’s company and spend time with our family who lived minutes away. Can’t wait to do it all again soon! Thank you Lousie for being so lovely to deal with, and  for a beautiful weekend.
Extremely well appointed, beautifully presented & modernised renovated stone cottage in heart of Barossa. Walk to restaurants, shops & cafe’s. Sublime.

Fantastic homestead and location. The house was very clean and had everything there for our stay. We only had to bring food and clothes! Back yard is great for the kids to play and entertain.
Will be coming back for sure!

A beautiful property with lovely personal touches. Quality linen snd towels and very comfortable beds.
Communication from Louise was excellent.
Highly recommend.
Fantastic location- hopefully can stay again one day!

Fabulous place. Well appointed with everything you need. Location is excellent.
We had a wonderful relaxing stay.
I could not recommend this house more. Perfectly set up for a group of friends to stay for a weekend in the Barossa. Three enormous bedrooms all with ensuites.
Wow! This was really a fabulous place to stay in every way. We will be back.
Perfect location.  Great house, clean and it has everything one needs.  Highly recommend
Beautiful home with so many lovely touches. Very well thought out & clean. Louise was very helpful, highly recommend
Louise’s house is absolutely stunning! We loved our stay here. Cannot wait to book again!! Thank you Louise for being a wonderful host!
A perfect base right in town, beautiful house and very clear and helpful communication with Louise. Would highly recommend for a group of three couples. Coffee great too! Thanks 😊

Wow, we were so impressed with the house and aspect of the manicured gardens from the large kitchen, dining and living room.

A very spacious and architecturally designed house , merging old world charm with modern design and facilities. We really liked how it was truly a self contained house with all the necessary items such as salt, pepper, oil, glad wrap, and a welcome box of chocolates, 2 litres of milk (not small long life stuff) and orange juice. The quality of the hand sanitisers, shampoo , conditioner etc.

Louise was such a pleasure to deal with from the time of booking and throughout. Truly a 5 star experience.

We didn't get a chance to explore all we wanted to see in the Barossa, so will definitely be back. Can't wait!
Very clean and exactly what we were after. The House itself was even nicer in real life - a marvellous renovation and hosts were really great. Communication was 10/10.
Charming place, with lots of space, in an excellent location to explore Barossa. The host gave us all the ingredients for delicious breakfasts on the house. We had a great 2 night stay.
Lovely historic building, good location, spacious, quiet, warm and cosy, welcoming host

A quiet spot in the heart of the Barossa.  The spacious suite of rooms is just around the corner from the pub. A 15 minute cab ride/drive from Tanunda with cafes and shops aplenty.  We were delighted to find this gem!

We thoroughly enjoyed every step of our connection with this very hospitable couple and loved staying in this quaint home constructed in traditional Barossa Stone style of the 1800 and early 1900s. We found Lyndoch a perfect location in easy distance to all Barossa Vineyards.

Our host’s hospitality and responsiveness were first rate; always time for a chat and interested to find out how our adventures had gone. The gardens are coming up a treat and will be spectacular in Spring.

We loved the historic setting and enjoyed our stay immensely. Thank you

Frank & Elizabeth
Excellent accomodation in a great location
Huge comfortable bed, very clean and spacious, lovely high ceilings, friendly and helpful hosts who gave me my privacy too. Had a lovely break away.
Great spacious space. Like the classic decor. Truly appreciate the thoughtfulness of the host and ease of communication.

The old library building is amazing - it's much better than the Airbnb listing lets on. You have your own entrance, own private suite, gorgeous soft bed, sitting area, microwave, fridge etc - the list goes on. And you're very easy strolling distance to the local bakery, pub, wineries, shop and more. Will definitely stay here again if we're back in Lyndoch in the future. :)

Thank you for an amazing stay.
The place was bigger then what we expected. Brett was an amazing host felt very welcome. If we are ever down that way again would definitely stay again!
We had a great stay after a long day of wine tasting in the Barossa Valley. Great location, everything was awesome, warm welcome from Brett! Would stay again for sure.

Historic Valley House is amazing. We loved the old charm with class.
The huge bed was very comfortable and the whole place was sparkling clean.
It is walking distance to some wineries, the pub and bakery.
Brett is a great host full of historic info and of Barossa Valley.
Timeless accommodation with all the comfort needed.
Spotlessly clean heritage  cottage. Good communication from host and everything included to make our stay comfortable including Tim Tams! Thanks for having us.
Brett is an amazing host. He helped me out with an earlier check in and his place felt so homely and welcoming. Will definitely recommend this place as a must stay, when in Lyndoch 😊
The Heritage Valley house is in a good location, close to cafe, general store, pub. It’s a beautiful house, quiet, clean. Brett is a good host and we had a comfortable stay.

Our stay with Brett and Lee was perfection, it was great to have the pleasure to stay in accommodation with such history and charm. We found the accommodation extremely comfortable with everything you could ever need and the location was brilliant! We recommend hiring bikes from Lyndoch Hill and exploring the local wineries - it’s a day well spent! We cannot wait to come back to SA and particularly the Barossa.

Outstanding accomodation right in the heart of the Barossa! Brett has done a magnificent job with this property - old world charm and pristine throughout. His hospitality was perfect and the little touches throughout only added to the comfort of our stay. The location is far enough off the beaten track that you think you feel you’ve escaped to a quieter, slower part of the world while being close enough to Tanunda and all the major wineries and restaurants. However nearby are a heap of great wineries within stumbling distance and a sensational  little bakery. You won’t go wrong staying here
Cleanliness and presentation was excellent. The host willingness to help us and surprise us with some unexpected treats was beyond our expectations.
5-star stay at Brett's place, very clean and cosy in a very beautiful house. We recommend !

Comfortable and spacious with history and old world charm. Brett friendly and helpful with local knowledge of places to eat, do wine tasting or go for a walk. Close to wineries and a short drive to the other Barossa towns.
Brett's home in Lyndoch is absolutely charming, spotlessly clean and extremely comfortable.  It is in an ideal location to begin a tour of the Barossa Valley.
Charming old house in the Barossa! Brett is a very nice and helpful host !
Brett was so helpful and accommodating. The house is lovely and full of history. It is walking distance to many dining options. We had a lovely stay.
A lovely, spacious area to explore the Barossa. We enjoyed the thoughtful touches of guidebooks and local tips. Walking distance to a few wineries and local eateries. Thanks Brett, we’ll be back!
A bed but no breakfast.
Very gracious surroundings, roomy, great bed, quiet, great location to explore Barossa. Very congenial hosts. Recommend.

Loved loved this place! Brett was an incredible genuine host, very welcoming and knew a lot about the area which he passed on to us. The guest suite was beautiful, a stunning old style space and furniture to match . A great location to get to different areas in the Barossa - highly recommend!

This historical place is fabulous. It had everything that we needed and the bed was so comfy. This place was spotlessly clean. Brett was a perfect host and even carried our luggage inside for us. Thanks Brett.

Brett greeted us on arrival and showed us around our accommodation. It is centrally located in Lyndoch and easy walk to the hotel and restaurants. He also gave us many tips for local attractions.
A fantastic place to stay, highly recommend.
Worth every cent. Great location, beautiful house.

Lovely place to stay. Brett was very welcoming and provided us with useful local knowledge. The house was well air conditioned for 40 degree days! Comfortable bed and ceiling fan and well equipped lounge area. Well located next to pub, restaurant and cafes as well as wineries. We would definitely stay again.
Wonderful accommodation, fantastic host, ideal location. Lots of nice, homely touches - excellent value. Highly recommended. Mark
Lovely historic home.  Central to all Barossa Valley tourist sites.

Friendly host. Beautiful accommodation. Comfortable lounge. Great tea and coffee facilities.
Great king sized bed and ensuite.
I loved the views. It's close to the local pub and restaurant. Only minutes away from Lou's Place.
We had the perfect weekend.

Beautiful home in a great location to explore the Barossa Valley. Restaurants and convenience store within walking distance and only a short drive away from other towns and wineries. The suite is spacious and great for a couples getaway.
Beautiful, peaceful space. Comfortable and spacious. Hosts went out of their way to ensure we were comfortable.

Valley House was a fantastic place to stay if you want to explore the Barossa Valley area. The accommodation we once the historic town library and Brett and Lee have tastefully decorated the rooms accordingly. The bed was really comfortable, and the lounge area was huge. There is a massive parking area (off-street) in front of the house. Everything was super clean and the owners could not have been more friendly and hospitable. We would definitely stay there again and recommend this place highly.
Very clean, well-maintained and in a great location to explore the Barossa. We couldn’t have asked for anything more!

Great location in a quiet town that is walking distance to two wineries.
Fabulous place to stay in an old historic house that oozes history. The facilities in the house were spacious and clean. Noting was too much trouble for the hosts.
Helpful host and nice historic residence to stay in, in a small town in Barossa south.
We had a lovely stay, great location to almost anywhere you want to be in the valley.
very nice clean place, Brett and Sue place is a beautiful place
A well located cottage in the heart of the Barossa. Everything we needed was accommodated by Brett.

Loved our stay at Valley House!  Brett was a great host and very welcoming.  The guest suite was super spacious, very clean, well-maintained - and the king-sized bed was just amazingly comfortable.  Couldn’t have asked for anything more, would definitely stay again.  Highly recommend!

The accommodation is in a great location and basis for travel around the Barossa. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and thought the accommodation was priced appropriately. The room was well equipped and spotlessly clean. Brett was very friendly and easy to communicate with.

Great place to stay. We enjoyed the lavender trail and bike riding. Also nearby restaurant and cafes in Lyndoch.  Great location to explore local wineries. Brilliant king size bed microwave kettle toaster bar frig  etc all very handy.   Highly recommended.

Nice clean house (front half) right in the middle of Lyndoch within easy walking distance of the Main Street.  Brett was a great host taking care to ensure we were comfortable.  Enjoyed visiting during winter to get different perspective of the Barossa!
This was a beautiful place to stay. Brett and Lee were excellent hosts and the town of Lyndoch was completely charming.

Beautiful accommodation with excellent attention to detail. Better than some hotels I’ve stayed in.
We are very private people and enjoyed the privacy. Walking distance to Main Street. Highly recommend.
Lovely clean and spacious rooms in an historic building. Delightful garden setting and a short stroll to pub, cafes and groceries. We enjoyed our 2 night stay with Brett and Lee.

Lovely place to relax ,on the verandah, or in the large rooms
Hosts very kind and helpful, but gave you all the privacy you need
Very comfortable, and clean,
little kitchen area for breakfasts , pub and shops 2 min away
Really enjoyed the atmosphere and stay

I could not recommended staying here enough. On arrival you receive a warm welcome into this stunning, spacious yet cosy home. So clean and well kept with so much character. If you are staying in the Barossa and want a home away from home hosted by lovely people this is the place for you. I wish I could give it more stars.

The house was perfect -
Comfortable and warm and private. Although the hosts live on site, we felt like we had the house to ourselves.
The hosts looked after us very well with keeping dishes clean, and water replenished.
The house was clean and inviting. Perfect for a couple’s peaceful getaway.
Lee was very hospitable, her place is extremely comfortable, clean and plenty spaces, we enjoyed our stay in her place and highly recommended.
Great place! Bret was very kind with recommendations and looking after us

Great place to get away in a lovely old house.  The hosts are great and friendly.  Terrific location and only short distance to Tanunda and wineries.  Highly recommend a stay here it is a beautiful place and part of the Barossa.

excellent location,
great accommodation
highly recommended
best regards Vince

The location in central Lyndoch is an excellent base to explore the surrounding Barossa, Clare and Adelaide Hills areas. Very comfortable, clean and private accommodation in a beautiful old stone house. It had everything we required for our stay including a small kitchen for simple meals and breakfast. Cafes and pub are a short walk away.

A great spot to explore the Barossa. The amenities were great and the bed was very comfortable. The hosts were just lovely and our stay was very enjoyable. Highly recommended. Hopefully we will be back for a longer stay soon.

Brett’s place was beautiful! A gorgeous piece of history and a lovely part of town to stay.  The facilities were very clean and tidy.  Everything was perfect. The only small feedback is probably having a sink available for the “kitchenette area”, but understandable that is not an easy change.  Would highly recommend Brett’s place!
This was the perfect, private stay for a few days in the Barossa and surrounds. Clean, spacious, with everything we needed. Highly recommend this beautiful spot!
Lovely historic house, quite private even though joined, wonderful king size bed.
Fantastic private space with historic charm! Great location for exploring the Barossa and surrounds. Would definitely recommend.
Private , character home. , centrally placed to explore The Barossa Vally . Brett & Lee very welcoming 🌞

A very comfortable spacious 1 bedroom unit, clean with good (disabled friendly) facilities and cooking equipment/ amenities
Linda was a good and responsive host. Thank you
Linda’s place is a lovely place to stay.  Very quiet area but accessible to so much of the Barossa region.  Very clean with some lovely thoughtful touches.

pleasent stay ,
great location.
thank you
Thank you for hosting us for a lovely night away. Your place was lovely and comfortable and very clean
Easy convenient location in Greenock. Walking distance to Greenock Hotel, El Estanco, several Cellar Doors, the Brewery and a beautiful gift/homewares shop
The BnB was in a great location, close by to some lovely cellar doors. It was nice and clean and Linda was very accomodating!
Great self contained apartment within walking distance to several wineries, pub and brewery. Linda was a lovely host and we will definitely stay again! 🤩
Great communication. Lovely, tidy place. Was exactly what we needed on a night away. Check in process very easy.

A very clean, spacious, homely bnb. Linda is a thoughtful, responsive,
accommodating host. Walking distance to the local pub where we had amazing meals Also walking distance to wineries. 100% recommend.
A clean lovely place in the right location to the centre of Greenock
Quiet little spot, warm and cosy perfect for a little getaway.
A lovely cosy place to stay in the Barossa!
This is a great place to enjoy the historic village of Greenock from. It has all the facilities you could wish for and is in perfect order. Enjoy!
Great place to stay at. Linda was excellent at communicating and all and all was a great place. Lovely backyard area to sip your wine.
We had an amazing time.  Linda's place for gorgeous.  So peaceful.
Great space, conveniently located with all we needed.

Terrific B&B, great central location to Barossa, with top local eateries in the Greenock Hotel and El Estenco.
Very clean and roomy unit with relaxing outdoor area on back porch.
Linda is a terrific host and can recommend the best places locally.
Communication is second to none, thankyou Linda for making a great weekend for us.
Chris & Adriana.
Nice place, in a lovely town.
I would recommend Linda BnB it quite close to very thing . Walking distance to pub wineries and brewery. All other town close.
Very comfortable, clean and peaceful. Located in a beautiful suburb within walking distance of  great pub.
Great spot. Clean, neat and tidy with everything you need. Highly recommend.
Was a nice and tidy little place, very close to everything in the area. Would definitely stay here again!
Highly recommended and very convenient to local attractions.
nice and quiet place for escape

We loved the location, the unit was roomy and clean and the covered outdoor area and backyard with views of trees and sights and sounds of birds were delightful.  Lots of thoughtful little touches,. We hope to stay again.

Linda’s Airbnb was great, has all the things you need and is more spacious than most granny flats with it’s own backyard. Was very neat and tidy and perfect for our stay in the Barossa. Linda was a great host, and was super accommodating when we unexpectedly needed to stay longer than expected.
A very stylish and modern B&B. Fantastic value for money. The hosts provided little extras that made the stay even more special. Highly recommended. Would definitely return!!

A beautiful central location in Mt Pleasant! Such a lovely place to stay, with all the amenities and personal touches you could possibly think of, we definitely didn’t want for anything. The super comfortable bed made for an amazing couple of nights sleep. We can’t recommend this place or Shari and Gareth highly enough, truly was a lovely weekend. ❤️
A cosy space a little drive from the main Barossa Wineries. The rooms are very clean and have lots of little homely and thoughtful touches.
A great place to stay with all amenities and with thoughtful touches.
Awesome hospitality and great hosts. Highly recommend staying here. ✌🏾🌺

We spent the weekend at Shari & Gareth's place and liked it so much we added another night . The place is really comfortable and and was pleasantly surprised to have a bottle of wine & a box of chocolates waiting for us . Even a chocolate each on our pillows .
They contacted us before we checked in to ask what sort of bread & milk do we like .They put a lot of thought into making sure we had everything we needed .
The bed is super comfy and the outdoor porch area is nice . We had total privacy and enjoyed having there little dog Pero coming around to visit . Shari was concerned Pero may bother us and would keep him away but we were happy to have him around .
Definitely recommend

Beautiful little place to stay. The owners attention to detail is remarkable. They have thought of everything you may need for your one night stay. Very clean and stylish quiet place. Hosts give you your privacy but if you need anything they are there to help.
I had a lovely nights stay in Mount Pleasant with great hospitality.
A very quiet place to stay close to the Barossa and Adelaide Hills.
Amazing place to stay, enjoyed a relaxing weekend away
They were Very lovely and inviting
Lovely place to stay

We appreciated the breakfast items, and extra treats, the quality kettle, toaster, TV, bed was very comfortable, lovely fluffy towels, heating worked well, nice bathroom. good size fridge. Lovely clean crisp decor. Lovely get away space.

Wow! This accomodation was exactly what we needed. Spacious studio with so much to offer. Fantastic value for money, great amenities. So many thoughtful touches that made is easy to relax. Thank you for a great stay- if we ever come back to mount pleasant we will definitely rebook with you! ❤️🌻
Clean and comfortable. Hosts are very thoughtful.

Great quiet location for a quiet getaway or a base for touring the region with little local pubs close by for dinner. Very friendly hosts and a very clean well equipped studio. Lovely comfy bed. Fresh bread condiments etc fro breakky and wine on arrival lovely touches thanks.
Beautifully styled studio with extra little touches that make it feel very homely. Great comfortable space and very clean, easy to access and very private
The hosts really look after you at this place with loads of goodies and treats.   Also keep your eyes peeled for the colourful birds that flock to this area.
Great, clean accommodation. Would stay here again if ever in the area :)
Wonderful place for a getaway.  In a quiet area the suite was exceptionally clean and well looked after. Attention to detail was well thought out and everything we needed was there.

I was immensely impressed with The Vines. Shari and Garth have thought of everything. From little packets of biscuits to enjoy with our hot drinks, to a make up removal towel. Their home was both spacious yet cosy with everything you need for a weekend away. We loved the welcome treats, the breakfast supplies and the soft towels. It was quiet and welcoming and perfect for our relaxing weekend.

Shari and Gareth’s studio is very comfortable, neat and tidy. The thoughtful little extras such as breakfast were much appreciated! Easy and responsive communication and check in. A quick walk or drive into town. Highly recommended.
Beautiful apartment with really thoughtful touches like chocs and wine. Gorgeous deck to enjoy a drink, and just a short walk into town. The dog was V cute :)

Friendly hosts, couldn’t fault anything!
Peter and Lana

The Vines is a perfect example of what AirBnb can be. You get to stay in a place that is spotless, well cared for with quality inclusions. Shari and Gareth offer total privacy or local knowledge to enhance your stay. The cooking facilities are simple and the extra supplies for breakfast are very generous,  not to forget the bottle of wine left for us to enjoy. If you can time your stay for the Saturday farmer's market, do so. It is a wonderful example of community in action. Thoroughly recommended stay.
Shari and Gareth were great hosts - their accommodation is spacious and spotless. I  will stay again when I'm next in the area.

We had a wonderful stay at Shari and Gareth’s place! Shari was so kind, she put the heater on before we arrived and it was lovely and toasty when we got there.
Check in was so easy and the location is great for exploring the Barossa.

Thanks Shari and Gareth :)
Lovely accommodation. Clean, neat, everything you need, good location, great hospitality.
The accommodation was impeccably clean, modern furnishings and extra special touches made this a great place to stay.
Fantastic place to stay! Very welcoming 😊
It is a cute place and Shari and Gareth are really respectful of your privacy.
Quite private.
Great experience thank you

Staying at shari’s place has been amazing! Amenities were all provided. Comfy and cozy place to stay for a weekend away! Highlight was the bed, it was the most comfiest bed ever. Also the provided snacks, brochures and breakfast. My partner and I loved it and would definitely recommend
Lovely BnB clean and comfortable bed, love the extra touches. Had everything we need for quick getaway.

The Vines exceeded our expectations. Accommodation was clean well appointed with some excellent touches like chocolates and bottle of wine on our arrival. Very nice continental breakfast also included. Great value for money.
Great accommodation, so clean and tidy, will definitely stay again

A very comfortable place to stay. Shari has lots of little extra touches for her guests which whilst not something I look for or expect it was nice. The bed is very comfortable amenities spotless and good use of space suitable for a single or couple.
Great little spot tucked away in a quiet area. Shari was lovely to deal with and all the extra generous little touches around the place make it really welcoming.
Shari was so accommodating! So many homely touches to the BnB, has everything we needed for our stay. Will definitely be coming back soon and for more then one night!
Lovely and quiet place to stay. Very convenient walk into town. I loved the ease of check in and out. Very clean and tidy.
Shari's BnB is in a lovely position in Mt Pleasant and has everything you'll need with some extra lovely touches too. Highly recommend it to you.
Everything you need for a very comfortable stay at high quality! Thank you Shari!
We had a great stay. Cute little place. Clean and tidy. Very relaxing.

The Vines was a beautiful little oasis. We had a wonderful mini getaway, everything was lovely and clean, felt very private, and the attention to detail was above and beyond! Food for breakfast, chocolate, good communication from Shari. Excellent value 🙂
Clean, fresh, accessible, private, clear communication, relaxing and affordable.
Great place, lovely communication. Shari is a gem!
Lovely little home, perfect getaway
Many nice details, thank you.
Beautiful location and unit size. Shari is great to communicate with as is very helpful
The stay was so lovely, exceeded my expectations!
Lovely little place

Amazing quiet country escape, so relaxing yet rustic and luxurious.
Great location with so many great wineries with in the surrounding district.
Pristine accommodation with super clean and high quality amenities :)

The Auction Shed was such a dreamy place.
The Shed was beautiful and very homily and the place was immaculate.
We were worried about being cold in such space but the heater was incredible, the place heated up within minutes and we were toasty warm the whole trip.
I would recommend Auction Shed to anyone - the place was just stunning, the views, the cleanliness and atmosphere was beautiful.
Jasmine was very polite and accommodating to our needs, she made our weekend so special and was efficient with communication whenever I had questions and contacted her.
Sensational !
Beautiful spot for a special few days.

This is a beautiful place for a solo or couple trip. It’s set in a peaceful paddock and is a very short walk to the Angaston Main Street. The place is modern and stylish and is a cosy retreat in winter.
Perfect place and location. Will be back for sure.
Amazing place to stay while in the Barossa valley
Jasmine’s place was great! Nice little spot in the Barossa. Unfortunately the gas ran out on the morning of our check out but Jasmine was quick to respond and rectify the situation. Cheers
Everything is high end at the Elders Office. It just works :) lovely fire, great heating (including heated bathroom floor), great shower and very comfy. Great home-base for a Barossa weekend away.

This was such a lovely little getaway! My partner and I enjoyed the nice escape from work life. The location was beautiful, the house was stunning - such a beauty to look at both inside and out. The subtle old touches mixed with the modern, balanced beautifully! Jasmine was a lovely host and extremely helpful when needed. Definitely recommended you check this out!
Great place to spend a couple of nights. Very close to town and many amazing wineries
Great place to stay and only five minutes walk into Angaston.

Very cute Airbnb in a great location and close to everything you need in the Barossa.
Incredibly easy check in and check out process and fantastic amenities.
We would definitely recommend and stay again!

We absolutely loved the charm of the old mixed with new, and didn't want to leave! The place is only a short walk from Angaston too, which is such a quaint town. We went to Hive Cafe in the main street 3 times - the coffee and food was amazing!

Elder's Office is such a stylish place, and was sparkling clean! We loved the gas fireplace and the spa bath too - they were both really nice touches for a romantic getaway.
Jasmine was a lovely and attentive host too, and we look forward to coming back one day!
Loved the tub and the peaceful surroundings! Perfect place to unwind.
We absolutely loved our stay. You will not be disappointed if you stay here. Extremely clean. Amazing styling. Could not recommend it enough. Loved looking for the alpacas. Thanks again!
Great place to stay just minutes out of the heart of Angaston. Stylish cabin on a small property and would highly recommend!
The accommodation is very stylish and  beautifully done . I don’t think I can find the words.  Yes I can we are definitely coming back.
Jasmine’s place is comfortable and cosy with everything you could need. It’s in a great location and enough space on the property to do your own thing! Loved our time away, will be back!
The converted shed is lovely to stay in and the town of Angaston is just beautiful!
Beautiful view, close to plenty of restaurants and food places

We had an excellent stay at Elders Office. The accommodation was spotlessly clean, the amenities were great and the location perfect. Would highly recommend Elders Office  to anyone wanting a relaxing stay and good access to the delights of the Barossa.
Such a clean and lovely place to stay! Amenities were amazing!

We loved our 2 night stay at Elders Cottage. It was super close to town and a quick drive to cafes, restaurants and wineries.
Jasmine and Andrew were extremely fast on the reply (we couldn’t work the gas fireplace) but this was no issue and we were shown the way by Andrew within minutes :)
The place was spotless and the attention to detail was obvious with the provision of everything we needed for our stay. We loved the heated bathroom floor and the spa bath! It felt like we were staying in a 5 star hotel. We will definitely stay again in the future !

Beautiful space! Relaxing, cosy & next to perfect! Would advise other travellers to bring eye masks for sleeping, the blinds in bedroom don't block out much light so keep this in mind that early mornings will happen! Otherwise everything was beautiful, loved the bath and heated tiles. Thanks again!
Wonderful place to stay

We had a wonderful stay at Elders office. Check In instructions were easy to follow, and the place was easy to find. Everything was as expected the place was lovely and clean with everything we needed and more, for a night away.  We loved the spa bath, the view from the bedroom doors was wonderful and we enjoyed eating breakfast on the outside deck.  The smart tv was an added bonus and everything was thought of. Jasmine was prompt to reply to a special request we had and she was happy to oblige, which made our time there even better.

My stay here was absolutely lovely. Its a beautiful location exactly like the photos. Very quiet but an easy 5 min walk to central Angaston where there's restaurants and bars.
I would stay again and recommend to friends.
Beautiful area and such a cute place to stay. We loved it.
A great hidden gem, within walking distance to Angaston. Elders Office has great facilities and was exceptionally clean. A great find!!

Absolutely perfect for a getaway that isn’t too far from Adelaide but makes you feel like you’re in your own world. Perfect location, the fireplace is amazing and despite my already high expectations we were still blown away. Have already started recommending this place to friends and family!
Amazing little getaway. Very private and cosy. Close to the town centre

Lovely place in very quiet area. Close to amenities and vineyards. Very nice and clean accommodation. Had a restful stay. We really enjoyed the little personal of the Airbnb. We shall come back.
Thank you.

elder’s office is a beautiful, private and wonderful place to stay! jasmine was a lovely host, with very prompt response time and was very willing to help out with any issues we had! elders office is within walking distance of the main strip in angaston. we will definitely be staying here again!

Amazing! The views from the windows are just amazing!
We loved our short stay and would definitely recommend to anyone wanting a relaxing, romantic night away!

A comfortable, clean and beautiful spot to stay in Angaston! Only a short walk from the Main Street but with that beautiful feeling of quiet isolation. We can’t wait to come back and have our morning coffee on the deck. Thanks Jasmine :)
We loved our stay at Elders Office, super coasy and stylish. Walking distance from the main street. We will be staying again.

well worth the money!! this beautiful place is tucked away and private for that romantic get away or a weekend away from Adelaide. We thoroughly enjoyed the spa bath and heated bathroom tiles- exactly what we needed on a cold night. The house was styled so nicely, from the bathroom to living area. A nice big wrap around deck made it a perfect place to have breakfast. The gas fire and a glass of wine went perfectly together to end a lovely night. We can’t wait to come back!
Fantastic place, great location, very clean and comfortable.

Jasmine is great on the communication, check in instructions were easy and non contact. The accommodation is just lovely, the pictures dont do it justice we spent every afternoon/evening on the private deck looking at the view, surrounded by nature and wildlife, it was lovely! It was quiet and private just as we had hoped and were really impressed but the thoughtful touches added my Jasmine. Highly recommend a stay at Elders Office!
A great place to stay while you’re in the Barossa, the cottage is very well done and very stylish. It made for a comfortable stay, would definitely come back here again!
Cosy vibe in a beautiful location.
We enjoyed our stay at Elders Office, perfect place to stay. Great location!!Jasmine was really helpful. Thank you!
We absolutely loved this place! Beautifully styled, well appointed, and comfortable. A perfect place to stay for a tour of the Barossa. Our only regret was not booking another night!

A great location to stay & explore the Barossa yet felt secluded and private at the same time. It was a beautiful little place to call home for a night, and was well-equipped for a relaxing night-in! Highly recommend staying at Jasmine’s place :)

Really well appointed standalone accommodation that was a great jumping off point for our weekend in the Barossa. We really enjoyed our stay, and since it was a bit chilly we got to take full advantage of the heated floors in the bathroom. The space heater also worked great to warm the bedroom. We only regret that we didn't see the alpacas on the property while we were there. The town of Angaston is just down the road and has some cute cafes and other conveniences. Would return and recommend to other travelers.

The Elder's office is a beautiful little slice of anguston. Wonderfully situated near a great cafe and away enough from the road to enjoy the quiet country side. Very clean and beautifully renovated. Highly recommend staying here for a Barossa getaway.

Amazing space. Really stylish revamp that was authentic to the original building but so luxurious and had everything you needed! Like  underfloor heating, king bed, gas fire, spa, recliner lounge for movies, breakfast box, milk, all kitchen amenities and a washing machine. Close enough to angaston to walk in to get coffee, groceries or dinner. Loved it and would not hesitate to come again!! Best Airbnb we’ve stayed at yet :-)

Elder's Shed is an amazing little getaway in Angaston. The exterior looks like a rustic shed but inside is a beautifully transformed space and looks stunning. Bed & bedding were super comfy. Would definitely stay again in future!
A beautiful place for a couples getaway! Excellent amenities and easy to get around to the local wineries.
Great place to stay for a get away!
Lovely stay! Thanks for accommodating our late check out to suit our plans!
Awesome place to stay in the barossa, modern yet rustic and in a quiet and convenient spot. Would recommend!
A truly memorable experience in a unique cottage, beautifully appointed and designed.

AWESOME!!! We loved are stay and will return as we just found it so peaceful and loved the wildlife as well. Elders Office is an amazing shed turn into a stunning getaway... Thank You !!! Miss the place already.....

Highly recommend staying here when in Barossa Valley. Nice quiet spot around nature. Comfy cottage for couple trip away. Very close to all of the vineyards and Angeston town supermarket only a 5 minute drive away.
My partner and I stayed at Elder’s office for 2 nights for our anniversary. It was a beautifully furnished industrial themed place. We had so much fun.
Great space in fantastic location.
Had a beautiful time. Highly recommend
Such a tranquil location with a beautiful bathtub!
I have only good things to say about our stay here. Everything was very comfortable, a quiet country setting but close enough to the little town of Angaston to be handy
We absolutely adored this place! It was great for summer and would be divine in winter with the cozy fireplace! Thank you for having us! It was a lovely way to celebrate our wedding anniversary! ☺️
Great place! Five minute walk to town - coffee shops, pubs, restaurants. Incredibly clean and well maintained. Really private, quiet location. No block out blinds in bedroom.

Jasmine’s stay is a a beautiful romantic escape! a stunning location, mixed with a range of amenities and helpful local tips create a wonderful stay. although on the pricier side - well worth the experience of the best the barossa region has to offer!
Awesome little place which is only a few minutes walk from the main street. Could not recommend a better place to stay for a few nights in Angastan.
Awesome accommodation and great location.

Great accommodation, extremely well fitted out with modern facilities and all so easy to use. Bed was really comfortable, slept so well, tick ✅. Bathroom with heated floor and shower were fantastic. Gas fire so nice and convenient to quickly warm the space. Lounge chair really comfortable. Loved our stay and great location. Well done on providing a great space and thank you 👍
A fantastic place! Super clean, stylish, quiet, cosy and convenient.
Beautiful renovation, tastefully styled. Quiet location with all amenities we really enjoyed our stay, very close to the heart of Angaston.

The Elders Office is divine. Beautifully renovated and all the amenities that you could possibly need. All set in a gorgeous location. Will definitely be staying again next time we are in the Barossa.
If it’s peace and quiet this is the perfect spot. For a couple that enjoy natural surrounds Jasmins place is great. 10 minute stroll into Angaston which offers everything you need.
Jasmine was so helpful and the place is superb, really couldn't recommend highly enough! Thanks for the stay!
Clean, stylish, excellent location and great local tips. Jasmine was very responsive.
excellent and stylish place, spotless, great amenities, wonderful communication with the host, one of my favourite Airbnb stays. Would stay here again!

Beautiful accommodation located quite close to central Angaston. A really nice bathroom, comfortable bed, with all the basics you could need to cook (Inc. Oil and milk!). The fireplace was also a nice touch on a cold night. Would definitely recommend.
A lovely, peaceful place to stay.  Lots of history associated with the cottage and renovated well.  Would highly recommend Jasmine's place.

Jasmines place was absolutely beautiful. The perfect getaway while in the Barossa. Everything was super clean and tidy we would definitely come back again! Thank you for having us and making our trip away so amazing.
Beautiful little cottage style getaway

Jasmine's accommodation was beautifully set up and made us feel extremely relaxed
The ammenities were thoughtful and a great location in Angaston!
Great stay, everything we could need and a lovely space. A good location for visiting all the wineries too. Would definitely recommend

If I left a negative review, it'd solely be to ensure this place was available for my next stay.
Absolutely perfect, full of character and very comfortable.
Hope to stay again soon!

Elders Office is perfectly located in gorgeous Angaston. Absolutely ideal for the Barossa Rail Trail and walking in to town for dinner. The accommodation is beautifully appointed, perfectly clean and has pretty much everything you might need. Outstanding hosts and high quality place in excellent location. Strongly recommended for couples on a special escape to the Barossa Valley.
A great place to stay. Very quiet and still only a short walk to town.
Beautiful accommodation in the Barossa Valley. Very comfortable and modern with everything we could need for our stay.
Awesome spot. Very rustic and a lovely home

Really gorgeous place to stay!!! So close to town as well which is great. Very comfortable bed, made it hard to check out on time haha. And a spa bath which was lovely! Really stylishly appointed throughout, and super comfy lazy boy style chairs which were perfect to relax on in front of the ‘fire’ with a local fortified drop.

Absolutely loved staying in The Elder’s Cottage! It is so stunningly renovated with everything you need.  The heated bathroom floors are such a nice touch. Everything in this cottage feels like luxury and we would definitely recommend staying here.

Lovely accommodation located on a small rural block just a short walk (10 minutes) from the township of Angaston. The bathroom was modern and the heated flooring was a nice touch. King size bed was firm but comfortable. The gas fireplace in the main sitting area was cosy to sit by and enjoy a glass of local red. Basic breakfast supplies were provided. Overall a nice place for a relaxing weekend.

Incredible stay!! Location was 3 minutes from our favourite cellar door, the place itself is beautiful - lovely views, gorgeous fireplace to enjoy a wine, comfortable bed and an amazing jet bath. One of our favourite airbnb we have ever stayed in - would recommend highly!
Great Cottage , with some beautiful finishes ..
What a place! We loved every minutes of our stay, it's the best air bnb we've ever stayed at. Honestly, if you're looking at staying in the Barossa, don't look anywhere else, book this place.
Absolutely loved this place - so cosy and clean and walking distance to shops. Loved being in nature as well! Definitely recommend!

We had a lovely stay in this well appointed and cosy accommodation! The modern amenities really made our stay as we used the kitchen.

Would definitely stay again, and would recommend to others.
Fabulous well appointed accommodation. Have thought of everything. May look rusticfrom tge outside  but has all the mod cons. Will definitely return.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the amazing Elders Office. Located in the picturesque Angaston, this wonderfully restored building is the perfect home-base to explore the Barossa Valley from. I would highly recommend Jasmine and the Elders Office for your next stay.
Great location to stay for a Barossa Weekend. Beautifully restored and a cosy place to enjoy.
Beautiful and comfortable place to stay. Would stay again!
Great location and accommodation!
Perfect winter getaway to enjoy a bottle of local wine in front of the fire!
A cozy and charming place to stay! We enjoyed our time here, very comfortable with everything we needed. Easy check in and great location.
Amazing place tp stay!!!
The perfect place for a cosy winter getaway! Great location and beautiful views.

Elders office was such a beautiful and intimate setting. As soon as we walked in (it was freezing over the weekend we were there) we immediately felt warm and cosy. The addition of breakfast staples and coffee pod machine made it even better. It’s close to all of the best wineries and it was quiet enough that you felt like you were away from the little town. We will be back most definitely. Thank you!

Beautiful setting. Perfect in winter and can imagine how nice in summer too. Incredible couch, bathroom and bed. Ideal amenities
Would definitely stay again!
Such a clean and cozy place to stay. Recommend it 100%.
Amazing place - modern and stylish but still super cozy. Perfect location and beautiful property. We can’t wait to come back again!
Clean and cozy stay in a great location. Highly recommend!

Jasmine’s shed was the most perfect Barossa winter getaway. The fireplace kept the place cosy and warm, while the heated tiles and spa bath in the bathroom only added to how comforting it was! It was decked out with appliances and games, the attention to detail was above and beyond and there was truly nothing left out. I couldn’t rate this place more highly, my mum and I had the most wonderful time!
Perfect for a weekend getaway with a touch of luxury.
Great location near town. Lovely setting.
It was brilliant the heated floors in the bathroom were a fun surprise
Absolutely loved our stay. Jasmine was a great communicator and her place was beautiful. Warm and homely in a great location. Couldn’t recommend more!

Elders Office is in a perfect location, close by to restaurants, cafes, and a park, and still it's such a peaceful spot. It's a beautiful and cozy place and I would absolutely recommend paying it a visit. The host was also very kind and helpful.
Such an awesome place to stay for a getaway we will be back for sure
Such an amazing location + beautiful rustic modern setting!
This is a wonderful place for a short getaway to the Barossa. Really comfy and a unique experience. Thank you!
Awesome place and very cosy with great modern features but with amazing rustic charm
What a fabulous place. Walking distance to Angaston, less than 10 minutes drive to Tanunda. Really well fitted out with everything you can think of.  So peaceful, and that night sky 😍
A touch of luxury in a unique, rustic setting! Perfect for a cosy winter getaway. The gorgeous alpacas and sheep on the property were a pleasant surprise !
My partner and I had such a lovely time at Jasmine’s stay. The place was in such a beautiful remote location, which made our getaway even more relaxing. Would definitely recommend and stay again!

Absolutely loved our accommodation and look forward to visiting again. All amenities one could need for a weekend away or an extended stay. Very comfortable and considered, with the finer touches that stand out above other air bnb’s. Great location in a friendly and welcoming town. Highly recommend a stay here!

Nice stay, in a great location, just found that it didn't quite have the polish I was hoping for. A few small issues marred the stay a little, the fireplace wasn't working properly and kept switching itself off, some of the cooking utensils were dirty, the TV also had some connection issues, the bath was fantastic though some of the jets shot out of their sockets during our bath. Most of these issues would be easily overlooked but when they all stacked up it was a little disappointing, maybe it was just an off night
Fabulous accomodation, and really is such easy walking access down to the Main Street in Angaston.
Beautiful stay in unique accomodation. Thoroughly enjoyed our two nights and everything we needed was at hand. Thank you

We loved our stay in Elder’s Office. The place is designed perfectly, with lots of special touches. It had everything you need to cook a meal. The views were beautiful from all windows. The location was perfect- close to town and wineries. Thanks for a great stay, we can’t wait to come back.
Great place to stay with great facilities, walking distance to town.

Place is as expected from the photos.
We had a wonderful stay here for two nights! Highly recommended for a couple weekend getaway. The bedroom was adequate, comfy bed ( PS- IF it gets cold there's a blacker in the cupboard 😉 ) Great lights and well thought out simple yet effective decor.
Bathroom is absolutely amazing, for a rustic shed they certainly did not skimp, I mean heated floor!? WOW maybe not needed in summer but nice for winter. Bath is large enough for two and the other amenities are great!

Kitchen is great! Plenty there to chef up a great meal! All the basic essentials pots, pans, plates utensils.

Fireplace is so relaxing!

We enjoyed our stay.

Good spot if you like wineries, great food and small boutique shops. I think there are some good walking spots too but it isn't really scenic viewing walking trail area.

Hosts are fantastic 😊 Didn't even see them but I like that we just easily checked in and out with key code safebox.

Thanks for a lovely stay!
A lovely escape for a couple nights! Great location and close to the main street. We loved the included features, particularly the gas fireplace and fully equipped kitchen for cooking.

Elders Office was perfect for our stay in the Barossa. It has everything you need, is very clean and is spacious for two people. Check in was easy and it is far enough away from the other two accommodations on site to feel private and quiet. We thoroughly enjoyed our time here.

The Elders Office BnB accomodation is a great place for a couples retreat. Situated in the picturesque town of Angaston, and close to the town centre, the space has all the mod cons yet maintains its historical feel.  Highly recommend.
A very cosy homely stay, with everything you need. Added bonus is heated bathroom floor and spa bath! Place is spotless clean and very comfortable.

We had the best stay here. It is a beautiful spot so close to Angaston main street. We loved the spa bath. We curled up with a glass of wine watching TV in front of the fire. A perfect night enjoying this lovely place.
Absolutely amazing stay! Only regret my partner and I had was not staying for longer!
Gorgeous place, highly recommended. We stayed just the one night but would have loved to have stayed for longer. Very costly, clear communication.
Both rustic but yet modern cabin. Clean and accurate as advertised. The heated bathroom floor was one of the highlights of  the cabin. Would recommend
We found our stay cozy and comfortable, everything was clean with close attention to detail. Beautiful location, made for a sweet weekend away.
Fantastic location and beautiful space to relax 🙂
Thanks, we had a wonderful weekend there. The place was great!
Great place too stay close too everything. Everything u need.
Great little hidden gem, perfect little place to relax and unwind. Great modern finishes and has everything you need.

The property is clean, comfortable and beautifully decorated. It is in an ideal location, walking distance from the lovely Angaston. Check in and out and communication with Jasmine was easy!! I would highly reccomend.

Beautiful accomodation in the Barossa valley! The accomodation was very clean and tidy and had everything we needed for a wonderful stay. The location was also excellent! We definitely recommend staying here on your visit to the Barossa.

Very spacious well designed cabin.
Good breakfast provisions.
Very clean. Highly recommend.

One of the best stays I’ve had on airbnb! Had the best time and it was such a beautiful place! Super clean, luxe and serene. The host had given has breakfast and coffee/tea too which is so nice and rare! Not alot of airbnbs do that! Highly recommend this place! You wont regret it!
Fabulous accommodation in lovely Angaston with everything I needed.  Loved sitting on the deck in the sun and the deep relaxing spa bath was the best part of my stay!
Great experience
love the place, couldn't recommend more

We had such a beautiful stay at the Elders Office. It's a short trip into the main road of Angaston, beautiful location where you can relax on the deck and admire the stars. place was clean and beautifully organised. Check in was easy. Absolutely remarkable place to stay. Thanks!
beautiful place! we enjoyed our stay and loved Al and Fred! (we named the alpacas for ourselves).  peaceful and beautiful house and property. would recommend
We had such a great time! The place is wonderful. They have created such a unique and lovely space. The breakfast was a great touch and having games is a brilliant idea!
What a wonderful stay! Private, yet walking distance to the best town in the Barossa. Has everything you you need, comfortable, spacious and a brilliant bathroom. A rare find and will be back!
A gorgeous cabin in a lovely part of the country. Close to the town for convenience but feels very remote and quiet especially at night.
Elders Office is perfectly located 10-15mins away from many great wineries. It has all the creature comforts you would need, modern features, stylish, perfect for relaxing. Would highly recommend.

The accomodation is in a lovely country setting yet still close enough to the town. Extremely comfortable with all the mod cons. We especially enjoyed sitting on the expansive deck and soaking in the fabulous spa bath. We hope to return again in the near future.

A very beautiful and well maintained property. We loved every minute of our stay and really enjoyed the privacy the property offers. It felt like we were on a far away farm away from it all, while only being a 5 minute walk to the town centre packed with beautiful cafes and amenities. I would highly recommend this place to any couple that wants to explore the Barossa region, we loved our stay :)

Beautiful spot close to Angaston town with spectacular views from the balcony. A real retreat.
Wish we had time to stay longer.
And the hosts were very accommodating!
We really enjoyed the staying in the shed, clean and interesting to live in a Auction room before.
Clean, cozy and very spacious! Quality amenities and beautiful views over the Barossa.
Our stay at this venue was AMAZING! It is so different and is a wonderful property. Lovely little touches, beautiful linen, towels and amenities in general. Can HIGHLY recommend it.

We loved every bit of our weekend getaway and the accomodation just made our trip!
We were blown away when we arrived, pictures just can’t do it justice. Inside was not only beautiful but spotless, with great amenities.
We look forward to returning when we have the chance! I would 100% recommend staying here, it’s everything you need and more.
Highly recommended.  We loved our stay here in every way.

The auction yard was really nice. If staying with another couple need to realise that there is no wall from floor to ceiling for the bedrooms so you can talk to eachother and hear everything, ie talking snoring ect . It was a very unique place to stay.  Be careful with the highly polished bathroom tiles, our friends commented on how slippery they are and about 1hr later my partner fell over on the wet tiles.  We stayed for 3 nights and ate lunch and dinner at the location however had to buy dishwasher tablets as there were only one for each night which wasnt enough given the time we spent there. We booked thru Airnbnb however should have booked thru Jasmines own web page as for the same time Airbnb was $250 dollars more expensive. jasmine tried to help us out with resolving that problem and went out of her way but we couldn.t cancel and rebook thru her. Big difference in price.
